Subject: Welcome back email for Term 3 Freshmore
Body:
Dear Cohort 2 Students,

 

Welcome back from your vacation! I hope you have a good 4 months’ break. There are many upcoming activities and events at the CDC. 

Here’s a head’s up for you.

 

1)      UPOP Module: LinkedINg Up

This is the 5th UPOP module that you would need to complete. There are sessions spread across October to early December. 

You need only attend (1) ONE session. More information will be sent to you on how you can book your session.

 

2)      Recruitment Talks

Many companies would start to look out for internship hires from September onwards for next year’s internship window. 

Do join in the recruitment talks to network or get a better picture of the company and opportunities available.
For regular updates on upcoming recruitment events and internship opportunities, remember to check the eNewsletter sent on every Friday at 09:30am by CDC. 
I would be happy to meet up with you if you need advice on career planning or your resume critiqued before you apply for your internship. 
Simply make an appointment with me via GEMS <https://sutd-csm.symplicity.com/students/?signin_tab=0> . 
Like and follow us on our official CDC Facebook Page <https://www.facebook.com/SUTDCDC>  to receive latest updates on upcoming events. Looking forward to meeting you.
Best Regards
Desmond Foo
Career Coach | SUTD Career Development Centre
<https://www.sutd.edu.sg/> 
T: (65) 6499 4847
8 Somapah Road, Building 5 Level 3
Singapore 487372
 <https://www.facebook.com/sutdsingapore/>    <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsg.linkedin.com%2Fschool%2Fsutd%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb784db46751a40d6753b08d978c6295e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673614775515147%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=iY4hL%2BieWS3nReQZLaqo9gCyOgCu6zEptY1eh0xjync%3D&reserved=0>    <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fsutdsg&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb784db46751a40d6753b08d978c6295e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673614775515147%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=RF2RZMcvjEDkRPX5JTPo4TCVWnz3b26hErcZaSY8sPk%3D&reserved=0>    <https://www.youtube.com/user/SUTDSingapore>    <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdsg%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb784db46751a40d6753b08d978c6295e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673614775525143%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=sC53UU%2BTacg%2FTtbbQQwTXqbJwrtnzlpgbS3IWz6M7ok%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: 🥋SUTD KARATE INTRO SESSION!!🥋
Body:
Hiya!

Ready to get a full body workout?!? Power up by SHOUTING?!?!?! BREAK SOME WOOD?!?!?? (Wait no, got carried away, we don't actually karate chop wood, no trees were harm, don't worry!😆) 

It's time to fire up your fighting spirit, because SUTD Karate will be having our intro session for the next two weeks! Yep, not one, but TWO weeks! So come on down and learn how to karate chop, punch, kick and defend yourself! No experience needed! In fact, we are super beginner friendly, most of our members had absolutely zero experience coming in!

Cool, so when exactly is it?🕗
For the next two Tuesday nights, on the 21st & 28th Sept 8-10pm!

Where?🗺
Dance studios 6 & 7!
In the sports centre, level 2, opposite the NinjaBox lockers.

Do I need to bring any special equipment?🥋
Nope! Just bring your water bottle and you, yourself, and a friend!😏 Wear comfy clothes you can jump in. We train bare foot, so sports shoes aren't needed!


Alright! Sign me up!
Spaces are limited so sign up fast to secure your spot here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPfBXLfjvK7RNjkUA8s6CCr1UM1BMVUxMNjdZMUI5WjNDNUwxVzNOSzJDRC4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cbc0f2e8a547049a1cc1f08d978b50b06%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673541487205843%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4Ll36b%2F1QE26ifEYkbuWJRkDk3M3OUGt8Gr9gdYUvYI%3D&reserved=0> !
Sign up closes this Saturday at noon for the session on the 21st and closes next Thursday (23/9) 2359 for the session on the 28th. Strictly no walk-ins.

Hit (no pun intended) us up on our Telegram group here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FG0nrRJXb62_yeIxF&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cbc0f2e8a547049a1cc1f08d978b50b06%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673541487205843%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Fcao7jrl8XImjTCOgYYrV1Biy0oy0mqqbEGWTRZnlcc%3D&reserved=0>  and follow us on Insta @sutdkarate <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdkarate%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cbc0f2e8a547049a1cc1f08d978b50b06%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673541487215837%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Xt5sH4fDAJ7mJwB0tMO7smN5FfPOwQgQHNwd%2BYN9eXo%3D&reserved=0> 

See you there!

OSU!
SUTD Karate

P.s. Non-freshies and staff are welcomed too!

Subject: Register Now - SSIA Summit 2021 (30 Sept 2021)
Body:
Dear SUTD Community,

 

You are cordially invited to join in the SSIA Summit 2021. For more details and registration, please see below.

 

Thanks & Regards,

Office of Research 

 



 

Hello, 

 

We are pleased to share on behalf of SSIA, the upcoming Summit 2021, taking place on Thu, 30 Sept 2021. Themed “Building a Smart Nation with Innovation and Technology”, the line-up of speakers include agencies and industry leaders who will be sharing insights and megatrends.  

 
For event agenda, visit:
https://ssia.org.sg/ssia-summit-semiconductor-dinner-2021/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fssia.org.sg%2Fssia-summit-semiconductor-dinner-2021%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C88e8bd83f0e84ecbead208d978b38a54%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673535121165599%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2FV030tg8uhS4%2Bc1h82RF4YlXFsWY55r4MVlH009ld3o%3D&reserved=0> 
 
Or register NOW at:
https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_cv5-mZPcQi6JrEePNi6MEQ

 

Please help to share with your team and all are welcome to join us on-line. Thank you. 

 

Thanks,
JULIE
SSIA - Strategic Programs Director

Subject: Bottle Rocket Launch with SEDS-SUTD
Body:
Calling all SUTDents!

 

Have you ever wondered what makes a rocket fly? 🚀

Are you interested in rovers, probes rockets, or anything that goes to space? 🛰

Do you want learn how to get such technology off the launchpad and beyond the atmosphere? 🛠

 

We are the Students for the Exploration and Development of Space, a student group dedicated to Space Technology.

Our interest group aims to provide a platform for like-minded students to team up and lead space related research and engineering projects.

 

As an introduction to the interest group, we would like to extend an invitation for launching bottle rockets with us on campus. All equipment will be provided on-site,  just bring yourself!



Date & Time: 24th September 2021, 2pm -3.30pm

Location: School Field (Sports Complex)

Attire: Anything comfortable + covered footwear

 

 

Sign up here --> https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPev39EW6KHtMqMKoK34aIHlUOEdOOEg3OU1VRElKWVI4STMySElDN0VXMy4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPev39EW6KHtMqMKoK34aIHlUOEdOOEg3OU1VRElKWVI4STMySElDN0VXMy4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3ddf01dcd96b4ddaaf2f08d978ae5abb%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673512936226818%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=dAeBaMEIYPBnh%2FiYsWJzE%2F9iXZ3TO8l67WuJRs71lXc%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPev39EW6KHtMqMKoK34aIHlUOEdOOEg3OU1VRElKWVI4STMySElDN0VXMy4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3ddf01dcd96b4ddaaf2f08d978ae5abb%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673512936236798%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Mr2FeofOLoPXxrEKLD5gKKAHsCLpN%2BrngRssAkBNug8%3D&reserved=0> 

Fill | Discover5thRows: Launching Bottle Rockets with SEDS-SUTD <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPev39EW6KHtMqMKoK34aIHlUOEdOOEg3OU1VRElKWVI4STMySElDN0VXMy4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3ddf01dcd96b4ddaaf2f08d978ae5abb%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673512936246798%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QwmLcOF2sI2UU0L6IJ3Z2GI70E2MMYTG1hsN503CRJs%3D&reserved=0> 

Sign-up process is as follows: 1. Opt-in to the session 2. Opt-in to receive e-mail responses so that YOU can keep track of what you have signed up for 3. Session organisers will e-mail you that you have been successfully registered for the session Organised by: SEDS-SUTD The concepts that power bottle rockets and real rockets are actually not that different. Come and watch us launch bottle rockets on the school field on Friday, 17th September, and learn more about the basics of forces and the response of a vehicle to external forces. Important Information: - Date: 24/9/2021 - Time: 1400-1530 - Venue: School Field (Sports Complex) Only sign up if you are able to make it for the session! Otherwise, someone else who might want to go for the session would miss the opportunity. Let's make this event friendly for all! * Delete if not applicable

forms.office.com

 

 

In the meantime, come hang with us on our socials:

Subject: WELCOME TO VERTEX AIRWAYS
Body:
✈️✈️✈️Vertex Airways is looking for more passengers!✈️✈️✈️




Stressed out from starting a new term or just bored ?  Why not come over and join our bases and flyers to make new friends or just try something new to destress !







* No experience is required *
The training will be conducted in a fun and safe environment in which you will be grouped up with senior bases and flyers, with our experienced coach overseeing the session. 



What are you waiting for ! 
Fill in the form and indicate your interest :

http://shorturl.at/rtxI3 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fshorturl.at%2FrtxI3&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2c0cbdcdacac4eeb0dba08d978aa8f03%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673496594205121%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=nlr1%2FAubl4G1SS4tB0stuHUd4spK43kMAy%2Buz7F2uFs%3D&reserved=0> 




Dates: 

• Friday, 17 September 1900-2200hrs

• Tuesday, 21 September 1900-2200hrs

• Friday, 24 September 1900-2200hrs

• Tuesday, 28 September 1900-2200hrs


Venue: 

Fifth row Zone outside Gom Gom 


What to wear:

*	For guys - sports attire (no dri-fit or singlets)

*	For girls - tights/safety shorts w sports attire; sports bra

*	Please remove accessories including earrings and necklaces and cut your fingernails due to safety concerns

*	Those with spectacles should either try to wear contacts or spec hooks

*	Shoes - non-studded, preferably flat-soled



Should you have any queries, feel free to contact us at:

Instagram @sutdvertex

Louis (Vice-Captain) 8182 9951

Axel (Vice-Captain) 9678 8015










🤸‍♀️ !! CAN'T WAIT TO SEE YOU ON THE MATS !! 🤸‍♂️


Best Regards,

Fan Jiayi| Vertex Cheerleading
Singapore University of Technology and Design
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sutdvertex/ <https://www.facebook.com/sutdvertex/>  | Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sutdvertex/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdvertex%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2c0cbdcdacac4eeb0dba08d978aa8f03%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673496594215110%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0Kqtm88rxc4g%2FveOWjsKQ1OGO7iT%2BGGhnP1SDQf%2FJhQ%3D&reserved=0>  | Webpage: https://vertexcheerleading.wordpress.com/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexcheerleading.wordpress.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2c0cbdcdacac4eeb0dba08d978aa8f03%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673496594225105%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bvYqIuxIpJf3eXFSCxswrq4LVpLuP3gSWZli%2F7YwviQ%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: FW: Credit Suisse Coding Challenge: 2021 CodeIT Suisse (Singapore)
Body:
Dear Students,

 

Please find the enclosed Credit Suisse Coding Challenge for your application if you are interested.

 

Thanks

 

Best Regards

Jason Chew

 

From: Goh, Joanne [mailto:joanne.goh@credit-suisse.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2021 7:12 PM
To: Goh, Joanne <joanne.goh@credit-suisse.com <mailto:joanne.goh@credit-suisse.com> >
Subject: Credit Suisse Coding Challenge: 2021 CodeIT Suisse (Singapore)

 

External Email – Do not click on any links or open any attachments from an unknown sender.

 

Hi all,

 

Hope you are well.

 

We are having our annual coding challenge, CodeIT Suisse, from 24 – 26 Sep 2021 (Friday afternoon to Sunday). 

 

The event is open to Undergraduates or Masters University students graduating in Dec 2022 – 2025. 

 

Students (individual or teams or 2-3 members) may apply by submitting an application with their CVs and solutions to the Entry Challenge by 19 Sep (Sunday).

 

Please refer to the attached email/PDF for more details. Appreciate if you could share the event with your students.

 

We look forward to having a large number of signups from your school.

 

Thank you!

 

Regards,

Joanne Goh

Subject: Discover+ Upcoming Events_2
Body:
Dear Students,

 

1. The Advisory Mentorship Programme (Wave 2)

Duration: September to December 2021 

Application Deadline: 17 September 2021, Friday | Time: 2359h (GMT +8)

 

Worried about your future? We’re back with nearly 430 mentors. Make it your turn this year. The Advisory Mentorship Programme (Wave 2) is a four-month structured professional mentorship programme that matches students one-to-one with industry mentors of their choice. With nearly 430 mentors and the involvement of 10 mentorship partners—including the likes of Changi Airport Group, Edelman, Kaspersky, Standard Chartered, and more—Singapore’s largest nationwide mentorship programme returns, bigger and better. In Wave 1, just over 1,100 students were matched with 900 mentors across 48 industries, with the unwavering support of 16 renowned mentorship partners. Join us to meet professionals you aspire to be like and engage with organisations you hope to join, through personalised support from your mentor. Mentee applications are now open on advisory.sg/mentorship <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fadvisory.sg%2Fmentorship&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfaeb8d7722d142c19ef508d9785ac972%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673153770640679%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YLNtXqr%2BuDDW%2F7CcVFWgsVvigYR5xBnuS0vKJCRkY4E%3D&reserved=0>  and applications close on 17 September at 2359h (GMT+8). 

 

2. Discover+: International Development

Date: 21 September 2021, Tuesday | Time: 7.30pm to 9:00pm

Registration Deadline: 21 September 2021, Tuesday | Time: 12:00pm (GMT+8)

 

International development is primarily driven by the 17 Sustainable Development Goals, which include efforts to end poverty, fight inequalities, and tackle climate change. Through the establishment of the Singapore Cooperation Programme in 1992, Singapore has taken concrete steps to share its development experience and provide technical assistance in areas of water and sanitation, sustainability, and climate action. Interested to find out more about the occupations within the international development landscape? Join us online on 21 September for Discover+: International Development, co-organised by Advisory and the UNDP Global Centre for Technology, Innovation and Sustainable Development in Singapore (GCTISD). Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvisorysg.typeform.com%2Fto%2FNpmUGVhu%23source%3Dschools&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfaeb8d7722d142c19ef508d9785ac972%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673153770640679%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=T%2B%2B9jdllpBW5t6Nl8rg3K3yJxbZPLwi91ZFTYUwOecg%3D&reserved=0>  to hear from professionals working in organisations such as Asian Development Bank (ADB), International Monetary Fund (IMF), UNDP GCTISD, Worldwide Fund for Nature (WWF), and more!

 

3. Discover+: Cloud Computing

Date: 5 October 2021, Tuesday | Time: 7.30pm to 9:00pm

Registration Deadline: 5 October 2021, Tuesday | Time: 12:00pm (GMT+8)

 

As a model for enabling ubiquitous, convenient, and on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources, cloud computing has garnered much attention in recent years. By 2020, nearly 9 out of 10 IT Decision Makers in Singapore had already adopted cloud-based IT solutions. Interested to find out more about the occupations within the cloud computing industry? Join us online on 5 October for Discover+: Cloud Computing, co-organised by Advisory and IBM. Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvisorysg.typeform.com%2Fto%2FMHw6dBfc%23source%3Dschools&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfaeb8d7722d142c19ef508d9785ac972%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673153770650667%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=iMlsGBdBL5UnX0bExGvH7fh9SV%2FSBGkdQtvuYWBaSnA%3D&reserved=0>  to hear from professionals working in organisations such as IBM Technology Group, NCS, Red Hat Asia Pacific, Smart Nation and Digital Government Group (SNDGO) and GovTech, and more!

 

 

 

Regards,

Career Development Centre

From: Student Club - Chamber Ensemble
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2021 5:03 PM
To: *All Students <*AllStudents@sutd.edu.sg>
Subject: SUTD CHAMBER INTRO SESSIONS! 
 

CALLING ALL BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED STRING PLAYERS! 

 

Join us in our intro sessions to learn more about SUTD Chamber. If you are interested in performing and trying your hand at a string instrument (Cello, Violin etc) well this fifth row is for you!

 

WHO ARE WE?

We are a group of tight-knit string players who have bonded over the love for both classical and non-classical music. 

 



 

WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT?

Look forward to making music together as a group, regardless of your music background!

 

Our last concert was Alma Mater, a combined concert with SMU’s Symphonia in February 2021 (Watch a Snippet here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfvuWnxBnEk). We explored pieces across a wide variety of genres: from classical music of Bach’s Air on G String, film music like Beauty and the Beauty and the Theory of Everything, to pop music such as Coldplay’s A Sky Full of Stars. 



 

 

We have exciting performance opportunities coming up, and we hope to see you join us for these events. If you are interested, mark the event details of our intro sessions in your calendars and see you there!

 





 

 

INTRO SESSIONS:

Dates: 22nd, 28th, 29th September 2021 

Time: 7.30-9.30pm

Venue: MR1 (Blk 61 ISH level 2, facing the field)

Additional info: No music background required! The seniors and experienced players will guide you through the basics of playing a string instrument (of your choice) and you can look forward to playing a simple piece as a group by the end of the session!

Note: Instruments will also be provided (But you are welcomed to bring your own if you wish to!)

 

WEEKLY SESSIONS:

Dates: Wednesdays 

Time: 7.30-9.30pm

 

Watch our intro video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfvuWnxBnEk

Subject: SHARP Discoveries Session - 22 Sep (Wed), 3pm
Body:

Subject: RE: Shopee Career Opportunities and Events Collaterals (September 2021)
Body:
Dear Student,  

Check out the following EDM for Shopee's upcoming events and career opportunities!  

 

1. Tech@Shopee Virtual Career Day 2021 

 

Calling all techies who want to get behind the scenes of Tech@Shopee! Join us for our Tech@Shopee Virtual Career Day 2021 on 25 September and 2 October 2021, from 10:00am to 1:00pm (Singapore time), as we dive deeper into what our Shopee Tech Teams do. Hear from our Engineering, Design and Product Management teams on their experiences at Shopee and clarify any questions that you may have through our Q&A sessions. Look forward to gaining extensive insights on how we use tech to shape our users’ shopping experience on Shopee. Just like our dynamic e-commerce environment, no two days are the same - learn something new and exclusive from every session you attend across both days! Join us and be a part of our hyper-growth story. Register by 24 September 2021, 12:00pm (Singapore time) here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F3Avg4zt&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787312139%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QWKzRxwJXJ1mKTRAGAgATzGsQ9nwcPIlJK6JxIsfynY%3D&reserved=0>  . 





 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechatshopee.formstack.com%2Fforms%2Ftechatshopee_vcd21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787322133%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=1PaheDbIb%2Bkoh%2BbDZkqhiE6m3itx5dSBSkdNYrRXazM%3D&reserved=0> Who should join? <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechatshopee.formstack.com%2Fforms%2Ftechatshopee_vcd21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787332134%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yXkfrlbka6EAIX76FtRYuEo4DQqc4Mf7AbU%2FqSJ1WME%3D&reserved=0> 

*  All students may join us for this upcoming webinar!

*  Register now! https://techatshopee. formstack.com/forms/techatshopee_vcd21 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechatshopee.formstack.com%2Fforms%2Ftechatshopee_vcd21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787332134%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yXkfrlbka6EAIX76FtRYuEo4DQqc4Mf7AbU%2FqSJ1WME%3D&reserved=0>  





2. Shopee Singapore Product and Engineering Campus Recruitment Opportunities 

Looking to kick-start your career in the e-commerce industry? Shopee Singapore is looking for enthusiastic young talents graduating in 2022 to join our dynamic team! If you are passionate about solving challenging, large-scale problems with technology and creating a meaningful impact on millions of users, join us and make a difference together! 

 <https://share1.cloudhq-mkt3.net/41dd5bbbf58548.jpeg> 

Who should apply?

*  All students with STEM backgrounds are welcomed to apply with us. 

*  Apply now at Engineering: https://careers.shopee.sg/job-detail/3583 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcareers.shopee.sg%2Fjob-detail%2F3583&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787342127%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=7BZsyi3aykC7sN6g7oucFsntCLPFIdb%2BAs9Qt1%2B9LUs%3D&reserved=0>  and for Product Management: https://careers.shopee.sg/job-detail/139 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcareers.shopee.sg%2Fjob-detail%2F1395&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787342127%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=lxJbwE0rYa1NKK44RvpeHUdWeihIboBQG8rgPd2xcUA%3D&reserved=0> 5 

3. Shopee's Company-Led Training (CLT) Programme

 

Keen to launch your career as a Data or Business Analyst? Data sits at the core of Shopee's growth, as we seek out data-driven solutions in our everyday work. Our Analytics professionals sit in a variety of different functions from Marketing to Operations. They equip our teams with useful insights to drive the business forward. With Shopee’s Company-Led Training (CLT) Programme, you’ll undergo six months of training and receive guidance from a mentor to hone your skills as a Business or Data Analytics professional. Come and make history with us!    

 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcareers.shopee.sg%2Fevent-detail%2F426%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787352116%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=dAnv%2BpWO1UcakwXrsUHEabu4mwT5w%2BL%2FcA4cS0RkMWM%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Who should join?  

*  All final year students & fresh graduates may apply! 

*  Apply now! https://careers.shopee. sg/ event-detail/426/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fshopee.sg%2Fblog%2Fshopee-clt-programme%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C11b21d92846a4f5d39f308d9782d2edd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672957787362113%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=l%2F9PQwTQZosHR%2FUI2%2FBRWIURiUqKeSZ%2BZ1ctXb0AJB8%3D&reserved=0>   

 

Kind regards,

 

Davina Tham
Employer Relations
Career Development Centre

Subject: SUTD CHAMBER INTRO SESSIONS!
Body:
CALLING ALL BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED STRING PLAYERS! 

 

Join us in our intro sessions to learn more about SUTD Chamber. If you are interested in performing and trying your hand at a string instrument (Cello, Violin etc) well this fifth row is for you!

 

WHO ARE WE?

We are a group of tight-knit string players who have bonded over the love for both classical and non-classical music. 

 



 

WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT?

Look forward to making music together as a group, regardless of your music background!

 

Our last concert was Alma Mater, a combined concert with SMU’s Symphonia in February 2021 (Watch a Snippet here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfvuWnxBnEk). We explored pieces across a wide variety of genres: from classical music of Bach’s Air on G String, film music like Beauty and the Beauty and the Theory of Everything, to pop music such as Coldplay’s A Sky Full of Stars. 



 

 

We have exciting performance opportunities coming up, and we hope to see you join us for these events. If you are interested, mark the event details of our intro sessions in your calendars and see you there!

 





 

 

INTRO SESSIONS:

Dates: 22nd, 28th, 29th September 2021 

Time: 7.30-9.30pm

Venue: MR1 (Blk 61 ISH level 2, facing the field)

Additional info: No music background required! The seniors and experienced players will guide you through the basics of playing a string instrument (of your choice) and you can look forward to playing a simple piece as a group by the end of the session!

Note: Instruments will also be provided (But you are welcomed to bring your own if you wish to!)

 

WEEKLY SESSIONS:

Dates: Wednesdays 

Time: 7.30-9.30pm

 

Watch our intro video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfvuWnxBnEk

Subject: pls dont join CyclingGeng
Body:
Wassup yall, Tim from SUTD CyclingGeng here, SUTD's one-and-only (as far as we know) cycling interest group! 🚴‍♀️




As you can imagine, we generally like cycling (wow!) 😍




(we think, though we are probably biased, that) CyclingGeng is home to some of the fastest, loosest cyclists around. From dyed-in-the-wool aero KOM/PR hunters replete with taobao aero socks, to mountain bikers who absolutely rip trails in crocs, to the humble but ardent PCN singlespeed gravel bike warrior whom we keep stopping for on group rides, CyclingGeng has it all 🚴‍♀️




We love going fast, going far, and above all, being surrounded by an amazing, like-minded community that grows stronger each day. 🙌




If destroying Strava KOMs, clocking 100k round-island epic rides or going all-out down Ketam and Bukit Timah trail sounds like your kinda jam, you ain't far from home. ✌




If you believe that everyday should be legs day, and love the freedom, fresh air and friends that cycling gives, CyclingGeng is probably the place to be. Choose a flavour, grab your bike and don't stop rolling. ✨ 




If you click with everything you've just read, don't miss this chance to sign up for our Discover5thRows event, Tanah Merah Cycling Rip, here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F4HvcSm3Zfm&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2bf3df49715f4b4de06e08d978228c0c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672912179123172%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=JUcrsv7Rk%2FaPk7W6SO7P9YM5AYQckQ4Gd9jbMxK2%2FHk%3D&reserved=0> , where we take a spin down TMCR and have a good time. 🔥🔥🔥




However, if everything I've said does not make any sense, and you really don't like cycling, please don't join CyclingGeng. There are many other awesome fifth rows too. 💔




Tks and Rgds,

Tim - President & OG crocs mountain biker, @weeotim 

Fuo En - Treasurer & aero socks destroyer-of-strava man, @FeMan1999


Check us out at: SUTD CyclingGeng <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdcyclinggeng.carrd.co%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2bf3df49715f4b4de06e08d978228c0c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672912179133166%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=I%2B3EXtW0fAPI%2Fa8BrYSFmwEk4M76a9H%2B4zu82LhnTAw%3D&reserved=0>  
Follow us on Instagram at: SUTD CyclingGeng (@cyclinggeng) • Instagram photos and videos <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fcyclinggeng%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2bf3df49715f4b4de06e08d978228c0c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672912179143160%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=MeyspqYzMwId%2Ffb%2BKy8ahQlwyOcDwT1kh4gXF%2BUmDDE%3D&reserved=0>

👋  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femojipedia.org%2Fwaving-hand%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7c1211a86f4642363d0b08d9781f37b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672898428512192%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Txow709oIo7z%2BLm6gomcw4uyR0W4%2Ff7BS0GrIsJuteE%3D&reserved=0>  everyone,


 


 





 


🎉 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femojipedia.org%2Fparty-popper%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7c1211a86f4642363d0b08d9781f37b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672898428512192%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=GF5I6ZzBs1scp7QsdgSEwV6jlQFjPM2Mr3iZ7LBQvUg%3D&reserved=0>  We are back with our bi-monthly newsletter, Entrepreneurship Buzz, this September🎉 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femojipedia.org%2Fparty-popper%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7c1211a86f4642363d0b08d9781f37b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672898428522188%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QLlk%2BevWfhHj%2FPPoFyujYfndCBfB%2BMGRpnO%2BhV8xVO4%3D&reserved=0>  Find out more about the startups founded by SUTD graduates themselves and the many success milestones they have achieved so far 🤩 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femojipedia.org%2Fstar-struck%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7c1211a86f4642363d0b08d9781f37b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672898428522188%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ujCqufH2PRVeWAwfpQ8LoCrFUR3QMbtIjWJ2rwE4XDQ%3D&reserved=0>  We will also be sharing our current events and exciting upcoming programs, so keep yourself updated with what’s happening in our entrepreneurship ecosystem with us at SUTD Venture, Innovation & Entrepreneurship!


 

 

 

Kindest Regards,

Venture, Innovation & Entrepreneurship

 

Follow us at our social medias!

 

 <https://entrepreneurship.sutd.edu.sg/>       <https://www.facebook.com/SUTDVIE/>          <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutd.vie%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7c1211a86f4642363d0b08d9781f37b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672898428532184%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=s%2B6yu7sXHei%2BNN0%2B1PXAmgV42w7Gwgf0wpRIsje3RII%3D&reserved=0>

From: Lim Lee Cheng

Cc: Lim Lee Chen <leechen_lim@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:leechen_lim@sutd.edu.sg> >
Subject: Invitation to ESD Pillar Information Session (Fall 2021), 15 Sep 2021, 3.30pm (via Zoom)

 

Dear All, 

 

Welcome back, hope it was a good term break for everyone. 😊 

 

You will be choosing your pillar of study very soon and to prepare you for making this important decision, we would like to invite you to an Information Session on the Engineering Systems and Design (ESD) Pillar on 15 September 2021 (Wednesday), 3.30pm to 5.30pm on Zoom.  

 

At this information session, you will learn more about ESD. You will also meet our ESD alumni and their managers to hear about their working experiences and views about ESD Programme.

 

To register for the event, please scan the QR code below or alternately, click this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C70d59e49bdb04ae0c61908d97819530c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672872537264608%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=esBEJU%2FvsBTulX1D29jlKtYylQsIIapQJSXXicIY2nw%3D&reserved=0> . (Form requires less than 1 minute to complete).

 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C70d59e49bdb04ae0c61908d97819530c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672872537274605%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tAF%2BVbog3BIpW85tUf8km9hgRsVYxtbkANwPIkyoIxo%3D&reserved=0>

Best regards,
Lee Cheng

 

===

Lim Lee Cheng | Senior Associate (Undergraduate Studies) | Engineering Systems and Design

Subject: Scratch! DJ Intro Session
Body:
WHAT'S UP FRESHIES AND SUTDENTS

Do you find yourself bopping to the groove of your favourite music 🎧 ? Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the DJ's table 👀 ?

SUTD Scratch! is having an intro session to DJ-ing! We will be going over the basics of how to use DJ equipment as well as mixing tracks together live. No prior experience required! Simply fill up the sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPR24uD3WZ21BkLabbC4MqJJUQzVaOEdNRkw5TDQ2TUlBVlhKSk9KTzc0My4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C5000adf26c25461915db08d97812ebaa%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672845204729087%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=7aBemrmAThrciLqHqnsJ6IC4km1MXFwFcTjsvJ%2Bp05M%3D&reserved=0>  by 22 Sept 2359 and come on down! You can also join our telegram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FDgT-PSyMIrQ0MDE1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C5000adf26c25461915db08d97812ebaa%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672845204729087%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=l7XODr%2FxZR%2Bwp2uaouwBlhvrHaxOqBUBUkFR2TnzhbU%3D&reserved=0>  for further updates.

Session Details
29th Sept
6:30pm - 8:00pm
LT4 (Building 2, Level 4)

Subject: RE: Welcome(back) Home To SUTD!!
Body:
Hi SUTDents!


Did you guess it right?

 

On Monday, we launched an Instagram poll for you to guess the reason behind ROOT’s name. You were all very creative and we have received many interesting responses. Some say “Responsible. Open-minded. Objective. Trustworthy”, while some say “ROOT anchors the plant”.

 

Here’s the right answer. Drumroll please… 9 years ago, the first batch of seniors 

By studying the functions of the root of a plant, ROOT observes some similarities. 

 

Firstly, the root is the strong support of the plant. Similarly, the Student Government should be

the strong support for the student body, being able to give the necessary support to students when needed. Next, the root draws nutrients from the ground, which are necessary for the growth of the plant. Similarly, the Student Government aims to obtain the resources needed to cultivate a vibrant student life and school culture. Lastly and most importantly, the root is useless without the rest of the plant. Likewise, the Student Government would be meaningless without the students of SUTD.

 

Feel the passion to improve school life and serve the SUTDent body? Come join us! More recROOTment details will be sent in Week 4.

 



 

Best Regards,

 

Mohamad Arshad

 <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/> 

President

9th Student Government

Unwavering • Accountable • Collaborative

 

 

From: Student Government - President <mailto:president@studentgov.sutd.edu.sg> 
Sent: Monday, 13 September 2021 10:10 AM
Subject: Welcome(back) Home To SUTD!!

 

On behalf of the 9th Student Government, ROOT, 

Welcome back to SUTD for the new term and a very warm welcome to the Freshies to the SUTD Family!

To help you with your school term ahead, let me tell you 3 hacks to survive in SUTD! 

1.	Join the SUTD Family Telegram Chat <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/sutdfamily/>  because inside is full of genuine and helpful seniors who advertise events（jkjk it’s a platform where we share news, help one another and tell you when we have some Lost & Found)
2.	Join ROOT Announcement <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2FSUTDROOTAnnouncements&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C345938f3ad5e4cd3756a08d978125c7c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672842812021000%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=A2SSpcoIhxx1kA%2FRg%2FtrSBRAH7whykkoLRBMSofg0X8%3D&reserved=0>  on Telegram where official and important announcements from ROOT are released. 
3.	Follow our Instagram Page (@sutdlife <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdlife%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C345938f3ad5e4cd3756a08d978125c7c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672842812030988%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CCEKnJtyH3%2BWEVORRGu0ainB3zt%2FtZw6wn0V2258LX0%3D&reserved=0> ) because you’ll FOMO if you don’t. What are you waiting for? Follow now!

 

Check out our latest story and guess why we’re called ROOT instead of Student Council? Stay tuned~

 



Best Regards,

 

Mohamad Arshad

 <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/> 

President

9th Student Government

Unwavering • Accountable • Collaborative

Subject: ♔ Finale Tournament Sign-Ups: THE SUTD WEEK OF CHESS ♚
Body:
Hey all,

SUTD Chess conducted a Beginner Crash Course <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fvideos%2F1149125476&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998421806%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YfOBlOdndAfEPpzoVj17j8ke1ForRw0%2Bw72vS9Gi5Yk%3D&reserved=0>  yesterday for the SUTD Week Of Chess. We didn't manage to record the Club Player Conversations session unfortunately as the Crash Course went overtime, but those who did attend had a great time sharing different methods of game analysis.

The next and final event of the Week Of Chess is the Finale Tournament! The tournament starts at 8PM tomorrow, and the winner of the tournament will win a tournament-size chess set, with a cloth-backed vinyl board and full-sized wooden pieces!






To participate, follow these steps:

1.	Join SUTD Chess. Fill up the sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998431806%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kBdeFICy7axyc4mHaPdVH5XPP38soeEUnBOEiHhYxew%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. Make sure the details are accurate - any users in the tournament that cannot be matched to a submitted username in the form will be kicked after this timing.
2.	Join the Lichess.org team <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fteam%2F3-0-0-ke7&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998441799%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=TXeu%2BCO1z1QF%2FmMfFugK6PFfwOa6tr68wBW4%2FK0RUJ0%3D&reserved=0>  and then the SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fswiss%2FIYgrABpc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998441799%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CObalVudUz1HgczqP0UkItJQLBkCqrPdzggXBQUpT7U%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. You can find the password to join the team on Discord.
3.	Be in the Discord's <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998451795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=7keUucHkPZAPei1dWmzf%2Fnr3myLb49zge9JN12CJvLo%3D&reserved=0>  lounge voice channel by Sep 16, Thu, 2000, and have your webcam video and your screen shared for the duration of the tournament, to ensure fair play. You can find how to share your video and your screen on Discord here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.discord.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Farticles%2F360041721052-Video-Calls%23h_c5102ceb-10c0-46f0-abe4-f8efc2e39ee9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998461786%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=JeZS0TXUS2aW5QvT6h%2Fo7WUJGvVXXfu1MMasEI01dew%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Just want to watch the games? Yogesh, Jason, and I will be commentating on the games on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998461786%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=v8QpfrAJLiHTWaQ9fdqZavHgr%2BMVvNOkDcK7i4OMvQw%3D&reserved=0> .










However, as I was telling the participants in the Beginner Crash Course yesterday, I really think that you should join the tournament even if you don't think you will do well. Remember that ability in chess is not an indicator of intelligence - chess is just a game, and like any other game, one gets better by playing more and developing pattern recognition. Nobody is going to judge you for losing games - every single chess player has lost countless.




I only started playing last December, after being inspired by The Queen's Gambit. I lost every single game in my first tournament (NUS Invitational 2021), but it was still one of the best learning experiences I've had. Since then, I've managed to score a decent 5 points out of 11 games at the more recent Jurong Spring National Day Blitz Championship. The master has lost more games than the beginner has ever played, and the only way to get better is to put yourself out there to gain more experience. 




If you already signed up for the club and didn't register for the tournament, but have now changed your mind, you can use this form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fgi1FYyRFWn&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998471780%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=nHYZQtVYO%2BJehjNAAwuMbFyFbp2%2Bfu8tpLgx5k2YhCM%3D&reserved=0>  to register for the tournament now!




If you really do still feel not very confident about playing in the main tournament, you can join this beginner tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Ftournament%2FG5DxePik&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998481784%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=GcCiiW2sGnvPkkHKMFva0SNQFBkay%2F5qPFJTIkHoKIg%3D&reserved=0>  instead that runs at the same time as the main tournament. There are no prizes for this one - it's just a low-stakes way for you to get more experience.




Finally, if you've been impressed by the Week Of Chess so far, do join SUTD Chess by filling up this form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998481784%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=r94o6HK9Wwr4zird5k6ji4yy%2Bxqt2NaAjZpHl6TgjAY%3D&reserved=0> . We'll be conducting equally high-quality events and engaging our members throughout the term.




Much love,

Kyra <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fkyrawny&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cefb8c8f5a8e3468ef4f608d978073f00%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672794998491769%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jb06b5OuQhvaTc9R6pypvKOgI8g9xV0%2B%2F8%2FoxY9S6k4%3D&reserved=0> 




♕ President of SUTD Chess

♕ Vice-Chairperson of the Singapore Varsity Chess Alliance (SiVCA) <https://www.facebook.com/sivcaofficial> 

♕ Council Member of SGChess United <https://www.facebook.com/SGChessUnited>

Dear All, 

 

Welcome back, hope it was a good term break for everyone. 😊 

 

You will be choosing your pillar of study very soon and to prepare you for making this important decision, we would like to invite you to an Information Session on the Engineering Systems and Design (ESD) Pillar on 15 September 2021 (Wednesday), 3.30pm to 5.30pm on Zoom.  

 

At this information session, you will learn more about ESD. You will also meet our ESD alumni and their managers to hear about their working experiences and views about ESD Programme.

 

To register for the event, please scan the QR code below or alternately, click this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0ff03e8d1dbf4fe17a6208d978003b28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672765068455082%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hWNFqHDALGqVIbGxyW6g7ExSvJhOT9s9ez0AHy%2FMD%2FQ%3D&reserved=0> . Looking forward to meeting all of you (online).

 

 

Best regards,
Lee Cheng

Subject: Oka mentioned 10.020 Data Driven World (Fall 2021)
Body:
External Email – Do not click on any links or open any attachments from an unknown sender.

 

General , Students some of you are asking whether you can form team for 1D Mini Project from different groups. Subject: Dance DerivativeZ Freshie Trials
Body:
~~~~~~~ THIS IS A DDZ PSA ~~~~~~~





omg hello friends. if you don't know yet, you need to know now. slots are running out for ddz's freshie trials!!! ahhhhhh!!! so if you're still thinking to yourself, "dance looks pretty nice but..." no. there's really no time left. come sign up for our trials!! these are the dates left available:








trial dates:
~ 22 sept (wednesday)
~~ > session 1: 6pm - 8pm

~ 24 sept (friday)
~~ > session 1: 6pm - 8pm
~~ > session 2: 830pm - 1030pm


venue:
~ dance studio 1/2

attire:
~ yourself in some covered shoes (and long pants would be nice)

things to bring:
~ yourself, a water bottle, a towel, and an extra mask







sign up link (is a must): 
https://forms.office.com/r/zVGv9kXHSd <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FzVGv9kXHSd&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C592a55f8c5d44db9c28608d977ea3137%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672670317872536%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9O6bS%2FHeDnolLcsIdXQQNuodV%2FfQluYZXVGeE9H5fmo%3D&reserved=0> 


telegram group link (is a must too): 
https://t.me/ddzfreshietrials <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fddzfreshietrials&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C592a55f8c5d44db9c28608d977ea3137%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672670317882536%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=r6XyZyiO8obTg2wDJ8FdoOG1b%2BZTEFr%2BRUWk%2FblfDr4%3D&reserved=0> 




mini FAQ:
"do i need to audition to get into ddz?"
> absolutely not!! these are trials, not auditions!!
> these sessions are meant for you to experience dancing and training with the ddz family, and for you to take your first step into dancing/continue dancing with a lovely dance community
> it's just to get down and have fun,, really nothing scary hoho



if you've got any questions, feel free to ask us
~ matt @manutphua <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fmanutphua&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C592a55f8c5d44db9c28608d977ea3137%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672670317892527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9RxKGPX85%2BSs3Tmo2VqkoWVtQZg2Jbq5ZUdPJINrl1o%3D&reserved=0>  (on tele)
~ ashley @ashleytan01 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fashleytan01&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C592a55f8c5d44db9c28608d977ea3137%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672670317902524%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=H8Ehpd2x%2B3oxdIuT%2FOdSRDuQeE7%2BMa0xwLrmkGW062g%3D&reserved=0>  (on tele)

and if you haven't, follow us on instagram at
~ @sutd_ddz  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutd_ddz%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C592a55f8c5d44db9c28608d977ea3137%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672670317912519%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CMXYynyxB6Vjebu3R%2FZpHLzBHSYox5cSzBlmXko9Lmw%3D&reserved=0> 


see you real soon!! have an amazing midweek!!
with love,
the ddz family

Subject: 2022 CFA Institute Research Challenge Information Session | 15 September 2021
Body:
Dear SUTDents,

 

Always wanted to try your luck in the big leagues of Finance? Heard of the prestigious CFA Challenge and wanted to see what it entails? Look no further! There is an information session today that will let you know more about this challenge. Feel free to form your own groups and sign up for this challenge!

 

Thanks for reading and have a good week ahead!

 

Best regards,

SUTD Marketwatch Exco Team

Subject: Minions Introductory Sessions
Body:
Hey everyone! 😆 




Hope the new term has been well for you.

 

We are Minions, a group of students that organise welfare events for our fellow SUTDents, and we are recruiting! 

 

If you are someone who: 

- is passionate about bringing welfare to our SUTD community, 

- always wanted to try and learn more about event planning/organising, 

- simply hopes to spread some joys and love around SUTD, 




JOIN US FOR OUR ONLINE INTRO SESSIONS! 

👉  21nd Sept 2020 (Tue) 730 - 900pm 

👉  28th Sept 2020 (Tue)  730 - 900pm 

You will get to find out more about what we do and get a sense of the fun of event planning! 

 

Click here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FXY3TRMxKPqDXlAp2&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb501c195768d448afe2708d9778896ab%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672250863569939%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jkaMsMFUKKgTtgCqK81dh314OXGB3GgTG3SqcxO16U4%3D&reserved=0>  to join our telegram group to receive the latest updates on our sessions 🤩 We will also be there to answer any of your inquiries, too! 

 

Looking forward to seeing you there 😉 

Student Government - Welfare, Minions

Subject: Vocomotives Intro Sessions!!! 🎶🎶🎶
Body:
Do you enjoy singing or beatboxing?


Then Vocomotives welcomes you to our introductory session! We are SUTD’s very own acappella group, where we make music with only one instrument: our beautiful VOICES! 

 

We will be opening up two introductory sessions on the 21st and 23rd of September! 

 

Dates: 21st September (Tue), 

            23rd September (Thu)

 

Time: 8.45pm to 10.45pm

 

Location: Dance Studio 2

 

Because of the current situation, we are only able to host a limited number of participants for each timeslot, so do sign up before slots fill up!

 

FORM: https://forms.office.com/r/BbTWVEyMWz <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FBbTWVEyMWz&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7ad78b8dcd64428648f808d977865f62%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672241366134694%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NrExvxFTgyqTZ6OAxE8KGl8x83mciZzpXEvmpLfTSws%3D&reserved=0> 

 

SO! We are calling out to all singers, beatboxers! This is your time to shine! What are you waiting for? The Vocomotives family welcomes you! 

 

WE HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

 



 

Cheers!

Vocomotives

Subject: DAI Programme Talk - Tue 28 Sep 2021, 1pm
Body:
Dear Term 3 students,

Subject: Join our Freshie Trials!! FUNKy News VOL 2!
Body:
Hi! Do you tap your feet when you listen to music? Do you have a habit of skipping down the stairs? Do you always wonder how those tiktokers do the dance moves?

 

Join FUNKtion to unlock your dance soul! 💃🏼🕺🏻

 

We are a street dance FUNK club focusing on 🔒 LOCKING 🔒 and 💥 POPPING 💥 mainly. Most of our dancers have 0 experience in dancing and just started dancing in SUTD FUNKtion! The best part is, once you join our club, you will be a part of our FUNKmily, where we hang out, and do homework together and many more!

 

Soo.. WHAT IS FUNKTION?:

https://youtu.be/1VEstAdDTV0 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2F1VEstAdDTV0&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3c230d9b4b144e090fe608d977663e77%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672103570101720%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=7byRTCE7KiJLL31K8Eppg3GAya0ziQH9PgDjdMqZ0lU%3D&reserved=0>

https://www.instagram.com/sutd_funktion/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutd_funktion%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3c230d9b4b144e090fe608d977663e77%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672103570111705%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LBxAwFUoCtGpNp%2FhVCA00dU5kQGjAp4PjbjA2Cql5nk%3D&reserved=0>

20 September 2021,

7.30-9.30pm for all slots!

 

Join the telegram interest group for the sign up link or look out for our instagram page and email!

See You there!

 

 

Raymond Harrison

Subject: 🏹 Archery Club Recruitment 2021! 🏹
Body:
Shoot with us or we’ll shoot you! 


... Haha, jk.

Hi fellow SUTDents! Wanna shoot arrows and learn a cool sport?

Well, look no further! SUTD Archery is recruiting new members! We welcome both complete beginners who have never touched a bow before, as well as seasoned archers who want a place in the competitive team!

No experience is required! All you have to bring is yourself + covered shoes with comfortable attire! Equipment will be provided in the sessions.

Stay tuned for our “Fun Shoot” events, where you can take part in minigames and learn basic archery skills, held on:

22nd September (Wednesday) : 7-9 pm
24th September (Friday) : 3-5 pm
29th September (Wednesday): 7-9 pm

Venue: Multipurpose Hall (MPH)

Sign up for the funshoot event here: 

https://forms.office.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVkfDHjo0itPr7DN8hTI5dtUN0JRWlJNM1FRODdVSVJHM0hCUUE3OTQzNS4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fpages%2Fresponsepage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVkfDHjo0itPr7DN8hTI5dtUN0JRWlJNM1FRODdVSVJHM0hCUUE3OTQzNS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0bd76df6ed8e4dc289b508d97765fb63%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672102365918716%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=t%2F%2BySFWs7c1GD2vSt%2FkXEfPAYkKxaQSkIHtxon%2FFinY%3D&reserved=0> 
 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fpages%2Fresponsepage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVkfDHjo0itPr7DN8hTI5dtUN0JRWlJNM1FRODdVSVJHM0hCUUE3OTQzNS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0bd76df6ed8e4dc289b508d97765fb63%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672102365928710%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=3CiJWGQtOQQUOhTmMzEune3EEiwd366DmnuFhvM9q%2BE%3D&reserved=0> 
Fill | Discover5thRows: Archery Introductory Funshoot <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fpages%2Fresponsepage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVkfDHjo0itPr7DN8hTI5dtUN0JRWlJNM1FRODdVSVJHM0hCUUE3OTQzNS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0bd76df6ed8e4dc289b508d97765fb63%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672102365938696%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=zuNSWJRQEtkKWrK6elgyZfyIHrhwTwXdpmmD2PZ2RXs%3D&reserved=0> 
Sign-up process is as follows: 1. Opt-in to the session 2. Opt-in to receive e-mail responses so that YOU can keep track of what you have signed up for 3. Session organisers will e-mail you that you have been successfully registered for the session Organised by: SUTD Archery Get to try out archery in a fun and casual setting with minigames and small prizes! Important Information: - Dates and Times: Wednesdays - 22 & 29 Sep - 7-9pm                                Friday - 24 Sep - 3-5pm - Venue: Multi-Purpose Hall (Block 57, Level 2) Only sign up if you are able to make it for the session! Otherwise, someone else who might want to go for the session would miss the opportunity. Let's make this event friendly for all!
forms.office.com


If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us at archery@club.sutd.edu.sg, or simply shoot away in our Telegram group: https://t.me/joinchat/RsOU8ggo8sMP_OMI <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FRsOU8ggo8sMP_OMI&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0bd76df6ed8e4dc289b508d97765fb63%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672102365938696%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QGs2HqicRqswG51vBNC6j3iqvPh2nPo6o5zfT0o9F5E%3D&reserved=0> !

We look forward to seeing you there!

Cheers,
SUTD Archery

Subject: SUTD-AISG: Data Analysis and Visualization Workshop!
Body:
Dear SUTDents, 

 

Would you like to learn more about the vast world of artificial intelligence? Do you want to know where AI is applied, and how you can implement AI to make your life easier? Do you want to build great projects that leverage cutting edge AI solutions and boost your portfolio?

 

Then fret not, for SUTD-AISG is just the place to do all that!

 

From industry talks and sponsored industry mentorship programs to free AI courses and workshops, to working on projects and delving deeper into the world of AI by reading research papers, SUTD-AISG does it all!

 

Whether you are s beginner, or a full fledged AI expert, we at SUTD-AISG would like to invite you to join us in this learning journey of the magnificent world of AI!

 

Do join us at our SUTD-AISG DiscoverSUTD event for the Data Analytics and Visualization Workshop,  where we cover the basics of data analysis, and introduce the basic concepts of SQL and PowerBI dashboards!

 

Here are the session details:

Date: 29th September, 2021

Time: 6 - 8 pm

Venue: Think Tank 23

Snacks will be provided! 😊

 

Click here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F2qS5HGx4He&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce271c1e7a4324b84953708d977628bd0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672088030775992%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BbZymi4tsKuZNIK94RFUgX%2BHfgG9euXTE81XGQYiP%2Bg%3D&reserved=0>  to sign up now!

 

We hope to see you at our data analysis workshop! 😊

 

Do feel free to drop us a text on telegram @Anirudh181001 or @timtameater if you have any questions, or send us a mail and we will be happy to hear from you!

 

Cheers,

Anirudh Shrinivason

President of the SUTD-AISG Student Chapter

Subject: Invitation to ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session (1 October 2021)

 

Dear Freshmore Students, 

 

We would like to invite you to attend the upcoming ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session on 1 October 2021 (Friday) 1.30pm – 2.30pm. 

 

We will conduct the info sharing session via the 2 different modes – physical (at Lecture Theatre 1) as well as virtual (via Zoom). To comply with the COVID-19 measure, we can only accommodate 40 students in LT1. Please choose only one of the sessions (physical or virtual). 

 

During this session, you will get to hear from ISTD HoP and other faculty members. Please register and indicate the mode of event you wish to attend here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FLSp9WKgG3rkAy2wa9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ceca1d406a85f4225203e08d9775d7c57%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637672065860963540%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=rvC8qFQb0sPtOtl8ZcB%2FbHvG44suROetkhet6F9Z098%3D&reserved=0>  by 13 September 2021, Monday. 

 

For those who would like to attend the session virtually, please see below for the Zoom link. 

 

Topic: ISTD Info Sharing Session 2021

Time: Oct 1, 2021 01:30 PM Singapore

 

Join Zoom Meeting

https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012 <https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012>  

 

Meeting ID: 945 3819 5012

Best Regards,

Irma

FW: <INVITATION> Splash Awards 2021: Talent Showcase & Award Ceremony on 24 Sep at 12pm
Body:
Dear Students and Faculty,

 

Please see the warm invitation from Singapore Computer Society below for your registration and attendance at the virtual Splash Awards 2021 on 24 Sep 2021 at 12noon. We are glad to share with you that one of our Year 1 students, Long Nguyen Tan, is in the finals. Please give him your support!

 

Regards,

Hou Liang

On behalf of ISTD

 

From: Camilla Khaw [mailto:camilla.khaw@scs.org.sg] 
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 2021 10:38 AM
To: Tony Quek <tonyquek@sutd.edu.sg>; Seah Hou Liang <houliang_seah@sutd.edu.sg>; Norman Lee Tiong Seng <norman_lee@sutd.edu.sg>
Cc: Vivien Poh <vivien.poh@scs.org.sg>
Subject: <INVITATION> Splash Awards 2021: Talent Showcase & Award Ceremony on 24 Sep at 12pm

 

External Email – Do not click on any links or open any attachments from an unknown sender.

 

Good morning Prof Tony Quek, Hou Liang and Norman

 

Warmest greetings, and we trust that all is well with you!

 

We are grateful to SUTD ISTD and your strong support towards SCS and the Student Chapter!  

 

We would like to invite you, your lecturers and students to join us online for the Splash Awards ceremony on Friday 24 September from 12pm to 2pm.  We will be unveiling the winning entries and solutions for this year's competition themed How will Digital Intelligence & Cloud transform Singapore in a Post-Pandemic World?  Also, there are interactive fun online activities and the online audience will stand a chance to win the new Nintendo Switch (OLED model) and Starbucks Cards!

 

We are glad to share with you that one of the 12 finalist teams is from SUTD, and we would appreciate your help to rally your lecturers and students to support the team!

 

Register HERE <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsingaporecomputersociety.imail-host.com%2Fr%2F7a50796c4bc018c20b9f05aa1%3Fct%3DYTo1OntzOjY6InNvdXJjZSI7YToyOntpOjA7czoxNDoiY2FtcGFpZ24uZXZlbnQiO2k6MTtpOjQ5OTt9czo1OiJlbWFpbCI7aTo1NjM7czo0OiJzdGF0IjtzOjIyOiI2MTM4NjgwODY1OTQwNDQ4NDgwNDgwIjtzOjQ6ImxlYWQiO2k6MTg2MDE7czo3OiJjaGFubmVsIjthOjE6e3M6NToiZW1haWwiO2k6NTYzO319%26&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce3e1e77a4add41cfa30308d9774d406c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671995969140993%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NRBiM87P6uINaOENTHhftgfzTAUqqWfh%2BQUbVZEn1ik%3D&reserved=0>   before 22 September. Should you require further information, please feel free to email us at splash@scs.org.sg <mailto:splash@scs.org.sg>  

 

Once again, thanks for your support!

 

Best regards

Camilla Khaw

On behalf of Adrian Chye

Chairman, Splash Awards Committee

Singapore Computer Society

 

 

Dear XXX

Splash Awards 2021: Talent Showcase & Award Ceremony 
Friday, 24 September 2021, 12.00pm – 2.30pm
(Link will be shared in the confirmation email) 
Guest of Honour: Mr Tan Kiat How, Minister of State, Ministry of Communications & Information

  
The Splash Awards 2021 Finals and Showcase is here again!

 

We cordially invite you to attend and support the Splash Awards Talent Showcase & Award Ceremony on Friday, 24 September 2021 from 12.00pm to 2.30pm. What’s more, you can also invite your family members & friends to join too and engage in the interactive fun activities and stand a chance to win the new Nintendo Switch (OLED model) and Starbucks Cards! 


So join us online for an immersive experience at the Talent Showcase & Award Ceremony as we unveil the winning entries and solutions for this year's competition themed How will Digital Intelligence & Cloud transform Singapore in a Post-Pandemic World?

 

Take a peek at some of the finalists’ entries below:

*	TEAM CYBERFENCE: This is a cloud–based software solution which prevents online toxic behaviour and it assists schools and parents in educating students and children on cyberbullying.
	 
*	TEAM GOFRESH: It uses a unique combination of AI and AR technologies to visually analyse and make observations on plant’s health in real-time. With GoFresh!, growers are able to jump-start urban farming in Singapore.
	 
*	TEAM BRIGHTER FUTURE: This software analyses students’ facial expressions and behaviour during home-based learning and it helps teachers understand how students are responding to these online lessons.

Subject: RE: Invitation to the EPD Forum 2021
Body:
Dear students

 

Just a gentle reminder on the EPD Forum taking place tomorrow afternoon.

 

Updated the Zoom details in the preceding email.

Remember to login on the day of the event with the registered name and email address.

 

We look forward to seeing you!

 

 

Best regards

Cath

 

From: Ng Bee Hian Catherine 
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 2021 3:00 PM
Cc: Tan Mei Chee <meichee.tan@sutd.edu.sg>; Goh Bee Min <beemin_goh@sutd.edu.sg>; Nadia Johari <nadia_johari@sutd.edu.sg>
Subject: Invitation to the EPD Forum 2021

 

Dear students,

 

You are invited to join us for the EPD Forum 2021. We have an exciting lineup of programs for you as follows:

 

Time

Event

1.45pm 

Registration

2.00pm 

Opening Speech

Prof Chua Chee Kai, Head of Pillar

Engineering Product Design

2.05pm 

Keynote Sharing by Mei Ban

2.25pm 

Industry Panel Discussion

3.50pm 

Q&A Session

4.00pm 

End of Event

 

Participating companies for the event include Meiban, Royal Dutch Shell, AMD Inc, Tan Tock Seng Hospital and Dyson.

Hear from these key industry players from various fields on what they are looking for, how they work and what they do.

 

What’s more? Attendees will each receive a $10 GrabFood voucher. To qualify, simply RSVP (by Mon, 13-Sep) and login on the day of the event with the registered name and email address.

 

To RSVP and find out more, please visit:

https://epd.sutd.edu.sg/epdforum2021

 

Zoom Details:

 

Meeting link: https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/95663679468

Meeting ID: 956 6367 9468

Passcode: Forum.2021

 

 

Thank you and we look forward to seeing you!

 

 

Catherine Ng

Deputy Manager 

Undergraduate Programme

Engineering Product Development [EPD] Pillar

 



 

Singapore University of Technology and Design

8 Somapah Road. Singapore 487372.

 

D| [+65] 6499 4589                        

E|  catherine_ng@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:catherine_ng@sutd.edu.sg>       W|  epd.sutd.edu.sg

Subject: ♔ SUTD Chess: Beginner Crash Course and Club Player Conversations: Game Analysis TODAY! ♚
Body:
Hey all,


The 2021 Asian University Chess Championship ended on Sunday. If you missed the watch party, don't worry though - the best of the SUTD Week Of Chess is yet to come! Today, we'll be hosting two events - a Beginner Crash Course from 8pm to 9pm, and Club Player Conversations: Game Analysis from 9pm to 10pm.


To join the Beginner Crash Course, create a Chessable account <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fregister%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325401114%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CEwPFyOZSAW2SInOKI65hae6EAzXqBbll%2B79gxe3cBQ%3D&reserved=0>  and join the Chessable Classroom <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fclassroom%2Fkywa&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325401114%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=uff48rWCv2L8UiZUXx%2B4VeVI5RUOrum%2Fo4aVEZX9%2Bl8%3D&reserved=0>  if you want to participate actively! Join Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325411109%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=asIW%2B2utCJg3k5BpwP0pRiBjvKIEjh4Q2zbEutEYZJI%3D&reserved=0>  or Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325421103%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=rDm3nC6Nmf0EcUBONhRbBAwHniM2cIB%2B7rfv23TELUw%3D&reserved=0>  if you just want to watch.


To take part in the Club Player Conversations, Join the conversation on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325421103%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jIziZfY8pAZ9kavuCZCoORyydPF49J3wGFQggbGyNsc%3D&reserved=0> ! Or watch on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325431096%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=afSaNt1D3RwM1UsW8YWY64HaE39RNPv0XIqRENRJQpg%3D&reserved=0> , if you don't want to commit to joining the Discord.


If you'd like to just find someone to play friendly games with, come onto Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.com%2Finvite%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325431096%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=6Y0LlWh7NBK6vKJ9PrMKh26kGfP9ZHh5egCFy7cT%2BdM%3D&reserved=0>  and we'll try to match you up with another player.


Already sure you want to join SUTD Chess?
