Beginner Crash Course

Learn To Beat Your Family At Chess (Maybe)

 

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2100

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNDBpYTlqMGg4dTIycjNoNjUybTVkODk1OGsga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325551023%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=XpE3F35mNIprt6l1pxMLAZrdHWxgt%2FXzbg%2B6A9ZNL6c%3D&reserved=0> 

 

When most people say they “know how to play chess”, what they usually mean is “they know how the pieces move”. While knowing the rules is of course an important part of any game, there’s a lot more to playing chess than just moving the knight in an L-shape. 

 

But what if I told you that, in one hour, I can teach you enough about chess to beat most people? Just by learning some basic principles, you can bring your whole army into the attack, winning you more games - and perhaps you’ll even gain a greater appreciation of the depth and beauty that can be found in this game.

 

In this 1-hour crash course targeted at players ranging from “complete beginner” to “my parents taught me a bit when I was a kid”, I’ll be covering the rules of chess (with some fun historical trivia thrown in), basic opening principles, fundamental tactics like forks and pins, and some vital endgame techniques. While the lesson will be streamed on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325561018%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LCDm4t4ONu1tSFvs48tXXUeUWt%2Bstl3XYcaqsAwA64U%3D&reserved=0>  and Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325561018%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=HVgfHjXKqFLvbKkcJEDT03eDiO06ADwdOWpC5FezIlc%3D&reserved=0> , if you’d like to participate actively by guessing answers to the questions I’ll be asking, do create a Chessable account <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fregister%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325571019%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=J28ZAXnjDLbUNe1HNNaYdqI7a5BYVYCuq7RI8qBImq8%3D&reserved=0>  and join the Chessable Classroom <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fclassroom%2Fkywa&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325571019%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=V5iwzO%2Bdwn00Ba%2F5PUeJBxKVKKTQ9VvoZFMN00f9Bno%3D&reserved=0>  when the crash course starts. It’s a lot more fun and engaging than just watching me talk, and I highly recommend it.

 

If you find that you enjoy this and would like to learn and improve more, or if you’d like to host lessons yourself, do join SUTD Chess <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325581008%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NtKqJv7Ks2RLYn%2FNiXQmLhH%2B%2BjCnyqvfdcP5aVddlSg%3D&reserved=0> , because we have in-depth beginner workshops planned for the entire term.︎ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.office.com%2Fmail%2Fsentitems%2Fid%2FAAMkAGZhMGZmNjY2LWQwNTItNGJlYS1hMzFmLTcyNmRlYzg5NzY2NABGAAAAAAB%252FcqFrZctDRYq4hybsp5NXBwDBZvk9nQuIR4FfJBpb5%252BeVAAAAAAEJAABJFhoGofYQR4yGUXuWsMnuAAQ4lHrxAAA%253D%23x_Schedule&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325581008%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=N1qEYkTlwV%2BqmARNGSGTr%2F6ZX7hQNkyJ%2Bawd285HmQ8%3D&reserved=0> 

 

♙♙♙

 

Club Player Conversations: Game Analysis

Perspectives From And For Non-Titled Scrubs

 

Sep 14, Tue, 2100 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNGpham0yNWVsb3Nkdmw4dDlibzEzaHVxNTQga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325591005%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=uuGVayED7QqiO3vAIjJM9g%2FxTLiBrYsbZpbeVkGMsGU%3D&reserved=0> 

 

There are no titled players in SUTD Chess right now (unless IM Tin Jingyao decides to transfer from NUS). We’re just passionate adult improvers, wanting to find other chess lovers to play and grow with. So we’re not going to claim that we have the ability to conduct high quality workshops on advanced concepts like positional play or opening clinics - at least not ones that can surpass the immense amount of free content already available on YouTube made by actual GMs.

 

We can, however, facilitate conversations about the most subjective part of chess: chess improvement. It is so easy to find lectures on specific openings and endgames, but how does one actually go about using all these resources? There are no right or wrong answers to this question - as adult improvers, we are not likely to ever get a full-time chess-related job, so regardless of whatever methods we use to learn chess or however much time we choose to invest, the most important thing to remember is to make sure we’re having fun doing it.

 

Even then, it can be daunting to come up with a workflow or technique that works for you, especially from scratch. Club Player Conversations is thus not a lecture, but a sharing session for our members to learn how others enjoy and improve at chess, and perhaps find new ideas that they can incorporate into their own systems.

 

This session will be focused on techniques for game analysis. Jason and Yogesh, the two players who will be representing Singapore in the abovementioned 2021 Asian University Chess Championship, will each analyse a game that they played from the championship using their own personal methods. I will also share my method that incorporates an academic note-taking system I use for my PhD research, which links reference games together through notes on major themes and ideas. The last 15 to 30 minutes will be for open discussion among all attendees. The entire thing will be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325591005%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=oGAeivzYjUKd4XLyMUP6OhekPtky6QVYzQG7nSncyPs%3D&reserved=0> , but if you want to actively participate, do join Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325600999%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=vdG0ZEeo%2F8yH2ah7iBeaSSpgyrBwwd%2BVp5GtrCY7wss%3D&reserved=0>  where it will be hosted.

 

We plan to host Club Player Conversations for other topics like opening study and tactics training throughout the term, so do join SUTD Chess <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325610993%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=m5SnP5zVl%2FhlZRvdgXRptJSoE26vBDDmqUJjkK8JaR0%3D&reserved=0>  if you find this interesting and useful.︎ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.office.com%2Fmail%2Fsentitems%2Fid%2FAAMkAGZhMGZmNjY2LWQwNTItNGJlYS1hMzFmLTcyNmRlYzg5NzY2NABGAAAAAAB%252FcqFrZctDRYq4hybsp5NXBwDBZvk9nQuIR4FfJBpb5%252BeVAAAAAAEJAABJFhoGofYQR4yGUXuWsMnuAAQ4lHrxAAA%253D%23x_Schedule&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325610993%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=lEqRPezClOZQeJAsJYIsOP1YmUJGMBWAYJiJVHJa1U8%3D&reserved=0> 

 

♙♙♙

 

Casual Games

I Just Want To Play, Dude

 

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DMGNnbjdpZjlmMW11YXYyOHI1NXFxam1yazkga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325620987%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LBSQ4NahQNc1j3hSEPEJ0wFxcwaJm%2FK9bpISKfTyDuM%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Not super interested in the Beginner Crash Course or the Club Player Conversations? Tuesdays are also our regular online sessions, and on weeks without special events, we just meet up for games and hang out. If you’d like to find other people to play with, hop onto Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325620987%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0tVRnZNV9DCg10RqtAeYyNlGS5zPxIVTgEJVK326WOE%3D&reserved=0>  and we’ll try to match you up to other like-minded players. SUTD Chess isn’t just for hardcore players - if you just want a community to chill with and play low-commitment games with, we’d love to welcome you to join us <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccadd7c170c0c4d480ee808d97730dfdc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671874325630980%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=gPrDimlfqKFm%2BX2PICpCNDQR8SA0p0I3cQKnh5N9nWo%3D&reserved=0>  as well.




♙♙♙





See you tonight!




Best regards,

Kyra Wang


♕ President of SUTD Chess

♕ Vice-Chairperson of the Singapore Varsity Chess Alliance (SiVCA)

♕ Council Member of SGCHESS UNITED

Subject: Announcement DNS System Migration - 18 Sep 2021
Body:
Dear Students, 

 

We would like to inform you that there will be a scheduled Network Maintenance for SUTD Domain Name System (DNS) on 18th September 2021. During this maintenance, there shall be disruption to services availability as explained in the table below.

 

Date & Time

Affected Websites, Systems and Software

Impact

 

 

Date: 18th September 2021 to 19th September 2021

 

Time: 10:00 PM to 03:00 AM (Saturday Night to Sunday Morning)

 

 

Access From Internet, VPN and Within the Campus network (Wired / Wireless)

 

Systems

 

*	Graduate Employment Management System (GEMS)
*	Hostel Management System (HMS)
*	MyMobile System
*	Research Equipment Booking System (REBS)
*	SUTD Ed Booking System
*	Temperature Tracking System (TTS)
*	iBMS System

 

Websites

      

*	Admissions Portal 
*	Alumni Portal
*	Discovery of Exceptional Design Affinities (DEDA)
*	IT Service Desk Portal
*	Pillar Websites:

	*	ASD - https://asd.sutd.edu.sg
	*	ISTD - https://istd.sutd.edu.sg
	*	EPD - https://epd.sutd.edu.sg
	*	ESD - https://esd.sutd.edu.sg
	*	HASS - https://hass.sutd.edu.sg

*	Enhanced Access and Secure Entry (EASE)
*	Student Portal (MyPortal)
*	SUTD Website

*	SUTD Library

 

Services and Software License

 

*	Web Surfing / Internet Access
*	Connecting to the campus network via Wired or Wireless
*	Email Access
*	Network Drives: Home, Division and Common Shared Drives
*	Printing Services
*	NSCC Servers 
*	Software: Altium Designer, Arcgis,COMSOL,Coventor,CST, DesignBuilder

Matlab,Mathematica,MentorGraphics,Palisade,RobotStudio,Rhino

RhinoCAM,Solidworks

 

 

 

From 10:00 PM – 03:00 AM:

 

 

Users might experience intermittent disruption when accessing the services listed.

 

 

If you have any questions on this maintenance, please contact IT Service Desk at 6499-4500 or email: help-it@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:help-it@sutd.edu.sg> 

 

Thank you for your attention.

 

Best Regards,

SUTD IT Service Desk

(65) 6499-4500

Subject: IES:The Coding Tournament
Body:
Hello Fellow SUTDents, 


  

	“Scientists investigate that which already is; Engineers create that which has never been.” 

	- Einstein  

 

If you're looking to explore the ether, enrich your mind and engineer your destiny, then IES is the club to be! 




 

Who are we? Why should you care? 

 

IES stands for the Institution of Engineers, Singapore. Here at IES, we try to expose you to the latest technology trends through elaborate workshops and industry visits. Through IES, we hope to create a collaborative and supportive community of enthusiastic engineers who can come together to share their thoughts and ideas. 

 

If this interests you and you want to know more, then join us at our IES-SUTD DiscoverSUTD event, IES: The Coding Tournament.   

 










In The Coding Tournament, we will club you into teams to complete coding challenges centered around algorithms (please don't worry as we will first be teaching some basics). The competition has two rounds: the first round where you try your luck at solving some of the questions curated by our team, and then the second round where you, along with your teammates, are to come up with a coding challenge of your own to challenge other teams with! 🤯  

 

Mystery prizes are up for grabs for the winning teams of The Coding Tournament. 

 

Date: 24th September, 2021 

Time: 3 - 6 pm 

Venue: Online  

 

Here's the registration link! 

https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPe9AkARfAURCtSLMDgWfoFdUMTJWOTg4Q09KMEIwVEE2M0xFSEVNR0VLQS4u  

 

We really hope you can join us for the competition; you may find it useful for your future study or even helpful for your career interview! 

 

Join our IES-SUTD telegram group for more updates at: 

https://t.me/joinchat/f4Ts-AeVDhc4NWM9  

 

If you have any questions, please do contact our ExCo members directly at:  

 

Visshal Natarajan: @Visshal_Natarajan  

Jerry Feng Zhuoer: @Jerry_Feng_Zhuoer  

Kaveri Priya Putti: @kaveripriyap 

Xiang Siqi: @Siqi_Xiang  

Wang Yanbao: @smrwyb 

 

 

Warm regards, 

Visshal Natarajan 

(President of the IES-SUTD Student Chapter)

Subject: Mindsports Introductory Session
Body:
Hello Freshmore and SUTDents! 

Do you have a passion for game development🎮? Or do you just want to relax and play some board games🎲? If either of these piques your interest, join Mindsports today!

Get started on your game development journey with the Unity Basics Workshop for 6 weeks or join our weekly Board Games sessions for a wide variety of tabletop games. All sessions will be conducted online for the time being.

For more information, drop by our Mindsports introductory session the following Tuesday, 14th September at 8pm on Discord!

You can join our Telegram and Discord using the links below:

Subject: PLS for Data Driven World?
Body:
Hey fam 👋

Need help for Data Driven World? 3DC is holding weekly Thursday coding clinic sessions from 7.45pm-9.30pm.

During the clinic sessions, students may drop-in with questions that they have or follow long with our topical review. If your question has been answered, feel free to leave as you wish.


Every week, apart from Q&A, we will also be doing a topical review of the previous week's content. 


For example, next week, we will be covering Week 1 content such as Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort and Why we're trying to optimize (space/time complexity) as well as helping students to firm up their python fundamentals. 



If you are unsure if it's for you, you probably should drop by anyway.


We have a maximum capacity for 25 pax at the i3 lab but, do sign up anyway because we will be taking questions, and summarizing weekly topics on the private telegram chat.




Feel free to telegram me if you have questions, see you!



Regards,


Raphael Yee

President, 3DC & SUTD-Google DSC Lead


raphael_yee@mymail.sutd.edu.sg 


 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Frphly&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cc0ec66038b934dd6c72c08d976bc331b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671373041758453%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Vu1E%2BFcRx4t2OAQNtlLZckLXAOVnCMeZPjDW8gcMSJc%3D&reserved=0>  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fraphaelyee%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cc0ec66038b934dd6c72c08d976bc331b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671373041768445%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=EPfaA1sMsI9W5UrxxxhkhTmyVFc8wqePIc5RgdF7yx8%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: [Launch] Project Renal - Rotaract Club x NKF
Body:
Hello SUTD Family! 


Over the past few months, we have been working behind the scenes on a special project, and we are finally ready to share with all of you what we have been up to! We are excited to let you know that SUTD Rotaract Club has partnered up with The National Kidney Foundation (NKF) to bring you Project Renal. 








Through Project Renal, we aim to cultivate a healthier lifestyle within the community by promoting kidney health. Over the next few weeks, we will be starting a series of informative posts on the importance of kidney health on our Instagram page <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Frotaractsutd&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdc78762a2d4f46ef2b3508d976b76cf2%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671352692241699%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Mxk2d1OXBDsN9jst%2FugGWVk2S7vyzg1d1xF0gNj4HHM%3D&reserved=0> . Apart from this, we will be releasing an interactive Instagram filter that you can try out with all your friends, so keep your eyes peeled!


Additionally, we’ll be placing 5 eye-catching kidney standees around the SUTD campus next week that you would not want to miss. Try to spot all of them and tag us on Instagram once you do!


Stay tuned for our next email in October, where we’ll be releasing more details about an upcoming webinar regarding kidney health, and a fundraising campaign where all profits will be used to support needy patients in need of dialysis and alleviate their financial difficulties. 


We hope that you will enjoy the campaign and learn more about one of the key players keeping our bodies healthy!








About The National Kidney Foundation (NKF):

NKF has been a pioneer in providing affordable, sustainable, and quality renal care and education for Singaporeans for over 50 years. To find out more about the work they do, feel free to visit nkfs.org <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnkfs.org%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdc78762a2d4f46ef2b3508d976b76cf2%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671352692241699%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kB4QIhmQy4cp95QElMRClOnZS2Vd%2FUF9CJThYpTotgU%3D&reserved=0>  for more information.


Cheers,

Rotaract@SUTD | Fellowship Through Service

https://rotaractsutd.github.io/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Frotaractsutd.github.io%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdc78762a2d4f46ef2b3508d976b76cf2%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671352692251706%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=M8UAxvOU4Xc7rJdvyxlEKtuzTSxM6SjxRiQH0kIoTzw%3D&reserved=0> 

https://www.instagram.com/rotaractsutd <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Frotaractsutd&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdc78762a2d4f46ef2b3508d976b76cf2%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671352692251706%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=EQjeluz1P0BfGkAo3HIWx%2B1b5n60Eyq5Aw7BnFCHjgM%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: ⚙️ MECHD Virtual Introductory Session! - 16th Sept 9pm -10pm
Body:
Hi Freshies and SUTDents! 

 

🧊 Do you love creating 3D printable models? 📦 

🖱  Want to develop a Computer-Aided Design (CAD) skill? 🖥️

⚙️ Mechanical Designer Club (MECHD) is here to show you how! 🛠️ 

 

 

In MECHD, we offer workshops on SolidWorks and Fusion360  - from beginner to advanced. So it doesn't matter if you're new, everyone is welcome to join! In addition, we also organize CAD competitions and certification exams for you to train and hone your skills!

 

Curious to know more? 

Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPRLkhYYN7CJBlLXVXUDbKexURUhSUkFRQ1RVUlgyQ1o1VklEQzdPRkVUQy4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9754d96a13954f50669b08d976b337ed%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671334653561948%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9xebujL0NiLbTJYtxyX%2FsnvDBx175FpWTjyOvHVMpkw%3D&reserved=0>  to register your interest or scan the qr code down below and join us at our virtual introductory session this Thursday, 16 Sept from 9pm to 10pm to find out! You can also join our Telegram group <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FHIkK0t_7Y-VgSNz1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9754d96a13954f50669b08d976b337ed%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671334653571955%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=lDiCA%2BV401ieKwj229dMvQxR8x%2FY2Dc6cOaIr0AQluE%3D&reserved=0> ! 




 




See you then! 

 

Best, 

MECHD

Subject: SUTD Wellbeing Survey
Body:
Hi SUTDents! 👋



🎉🎉 HAPPY DAY 1 OF A NEW TERM!!  🎉🎉

To our term 3 and 6, Welcome back to SUTD!

and to our Term 1, Welcome to the start of a new chapter in life and the SUTD Family!

 

As always, ROOT loves to hear feedback from students to improve student life. 

Hence, together with management, we are inviting you to fill up our Wellbeing Survey on Academic Life & Campus Facilities. 

This also follows up to Spring 2021 DSM (Minutes released on 6th Aug 2021), you can also access it here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdrive.google.com%2Ffile%2Fd%2F1ShFbnD_RFBAlYY9VqskMIHw4XGnOGj5B%2Fview&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce8d43d333c9f4c4bfc5408d97697d9e1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671217048336010%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hl%2Bu1TPVJ%2FXTdjiK8BmRAhA7SsqoItrJF2ghsunQ4%2Bg%3D&reserved=0> .

 

As this is a long survey, 💵 we will be giving out GrabFood vouchers to 20 lucky winners.

Well-being Survey closes at 

📆 19th Sept 2021, 11.59pm.

 

🔗 tinyurl.com/SUTDWELLBEING2021

 

We look forward to hearing your honest feedback through the survey that enacts the change for the future batches of SUTD. 

Thank you!

 

On behalf of the 9th Student Government, ROOT

 

P.S. This survey is not open to Term 1 students. Don't worry, there will be many opportunities to voice out your feedback in the future, do keep a lookout for them.

P.P.S. For those who have filled it up, you are automatically in the run, you do not have resubmit a new response. 

 



 

Best Regards,

 

Mohamad Arshad

 <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/> 

President

9th Student Government

Unwavering • Accountable • Collaborative

Subject: SUTD Tchoukball Intro Sessions 2021!! 
 

Hello, Freshmores and SUTDents!

 

Want to try out a new sport with your friends and classmates in your first term or looking for a way to keep fit and have fun? Then look no further!

SUTD Tchoukball Club🤾 will be hosting Open Sessions for two weeks where we will open our doors to SUTDents interested in finding out what Tchoukball is and joining our Tchoukball community! 

Here’s a sneak peek of our activities!!!

 

SUNIG and other external competitions like Beach Tchoukball (Yup we have both guys and girls teams!)



 

Overseas Bonding Trips (Pending ala COVID)



 

Post-training suppers, special event (CNY and Christmas!) gatherings, bonding/training camps, and many more!! 



 

What are you waiting for? Join our tele chat (https://t.me/joinchat/tuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FtuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce66c42023b9e4e8cd03108d9769754ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671214945278272%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2OXGst7iwWQLX9dIEzA%2Bz69fWXXVZe4M8U%2FGgFegui0%3D&reserved=0> ) and sign up for our exposure sessions now through this form! (https://forms.office.com/r/h47ymKAeMf <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fh47ymKAeMf&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce66c42023b9e4e8cd03108d9769754ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671214945288265%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=H1Iwmej033VkB0nxuGfxTwD7Q32TxEYXxd0oFd%2BlZ4w%3D&reserved=0>  )

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fh47ymKAeMf&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce66c42023b9e4e8cd03108d9769754ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671214945288265%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=H1Iwmej033VkB0nxuGfxTwD7Q32TxEYXxd0oFd%2BlZ4w%3D&reserved=0> 
Fill | SUTD Tchoukball Intro Sesh 2021! <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fh47ymKAeMf&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce66c42023b9e4e8cd03108d9769754ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671214945298260%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=iNOul5AZJ%2FER%2BnSZuYQvK5bYrnAsj%2Br%2F13KrwYlpIj0%3D&reserved=0> 
Hi Freshmores! Are you looking to join a Fifth Row with a tight-knit community and pick up an interesting new sport at the same time? Look no further! Join SUTD Tchoukball at our introductory sessions to learn more about Tchoukball and make new friends at the same time! No prior experience is needed! Important Information: - Dates: 16th, 21st, 23rd & 28th September 2020 - Time: 8:00pm - 9:30pm - Venue: ISH 1 If you have any enquiries, do feel free to reach out to us on Telegram: Ken Zho (@Zhooh, President and Boys Captain) / Sumi (@sumibloop, Vice President and Girls Captain). Do also join our Telegram group for updates! https://t.me/joinchat/tuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1  Only sign up if you are able to make it for the session! Otherwise, someone else who might want to go for the session would miss the opportunity. Let's make this event friendly for all!
forms.office.com

Subject: [Additional call!] Virtual Freshmore Asian Cross-curricular Trips (FACT) Programme 2021 – Application closes 22 Sep 2021!
Body:
<https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FTcQ2rbjwTt&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C39646fb6c3d642a2648008d9769673fd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671210914403152%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ars%2FzQVwEzfoS%2FpeZke5QUY1WukMcmKy9w3Kaa5boRk%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Hi Freshmores!

 

We’re delighted to announce an additional application window for our virtual FACT Programme 2021! Students who have missed out on our previous application may take this opportunity to join us in this unique learning experience.

 

The programme available for application is as follow:

 

*	Global Humanities: Literature, Philosophy and Ethics @ Universiti Brunei Darussalam, 25 – 29 Oct 2021 (WK7 Recess Week)

 

*Note: Only students who are taking the Humanities core (Global Humanities: Literature, Philosophy and Ethics) this term may apply.

 

Application page is accessible by clicking the image above or via this link HERE <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPV6FOZ6rAldIhkbFiPtiNs5UOUpSOVk0NFRTQkNZREozQTRJOU5EWU9QMS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C39646fb6c3d642a2648008d9769673fd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671210914403152%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=lH%2BVRZLGpPDeN6ExGBuHrhB5zkVU1fLSSjaP3xX2pTc%3D&reserved=0> . Application will close on 22 Sep 2021, 23:59hrs.

 

Please note:

- The programme available for application is a virtual programme. All participants will receive a certificate of achievement at the end of the programme. 

- Priority will be given to Term 3 Freshmores. However, Term 1 Freshmores are most welcome to apply too!

- Students who have submitted their Acceptance of Offer for this programme in previous round of application need not apply again.

 

A video by the leading Faculty of the programme, Dr. Nazry Bahrawi, is also available for viewing via this link  HERE <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdapac-my.sharepoint.com%2F%3Av%3A%2Fg%2Fpersonal%2Fglobal_sutd_edu_sg%2FEfhiDV81BgBPjG5gClAVeu4B0zMFXKaQKdymgKpSf8YI-w%3Fe%3DdDwXlk&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C39646fb6c3d642a2648008d9769673fd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671210914413141%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=maazC4dzSeXywCZbTNx7MG86b4BtN0jtL%2BCSnIOLLYI%3D&reserved=0> . Watch the video to learn from Dr. Nazry on what the programme has to offer!

 

For more information on the SUTD FACT programme, visit our website here <https://sutd.edu.sg/Global/SUTD-FACT> . For enquiries, feel free to reach us at global@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:global@sutd.edu.sg> .

 

We look forward to your applications!

 

Best regards,

 

Office of International Relations 

Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD)

Subject: SUTD Wind Ensemble DiscoverSUTD Introductory Session 2021
Body:
Hi SUTDents!

 

Are you a veteran BANDit seeking to relive nostalgic music?

 

Or maybe you’ve been wanting to try out a new instrument for some time?

 

Fret not, whether you have experience or not, SUTD Wind Ensemble welcomes all! 

 

We will be having two separate introductory sessions to facilitate catering to those who are already experienced and eager to jump into playing, and those who are interested in picking up a new instrument! 




Session 1 (for those who are already experienced):
- Date: 21 September, Tuesday

Session 2 (for those interested in picking up a new instrument):
- Date: 23 September, Thursday

 

Time: 7.30pm

Venue: Music Room 1 (2nd floor of Grandstand, facing the field)

(time and venue are the same for both sessions)

 



Do sign up with this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPcVmOzs8gXRHlgrZCloTjT5UNzBDSkpIUERZNFNDM0JHNkI1V0wwVUZQNC4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C1a98d268cb45408a6be508d9768ba504%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671164586354143%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=b9q2Dn3c3sCl3udNcS9%2B0EOGT2ubIqRq77uSxK23MDw%3D&reserved=0>  ASAP as we have limited capacity and join our Telegram group chat here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FKNDWwl4khIAxNDY1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C1a98d268cb45408a6be508d9768ba504%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671164586354143%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bgESff7KIWWvvFhl03hfKBVm0KM4XAjJ6jV3JmjMko8%3D&reserved=0> !




Thank you and have a great week!

Subject: OCIF Announcements 03/2021 - Crowd Control Measures to the Canteen on Weekdays 11.30am to 1.30pm
Body:
Dear SUTD Community
 
Due to the Safe Management Measures (SMM), please note that we will be carrying out crowd control in the Canteen during peak hours (Weekdays 11.30am to 1.30pm) with effect from 13 Sep 21. During this period, the following measures will be in placed:
 
1)	Service access door (from the service lobby) into the canteen will be closed and access will only be from the front entrance (Campus Centre Lobby E);
2)	Security personnel will be deployed at access point to manage access to ensure that the canteen capacity meets SMM requirements; and 
3)	SMOs will be at hand to ensure staff and students comply with SMM requirements.

This arrangement will remain in place until further notice. 

We seek your understanding to keep our campus safe. Stay safe and take care.
 
 
 
Regards, 
Leasing and Venue Management Team

Subject: Ensign Launch of Technical Graduate Programme
Body:
Dear Students, 

 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fensign.global%2FEnOpenHouseTGP&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdd63106b6ff84927914308d97687035e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671145566772215%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ydh4OsMMAHdXaL6Q1PXFVlAuXTbFRz%2BotYri000AgFU%3D&reserved=0> 


Ensign is launching our Technical Graduate Programme (TGP), with our first intake planned for 2022.  

 

We are a cyber company with warmth and soul. We are ambitious, propelled by our vision to be the cyber defender of choice, and fueled by the dedication and camaraderie of individuals who are eager to make a difference, and leave their footprints in the industry.

 

We seek to cultivate the next generation of Cybersecurity leaders through this programme. 

 

Join us to find out more about our TGP! Interact with cyber professionals from our FOUR different business units and learn more about what we do.

 

Date* :

Session 1 – 20 Sep 
Session 2 – 22 Oct

Time :

20 Sep – 9.30am – 12pm SGT

22 Oct – 1.30pm – 4pm SGT

Format*:

In-person or online

* The in-person session is only available to the first 30 successful registrants for each session. Subsequent registrants will be eligible for online participation. You will receive a confirmation email on your format of participation.


REGISTER NOW TO SECURE YOUR PARTICIPATION




 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fensign.global%2FEnOpenHouseTGP&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cdd63106b6ff84927914308d97687035e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671145566782225%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=vOm%2F3TH5OBtsyygmFISXbx%2FkPdhHqVZ1Dvi42GjM%2Ba0%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Taal Intro Session!
Body:
Heyy SUTDents!

 



 

Taal Indian Dance Club has organized an intro session for the incoming freshies and all other students who want to know more about the Bollywood dance culture while having loads of fun. There will be exciting games and a simple dance routine 🕺🏽 💃🏽

 

We welcome anyone – regardless of race, gender, or skill level – to join! 

 

When ⏱ and Where 🛵?

21st September Tuesday (7:00 pm to 9:00 pm) – DS1 and DS2 (Blk 61, Lvl1)

23rd September Thursday (7:00 pm to 9:00 pm)  – DS7 and DS8 (Blk61, Lvl2)

Anything that you feel comfortable in!

Subject: SUTD NihonGo! Intro Session 2021
Body:
Hi Freshies (and anyone else interested to join us), 

Hope you've been enjoying orientation as well as your first day of school so far!

Looking for a place to share and discuss about your interests in Japanese culture? Or are you someone who's just started taking an interest in topics like Japanese music, foods or games?

Then look no further! SUTD NihonGo is SUTD's Japanese Culture Club, and we welcome people curious or knowledgeable in all (Japanese culture-related) topics from learning the language to board games like shogi to memes based on current trends and events. (In fact, here have this meme)




If all this sounds like your cup of tea, and/or you want to find out more, join us for our intro session, next Monday (20 Sep) 8-10 pm at Think Tank 18 (Building 2, Level 2, outside canteen)! Do register at this link by this Wednesday 9 pm if you're planning to come: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVK04m4na3FKgEl0HcQtR5NUMDBXS1BEUkNFNU1CVVVKRE1WWktRREIwMi4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPVK04m4na3FKgEl0HcQtR5NUMDBXS1BEUkNFNU1CVVVKRE1WWktRREIwMi4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C070c45075d5b48faa6fc08d97682b825%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671126413493383%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2mWJMO3efTyFWQCnnm7q6hl%2BSx6%2FN%2F1GWaOLutr6fa4%3D&reserved=0> 

Also, feel free to join our Telegram group (even if you can't join the intro session): https://t.me/joinchat/xrrA_jHl5aFmMTk1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FxrrA_jHl5aFmMTk1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C070c45075d5b48faa6fc08d97682b825%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671126413503376%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bOh04FRNW0JRSL3L0PgpZMqgu3%2BftIsGxJBGL4K2C90%3D&reserved=0> 

Hope to see you around! :) 




SUTD NihonGo! Executive Committee 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sutd.nihongo/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutd.nihongo%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C070c45075d5b48faa6fc08d97682b825%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671126413513367%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=m7Aqb%2FfwCWIk%2F%2FsCinhoqVAoKKiGQp3dGUGgiRcIU8o%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: EXCLUSIVE BANDSCAMP 2021
Body:
🎤 Mic Check 1, 2… Is this thing on?

 

HEY Freshies!

 

Always wanted to take your passion for music to the ⭐️ big stage ⭐️ ? 🎸🥁

Or maybe share your love for music with other like-minded and talented people? 

 

SUTD Bands is the perfect fifth row for you 🤩

We’re looking for passionate individuals who love making music to join us. No experience or auditions required!

 

If this sounds like your jam, come join us at our official freshie induction camp, SUTD BANDSCAMP 2021.  We’ll share all you need to know about SUTD Bands, play some games and make amazing music with your talented batch mates :) Be sure to bring your instruments and equipment to hostel to jam with your friends too!

 

📍 Where: Virtual (Link will be sent later!)

🕐 When: 25th September, Saturday, 2-6pm 

🎒 What to bring: Your unique music tastes and your undying love for music 🤘

 

Sign up for SUTD Bandscamp 2021 now using this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPXVVhj-PHDBGmpgREr3QUxZUNldERktVMDFNWUxRSTVBWFI4VlEyUFdESC4u%26wdLOR%3Dc80836FC9-3409-4C24-AC49-FE45E01B175C&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C6c5f574228864bf3495008d9767f2ee2%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671111162487891%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=VreHlm3SM4344qXvS7Q%2FzB0ade4mnBu9OtPE7Iyjink%3D&reserved=0> !!!!



If you have any burning questions, feel free to pm me on Telegram @mehganeiii
p.s. rmb to follow our Instagram @Sutdbands , we’ve got plenty in store for this term :D

 

Regards,
Megan Lee
Vice President|Admin
SUTD Bands

Subject: Invitation to ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session (1 October 2021)

 

Dear Freshmore Students, 

 

We would like to invite you to attend the upcoming ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session on 1 October 2021 (Friday) 1.30pm – 2.30pm. 

 

We will conduct the info sharing session via the 2 different modes – physical (at Lecture Theatre 1) as well as virtual (via Zoom). To comply with the COVID-19 measure, we can only accommodate 40 students in LT1. Please choose only one of the sessions (physical or virtual). 

 

During this session, you will get to hear from ISTD HoP and other faculty members. Please register and indicate the mode of event you wish to attend here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FLSp9WKgG3rkAy2wa9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C840d0dd020644aa5a96b08d9767f352a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671111047294434%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=vhOYaGHZKzzlvhjIoFpn8RBiV%2FjTigB6PGlf9INz%2B34%3D&reserved=0>  by 13 September 2021, Monday. 

 

For those who would like to attend the session virtually, please see below for the Zoom link. 

 

Topic: ISTD Info Sharing Session 2021

Time: Oct 1, 2021 01:30 PM Singapore

 

Join Zoom Meeting

https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012 <https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012>  

 

Meeting ID: 945 3819 5012

Passcode: 4Va4z**5

 

Best Regards,

Irma

Subject: Regarding an Instagram account
Body:
Message Classification: Restricted

 

Dear SUTD Students,

 

1)            It has come to our attention that an Instagram account called "SUTD confession" is posting inappropriate contents and spreading false news and/or allegations about our students.

2)            The university is investigating the case and will take appropriate action against the owner of the account/contributor of the inappropriate contents.

3)            We are appealing for students to come forward if you have information about the owner/contributor. You may provide information to registrar@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:registrar@sutd.edu.sg>  

4)            As a member of the SUTD community, we are expected to maintain the University’s standards of responsible demeanour in both the academic and non-academic aspects of University life. For more details, please refer to the Student Conduct & Social Responsibility Policy on  MyPortal <https://myportal.sutd.edu.sg/psp/EPPRD/?cmd=login&languageCd=ENG>  > University Policies > Student Conduct

 

Yours sincerely,

Sitoe Yew Kok

Registrar

Subject: Makerspace Club SUTD Introductory Session 2021
Body:
🛠️🛠️✨Hello Freshies and SUTDents!✨🛠️🛠️





Looking for a place to participate in cool projects both software and hardware? Interested in being part of a maker community?




Then SUTD's Makerspace Club is here for you! Bring your tinkering dreams come to life as here in Makerspace we make anything and everything. No matter how big or small, be it hardware, software or crafts, Makerspace provides it.




We will be holding our Introductory Session this coming DiscoverSUTD 2021 and would like to invite anyone interested in maker culture to come and sign up! Create your very own personalised stationery holder and learn more about Makerspace and the future projects we have in store for you!




More importantly, we are also looking forward to brainstorming about ideas that YOU have for projects that we can work on future!
















Details 

Week 2, 24th Sept (4:25pm - 5:30pm) 
Week 3, 29th Sept (3:25pm - 4:30pm) 
Venue: Think Tank 26







Sign up here for Makerspace’s Freshmore Introductory Session:

Subject: <Important> Personal Information Update in MyPortal
Body:
Dear Students,

 

Throughout your candidature, you are responsible for keeping your personal particulars (including official/preferred name, identity card / passport details, addresses, contact numbers, citizenship and emergency contact details) updated in the University’s records. 

 

For changes in name, citizenship, identification card / passport details, marital status or national services status, please produce the original identification documents (note: the original re-entry permit together with the identification card for students who convert to Singapore PR) and photocopies to the Office of Student Administration within 5 working days of the effective date of change of the respective personal particulars. 

 

For changes to other personal particulars such as addresses, contact numbers and emergency contacts, please access via MyPortal directly. The University will not be accountable for delayed or lost communications due to incorrect or obsolete addresses and contact numbers.

 

Thank you.

 

Regards

Eileen LIM

Associate Head Registrar Services

Office of Student Administration

 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/> 

T: +65 6499 4642

Subject: DDI Seminar on Machine Learning for Sustainable Building Design - 15 September 2021 at 4pm SGT
Body:
Dear all,

 

You are cordially invited to join the Data-Driven Innovation Lab seminar on Machine Learning for Sustainable Building Design and Real Estate Development. Please register here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPQx1gnHA9rtFvR7iAWd84ZFURUxCUFZPSFgyQzVCWFdFR1NTSklUS0E0WS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cc3e03ff50ead4ed81c9708d9766dedcf%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637671037746733209%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=rUovlYu9CKcPp7gKCaBSH26I2JMWekPGKqakBj0x%2BPo%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Date: 15 September 2021, Wed, 4pm, SGT

Title: Machine Learning for Sustainable Building Design and Real Estate Development

Speaker: Sayjel Patel, Co-Founder and CTO, Digital Blue Foam

 

Zoom Link: https://sutd-edu-sg.zoom.us/j/98162774168?pwd=UWNhMTVlQXZFaTkyejhLMG1Rd2ZIQT09 <https://sutd-edu-sg.zoom.us/j/98162774168?pwd=UWNhMTVlQXZFaTkyejhLMG1Rd2ZIQT09> 

Meeting ID: 981 6277 4168
Passcode: 594143

 

Title: Machine Learning for Sustainable Building Design and Real Estate Development

 

Speaker:
Sayjel Patel

Co-Founder and CTO, Digital Blue Foam

Singapore



 

About the Speaker:

Sayjel is Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer of Digital Blue Foam — a software startup creating ML-powered tools for the sustainable urban design and real-estate development, and a founding Assistant Professor of the Dubai Institute of Design and Innovation. Previously, he was a researcher with the SUTD Digital Manufacturing and Design (DManD) Center, where he developed “Voxel Harvest'' an award-winning 3D printing design software, and the MIT Digital Structures Research Group, where he developed new computation methods for generating performative of textures and microstructures using 3D scan data. Sayjel holds a Master of Architecture from MIT (M.Arch ‘15) and an Honours Bachelor of Architectural Studies (HBAS ‘11) from the University of Waterloo.

 

Synopsis: 

The building construction industry faces an existential crisis. It is one of the least digitized industries and the world’s leading producer of C02 emissions. With rising temperatures around the globe and mass migration to urban centers, there is a dire need for a digital disruption that will enable more sustainable ways of working. 

How can we accelerate the building industry's transition to carbon zero to meet strict and urgent climate targets?  

In this talk, Sayjel will present his entrepreneurship journey as a co-founder of Digital Blue Foam; a Singapore-based software company pioneering a variety of ML-powered tools for sustainable building design. He will share a variety of recent projects, experiments, mis-fires and inspirations, as well as the story of his transition from academia to the start-up world.

 

We look forward to seeing you at the seminar!

 

Best Regards,

SUTD Data-Driven Innovation Lab | https://ddi.sutd.edu.sg <https://ddi.sutd.edu.sg/>

Subject: Welcome(back) Home To SUTD!!
Body:
On behalf of the 9th Student Government, ROOT, 

Welcome back to SUTD for the new term and a very warm welcome to the Freshies to the SUTD Family!

To help you with your school term ahead, let me tell you 3 hacks to survive in SUTD! 



1.	Join the SUTD Family Telegram Chat <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/sutdfamily/>  because inside is full of genuine and helpful seniors who advertise events（jkjk it’s a platform where we share news, help one another and tell you when we have some Lost & Found)
2.	Join ROOT Announcement <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2FSUTDROOTAnnouncements&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C49eeffdbcf424afb040108d9765baf7f%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670958867768301%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=8Cq7EVS4KnIMDxqTfmBUTVJmYdPXvimjBO3T4g6CsNU%3D&reserved=0>  on Telegram where official and important announcements from ROOT are released. 
3.	Follow our Instagram Page (@sutdlife <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdlife%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C49eeffdbcf424afb040108d9765baf7f%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670958867778288%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=P0cHIWb3a99MVEvvH%2FSYF35QBTXaNpWHaMnSUqsZ4%2BY%3D&reserved=0> ) because you’ll FOMO if you don’t. What are you waiting for? Follow now!

 

Check out our latest story and guess why we’re called ROOT instead of Student Council? Stay tuned~

 



Best Regards,

 

Mohamad Arshad

 <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/> 

President

9th Student Government

Unwavering • Accountable • Collaborative

Subject: Design Odyssey (DO) DiscoverSUTD Workshops
Body:
Hi SUTDents!!!

 

Ever had an idea for a solution to benefit the society, but you don't know where to begin? How about having a dream to help those who really need help in our midst, but you do not know how to help them? 

 

Well, Design Odyssey’s (DO) DRIVE program is that one thing you can look forward to if you do not know where to start! Haven't heard about us before? You might be wondering, hmmm why such a complex naming?  It's simple! DO is the place where you are guided to uncover the root causes of the problems where you want to be the spark for change. A unique program by DO , DRIVE is where you can learn to Discover, Define, Develop and Deliver innovative solutions that help improve our society and the environment! 

 

Join us for 3 different workshops during the Discover SUTD season to get a taste of what you can look forward to doing in DRIVE! You will also get a chance to meet like-minded individuals with whom you can share ideas and collaborate, while also getting a head start and insight into design thinking! We will also be answering all your questions about us :) So what are you waiting for? Join us now and stand the chance to receive UglyFood ice cream vouchers 🥳!!!!

 

Workshop 1: Introduction and Induction to Design Innovation

 

Date: 17 Sep 2021 (Friday)

Time: 3pm-5:30pm

Venue: Zoom

 

Workshop 2: Introduction and Induction to Business 360

 

Date: 24 Sep 2021 (Friday)

Time: 3pm-5:30pm

Venue: Zoom

 

Workshop 3: Introduction and Ideation

 

Date: 1 Oct 2021 (Friday)

Time: 3pm- 5:30pm

Venue: Zoom

 

Sign up now for the workshops here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fpages%2Fresponsepage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPTtI_CxEKk5Atq9WZiRjmXdUNzdTTkxPWVVIOFlDWTVKVkg4R1VTUFVEOS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C77b522e959c0439fb70008d9765ad2ad%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670955028846714%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=iw93oGRWMjktFazouzd03QU8cKWWuCIPialDD60S6FI%3D&reserved=0>  😊! Hope to see y’all there!!!

 

Curious to know more about DO and DRIVE? Check out our video here: https://youtu.be/jrvaNGuXen4 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FjrvaNGuXen4&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C77b522e959c0439fb70008d9765ad2ad%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670955028856713%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Cg09CoWD1KEHgDBVji06%2BkiVJ07iikgVIwgIE3z0qdo%3D&reserved=0>  😊 😎 😊 !!! 

 

Do also join our TELEGRAM GROUP here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2F7JBQMnY_frNkMTE1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C77b522e959c0439fb70008d9765ad2ad%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670955028866701%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yZsAoHwbdFwBl1nJJjbLbjJDEglNRK5o33JVhNVAhgE%3D&reserved=0>  and follow us on INSTAGRAM @designodysseysg <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fdesignodysseysg%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C77b522e959c0439fb70008d9765ad2ad%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670955028866701%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=aPc6dh5MLr2VYW9IxrIjj%2BlqylU8fErElrUQ%2BZePQsQ%3D&reserved=0>  to be updated on upcoming events!!! 

 

 



 

All our best,

Design Odyssey Team

Subject: Korean Language Enrichment Club Introduction Session
Body:
IF YOU:

*	Want to watch the latest videos 📺 of your idols 💃🕺 but can’t wait for the fansubs to be released
*	Have been reading Tower of God 👼 religiously despite a certain trashy character that starts with R 😈
*	Enjoy binge-watching K-Dramas, Variety Shows and wondering if you can radiate 💥 that inner ENERGY 😩 and not be embarrassed by it?

 

Then WELCOME! KLEC is a club for like-minded students to come together and learn more about the Korean Language & Culture

 

🔻Find out more about us at our Introduction Session! 🔻

Subject: EV Club Intro Session
Body:
Hey SUTDents!



Interested in exploring the future of automotive design? Ready to build something awesome with your hands, and then drive it?


Or maybe you are already a diehard automotive fan with posters of the legendary Lamborghini Countach. Perhaps you love next-gen EV tech (Tesla Model S Plaid? Rimac Nevera?)

  

Regardles whether you're just getting your first taste of electric vehicles, or already consider youself an expert, come join SUTD EV Club's Intro Session and our Go-Kart building workshop for an awesome introduction to the automotive world and a taste of what our club offers!







Go-Kart Building





SUTD EV Intro Session <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FcgprAhxy03&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C860af303c5aa4f2ed03108d97654481a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670927063247042%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2k1gzjdXO9VS%2BvcVT4NO%2FX8QNzrDR2wkk4PifH2NHSY%3D&reserved=0>

Feel free to contact our friendly members on Telegram should you have any burning questions!

Subject: The Great IEEE-SUTD Challenge
Body:
Heyloo, SUTDents! 🥳

If you're looking to learn more about hardware and software (hybrid, if you will) fields and gain exposure to the industry, SUTD-IEEE is for you! 

From industry talks to company visits and lecture series to workshops that aim to expand your knowledge in the dynamically changing digital world, we at IEEE-SUTD would like to invite you to join us in the journey of sharpening our tech skills. 

Join us at our IEEE-SUTD DiscoverSUTD event, The Great IEEE-SUTD Challenge, where we'll be having our IEEE-SUTD introductory session with a brief introduction to Arduino IDE and an Arduino Uno microcontroller demonstration followed by the Arduino mini-hackathon!  

Mystery prizes are up for grabs for the winners of the mini-hackathon! ✨

Here are the session details!
Date: 17th September, 2021
Time: 4 - 6 pm

Here's the registration link!
https://forms.office.com/r/aU68CTU9N5  

We hope to see you at our mini-hackathon! 🙃

Cheers,
Kaveri Priya Putti
President of the IEEE-SUTD Student Chapter

Subject: INTRODUCTORY SERIES: BASIC SKILLS PACKAGE

Subject: Important Global Humanities class change
Body:
Dear students,

I hope that your term break has been restful. Earlier this week Zhenxing Zhao wrote to you about our Global Humanities course. Due to a scheduling change, the course administrators have moved you into my section for the course. Due to Covid restrictions, our section of the Global Humanities course will take online this semester.

Our section will meet each Thursday from 4-6 pm online. Here is the recurring Zoom link for our class below. Please save this link, since we will be using it every week.



Join Zoom Meeting 
https://sutd-edu-sg.zoom.us/j/97537945409?pwd=bkZ5R2xPc1RyaHJ0Wk5WMXhGRi9sdz09

Meeting ID: 975 3794 5409
Passcode: 204414

I'm looking forward to getting to know each of you this semester, and look forward to meeting you on Zoom this Thursday.

warm best,

Rhema


Rhema Hokama

Assistant Professor of English Literature

Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences

Singapore University of Technology and Design

Subject: Welcome to the Ballroom!
Body:
Hello everyone! 

Looking to experience novel dance steps? Or wondering how people dance as a pair without tripping over each other?

SUTD Ballroom is having trial sessions for people to experience social dance. We welcome people of all backgrounds and school terms as long as you have a pair of shoes (not flip flops) and comfortable clothing.

Our trial sessions are designed progressively with various dance steps that you can expect to learn, hence no dance experience is needed!


When: 
17/9/21 (Fri) 7:30PM-8:30PM (foundations with our coach, Terrence)
22/9/21 (Wed) 7:30PM-9:30PM (foundations + waltz)
24/9/21 (Fri) 7:30PM-9:30PM (foundations + tango)

Where: Dance Studios 3,4,5 (Blk 61, Lv2, above ISH 2)

Attire: Free and easy, comfortable covered shoes

Form (required): https://forms.office.com/r/YyvPe4zNJ6 (https://forms.office.com/Pages/DesignPage.aspx?auth_pvr=OrgId&auth_upn=ballroomdancing%40club.sutd.edu.sg&lang=en-US&origin=OfficeDotCom&route=Start#FormId=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPYnZF3giT2dBrNMTv0iKgrNUOVZPT1dIOThaWDZPVFJIS1M5WTgzRjZFUy4u)

Once again, thanks for your interest and we hope to see you at our practice sessions!






Warm Regards,

SUTD Ballroom Dance Club

Subject: Introducing SUTDiving +DIVE TRIP TO LAZARUS ISLAND!!
Body:
🌊🌊  Hey SUTDents and Freshies!  🌊🌊

 

🐙🐡🐠 Ever wondered what it’ll be like to swim with the fishes underwater? 🐙🐡🐠

 

SUTDIVING is here for you! Here you can obtain official scuba diving licenses issued by PADI, which will be valid for life! 

 

WHAT DO WE DO?

We normally organise 3D2N trips to Tioman, Malaysia at least once a term for you to get a license, at discounted prices. AND, our club doesn’t actually have any 'members', so there is no regular meet ups. If u are interested in learning how to dive, just sign up when we publicise for an upcoming trip and that’s it! With COVID-19 the past year, we had to put our dive trips on pause BUT!!!! 

 

We are now organising LOCAL DIVE TRIPS TO LAZARUS ISLAND!! 🎉🎉

 

The dive trip will be on 23 Oct 2021 and 24 Oct 2021! For students, that will be the first weekend of the recess week for Trimester 3 (Terms 1, 3 and 6)! 🌊🌊🌊

 

 

 


 

 

The details are as follows:

 

Open Water Course:

Trip Price

$570

What is included:

• PADI Open Water Course material

• E-learning and Pool training session

• Full Set of dive equipment for the trip

• Boat Transfer, tanks and weights

• Dive instructor / Dive Master

• Drinks and light refreshment (base on covid restriction approval)

Insurance:

Travel and Dive insurance NOT included

 

What is the itinerary for the lead up to the trip and trip itself?

 

Week 3, 1st October, Friday (6:30 pm - 9 pm): 

Trip Briefing + Briefing of PADI E-Learning*

 

Week 5, 16 October, Saturday  (9 am - 4 pm):

Confined Pool Session@SUTD Swimming Pool*

What to expect

• 200 meters swim test (any stroke)

• 10 minutes tread water

• Confine water skill

What to bring

• Swimming Attire

• Swimming Goggles

• Toiletries & Towel

• Drinking Water

*Dates and location tentative for now, but participants will be informed closer to actual event

 

Week 7, 23 -24 October: 

Day 1

0800 hrs – Meeting at 31 Marina Coastal Drive. Singapore 018988

0815 hrs – Departure from Marina Coastal pier 

0845 hrs – Arrival at Lazarus Island 

0900 hrs – Dive briefing

0930 hrs – Dive 1 

1130 hrs – Dive 2

1300 hrs – Clean up and depart to Marina Coastal Pier

Day 2

0800 hrs – Meeting at 31 Marina Coastal Drive. Singapore 018988

0815 hrs – Departure from Marina Coastal pier 

0845 hrs – Arrival at Lazarus Island 

0900 hrs – Dive briefing

0930 hrs – Dive 1 

1130 hrs – Dive 2

1300 hrs – Clean up and depart to Marina Coastal Pier 

 

 

What are you waiting for!! Sign up at the link below ⬇⬇ or scan the QR code in the poster

https://forms.office.com/r/bbfg71byj2 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fbbfg71byj2&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca52881fe64374091d31308d975e546ec%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670450190021859%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Lx5pUdyuUMuiyrMNitWAXQSZOw9BVElJDiU5025EnS0%3D&reserved=0>  


 

Feel free to contact us at this email, or telegram @rebbyling if you have any questions!! Feel free to join our new telegram group here: https://t.me/joinchat/C_y4InjydXs4Yzhl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FC_y4InjydXs4Yzhl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca52881fe64374091d31308d975e546ec%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670450190021859%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=XK3Qfr0TMGMZoeqtHZ2O208BVmPADFZHwghj7HXgSjY%3D&reserved=0>

SUTDiving 🌊 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FC_y4InjydXs4Yzhl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca52881fe64374091d31308d975e546ec%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670450190031855%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ZJfZ3Xhhp%2B4BVVA7TrduO45e%2F2xLlz2oZgjdDpoTddw%3D&reserved=0> 
t.me


 

Take care and hope to see you at Lazarus Island!!

 

Rebecca Ling

Subject: SystemaSUTD Introductory Session
Body:
Hiya all Freshies and SUTDents!



Looking for a taste of an Internal Martial Art – one that helps us develop an integrated body, mind and spirit, not just in combat, but also in our day-to-day lives?



Well, look no further! Here at SystemaSUTD, we practice self-defence in a way that is non-destructive, relaxing, and flexible! Cnctema (or Systema) is a form of Russian Martial Arts, there is no fixed technique, but only one ingredient - you! (and passion WOOO!!)

 



 

Come join us in our introduction session to experience this unique martial art! Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fpages%2Fresponsepage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPfcjM0UhyDFLnRSxA40xLP9UREw2VldVMjFJRlpQRVFZQ1JJQ1g5MFVDVi4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cadd2d3877aa940fa9ff508d975c4f594%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670311374203806%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hY8l5SFYnlb96IQJXho5URf464gMh%2BkcgBhVCO9QSR4%3D&reserved=0>  and keep yourself updated by joining our Telegram group!!

Some details: 

*	Date: 28 September 2021
*	Time: 7pm to 8pm
*	Venue: Zoom 

 

SIGN UP HERE:

https://forms.office.com/r/pD3QxL8yny <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FpD3QxL8yny&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cadd2d3877aa940fa9ff508d975c4f594%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670311374213796%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=r%2FHTojlMnf%2FoQHtjUNrf%2FzWXup8Pdscc%2FNb59VV%2B3Mk%3D&reserved=0> 

KEEP ME UPDATED! (Telegram grp): 

https://t.me/joinchat/bBbMcyoavj5kYjg1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FbBbMcyoavj5kYjg1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cadd2d3877aa940fa9ff508d975c4f594%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670311374213796%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=qw0HXd9bEXCwoR5vTlNEnx8ClvOT0TNjXq8MuSfKy4s%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: ✨ SUTD Chinese Orchestra Introductory Session - Come Join Us! ✨
Body:
Hi Freshies & SUTDents!

 

SUTD Chinese Orchestra (SUTDCO) will be having our very own introductory session happening on the 24th of September (Friday) and 27th of September (Monday)!

 



 

📅 Session details (choose 1) 

🕒 24 Sep (Fri) 3.00pm - 4.15pm 

🕟 24 Sep (Fri) 4.30pm - 5.45pm 

🕕 27 Sep (Mon) 6.00pm - 7.15pm 

🕢 27 Sep (Mon) 7.30pm - 8.45pm 

 

 

📍 Venue 

Music Room 1 

(Located on Level 2 of Block 61 Sports and Recreation Centre, near the grandstand, facing the running track)

 

 

About SUTD Chinese Orchestra (SUTDCO)

Since its formation in 2015, SUTDCO has been involved in many internal and external engagements, showcasing an eclectic mix of musical pieces of various styles and genres.

 



  

If you are

🌟 interested in joining a community of passionate musicians  🌟

👥 looking for opportunities to perform in an orchestra/ensemble/solo  👥

🥁 keen to learn a musical instrument 🪕

then join us for this introductory session!

(Due to the current COVID-19 measures, trying out of wind instruments is not allowed during this intro session)

 

 

Sign up for a session through the link below or by scanning the QR code in the poster!

https://forms.office.com/r/KsvSqJ6JLY <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FKsvSqJ6JLY&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C216bf800c7b2463a8d5408d975bc01ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670272781270403%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ZhxQtyI9xjSxWj8RKh7XlR0CAsWE%2BkKG1XhMzXP3zqo%3D&reserved=0> 

Join the Telegram group for updates: https://t.me/joinchat/WZVW_IQ0h6YzYzVl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FWZVW_IQ0h6YzYzVl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C216bf800c7b2463a8d5408d975bc01ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670272781270403%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CD2etvVSGXiq9zxuk0SLXgblXvb7xHp4q%2BXBdtLVH3U%3D&reserved=0> 

 

 

Sign-ups close on 20 September 2021!

Due to safe distancing measures, each intro session is limited to only 7 sign-ups. 

Don't miss this opportunity and indicate your interest early! 😄

 

 

Our weekly practice days and timings

Mondays 7.30pm - 9.30pm (CO sectionals / combined rehearsals)

Tuesdays 7.30pm – 9.30pm (percussion sectionals)

 

 

Drop @lowryan or @kewennnnn a DM on Telegram if you have any other enquiries.

Thank you, and we hope to see you there!

 

 

Warmest Regards,



SUTD Chinese Orchestra (SUTDCO)

Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/sutdco/>  | Instagram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdco%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C216bf800c7b2463a8d5408d975bc01ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670272781280397%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=GfU2gET%2FAtwhzz6MuYijhcHmr2wJ7LNhS5Y5%2BmdKlvg%3D&reserved=0>  | Youtube <https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2Bxe_qiMAeBSzBZFXAQNSg>  | Website <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdco.opensutd.org%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C216bf800c7b2463a8d5408d975bc01ff%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670272781280397%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YlthT9bcRtRE7fljismlQbYx%2Bs50thCc2ZmJPNCSZWo%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: SUTD Modern Visual Media Circle Intro Session!
Body:
HELLO SUTDents!


Are you passionate about drawing or art? Have you always wanted a space to learn?

Then SUTD MVMC is the club for you! 


SUTD MVMC offers the time and space for artists and illustrators from any background, experience, or styles to share their art with others, and learn from one another. Traditional or digital art, experienced or beginner, everyone is welcome to join!!


---
JOIN OUR INTRO SESSION


Do join us at our intro session where we will share more about the club and what we do. You will also get to design, draw and bring back your own Japanese Ema charm (example pictured above) during the session!

Date: 24th September
Time: 4:30pm - 5:45pm
Venue: Think Tank 18

Subject: ♔ DAY 3: SUTD Chess Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party ♚
Body:
Hey all,

The final day of the 2021 Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party starts today at 2pm! Join us on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034515886%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2FXeV2x4MUsB36Pn0y9rqve9t0NK0MA8XpSaHp1tJIf0%3D&reserved=0>  (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034525881%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=eT5RTWbp2HmlN7BZ9w5uMzSrPFR9Wj6vQfwL4oye03c%3D&reserved=0> ). We had one of our most exciting games <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fvideos%2F1146335032&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034525881%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=fSRc7ZB2fkwzQy2om%2B7%2BdZP%2BI1c4Ei3IX5ZWRoyjimY%3D&reserved=0>  yesterday, with a massive comeback made by Yogesh even when he was down an entire bishop!

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fvideos%2F1146335032&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034535876%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9cnAAfv1IbQ7RAcX1TUUVRm03SIvX5CqcMZuvEu2sKk%3D&reserved=0>  

NEVER RESIGN: Most exciting game of AUCC 2021 Day 2 - sutdchess on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fvideos%2F1146335032&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034535876%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9cnAAfv1IbQ7RAcX1TUUVRm03SIvX5CqcMZuvEu2sKk%3D&reserved=0> 
sutdchess went live on Twitch. Catch up on their Chess VOD now.
www.twitch.tv

We had a great showing yesterday, with Jason now at 2.5 points and Yogesh at 2 points. Come support our team as they fight in the final three games!


2021 Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party

Support SUTD, Support Singapore

 

Sep 10, Fri, 1400 - 1745

Sep 11, Sat, 1400 - 1745

Sep 12, Sun, 1400 - 1745

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DN2k5ZTZ2dmtpcWpiaWxrdDlydnBkMmNtczBfMjAyMTA5MTBUMDYwMDAwWiBreXJhd255QG0%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com%26scp%3DALL&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034545867%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=n27SH5BUwd6e2yczjQ6%2B3ylphWCdBbD63Bcax16Wu7Y%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Two of our best players, Jason Peng and Yogesh Shelgaonkar, will be representing Singapore at the 2021 Asian University Chess Championship over the next three days. I will be hosting a watch party on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034555864%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=KB8c1OsE47%2B3Zu%2BKginy3Fgp597D62OEjT1n%2Bfv1Rks%3D&reserved=0>  for all three days (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034555864%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9%2F1AU%2FtCE3nzjtcjbIC133X%2BRZrcirw9Pj2TZ2syqgo%3D&reserved=0> ).

 

Drop in whenever you like, and support our members as they play against the best varsity players in the region: cheer together when a brilliant winning move is made; groan together when a not-so-brilliant blunder appears on the board. 

 

Come and get a taste of the tournaments that you could take part in if you join us <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034565853%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CFi2ghmglR%2BE5wcSXT%2BmBJx0PLmnRgPhEBVBsMwDHHk%3D&reserved=0>  - or just come for a good time chilling with and supporting friends. Bring snacks.

I Just Want To Play, Dude

Not super interested in the Beginner Crash Course or the Club Player Conversations? If you’d like to find other people to play with, hop onto Discord and we’ll try to match you up to other like-minded players.

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DMGNnbjdpZjlmMW11YXYyOHI1NXFxam1yazkga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034645816%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Fd0mtaoMu%2BnAXculOpYT2uwqOXxxfU0C3U%2FZxDjDn3E%3D&reserved=0>
