SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament

The SUTD Week Of Chess ends with a bang, in the form of a 4-round Swiss tournament! The tournament will be held on Lichess.org, with a time control of 7+5. Games are not rated, so don't worry about losing rating.

 

The winner of the tournament will win a tournament-size chess set, with a cloth-backed vinyl board and full-sized wooden pieces!

Sep 16, Thu, 2000 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DMjZuMnBjbG40Zm1qNnJrNGM5Y3FvMm42am8ga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034665814%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=pnL7A80mpqoWx3pZJPIO9XM9Qe9kKL2hReJkT5rmCWI%3D&reserved=0> 

1.	Join SUTD Chess. Fill up the sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034665814%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QQjHzssbVgaPuFpF7250u%2FGeFS9upKAErgLzHLjlHwA%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. Make sure the details are accurate - any users in the tournament that cannot be matched to a submitted username in the form will be kicked after this timing.
2.	Join the Lichess.org team <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fteam%2F3-0-0-ke7&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034675800%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=vn%2BCoQ4Zz0IQxBsiIMbsxYPpD8zPwCYfF8yHZTv55nM%3D&reserved=0>  and then the SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fswiss%2FIYgrABpc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034675800%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4yAwA%2BKjzscqyqgCz4zRc5U9w4kbdlYrrERZQsQhiKI%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. You can find the password to join the team on Discord.
3.	Be in the Discord's <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034685807%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2BG8CkopcnULftuyToFygmBpG8Pv308JphVvdJXIpsgs%3D&reserved=0>  lounge voice channel by Sep 16, Thu, 2000, and have your webcam video and your screen shared for the duration of the tournament, to ensure fair play. You can find how to share your video and your screen on Discord here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.discord.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Farticles%2F360041721052-Video-Calls%23h_c5102ceb-10c0-46f0-abe4-f8efc2e39ee9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cba559899de8646391f0308d975ae4b4c%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670214034695792%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Uq2G3EhDujvwU5CBSNo6dESPttFch2OjCMKPlPzxvZQ%3D&reserved=0> .

Best regards,
Kyra Wang


♕ President of SUTD Chess

♕ Vice-Chairperson of the Singapore Varsity Chess Alliance (SiVCA)

♕ Council Member of SGCHESS UNITED

Subject: Learn to design, build and fly drones!
Body:
Hi SUTDents! 

 

Are you interested in joining a maker club related to aerospace and aeromodelling?

Do you want to learn about Multi-Rotors and how they fly?

Ever did robotics in Secondary/JC/poly and wish robots could ascend into the third dimension instead of being confined to the ground?
If your answer to any of those questions is yes, then look no further! Multi Rotor SUTD is one of SUTD’s only aerospace and robotics related multi-disciplinary 5th row. 

By joining Multi Rotor SUTD, you can gain a wealth of knowledge and many maker skills that will help you throughout your journey as a SUTD student.

 

Multi-Rotor SUTD is holding its annual 5th row introductory session! Join us to learn about the club and what we do.

This intro session is also an introduction to drones. You will not only get to learn how they fly, but also how we design them. 

Sessions will be held on Tuesday Evenings, 7-9PM.

 

Slots are limited so if you are interested, do sign up <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FVqz5iaWgps&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca991540c354647d4a6c108d97595c470%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637670108561635859%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hcTZIrcjJiIghUTm7Fjn7MRzAsEibYAkZ2iLSFgV6g0%3D&reserved=0>  now!

 

We hope to see you there! :)

 

Never giving you up,

Multi-Rotor SUTD

Design Build Fly

Subject: [SUTD CDLH] DIY First Aid Kit Workshop
Body:
Hello SUTD!!




Are you unsure of how to react when a friend or family member is injured? Seeking to learn essential life-saving skills?




In SUTD CDLH, we conduct first aid workshops, provide first aid coverage for school events, and work with NGOs to provide aid in humanitarian relief missions. 




Find out more about us in our upcoming DIY First Aid Kit workshop, and get to bring back home one of your own! (Limited slots, hurry!) Sign-up link as follows: https://forms.office.com/r/g6bXnNsjF1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fg6bXnNsjF1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb9f41ea78fc446dd745408d9752e0006%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669662773469704%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QZsDa%2BjiDlT9uvfn%2BrX9RLh3NZatKqWBaajpk%2FnHeIM%3D&reserved=0> 




Date: 27th September 2021

Time: 7.30-9pm

Venue: Think Tank 26 (2.514) 

To bring: Just your interest/ passion / curiosity :-) 




We hope to see you there! 🦁




P.S. Our socials:

Telegram group: https://t.me/joinchat/Uf7wiwMBPAP9-Zdw <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FUf7wiwMBPAP9-Zdw&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb9f41ea78fc446dd745408d9752e0006%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669662773479700%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=u3khQOPOND3hoj5MIFxlTn3jYblSQR%2FTqg%2FlXlhnE18%3D&reserved=0> 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sutdcdlh/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdcdlh%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb9f41ea78fc446dd745408d9752e0006%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669662773479700%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4qoKQzHVkk6rSv9dHdOqs%2BB6msvUCeLPwOA%2FYxSrmAc%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Astro Interest Group
Body:
Hello everyone come join the Astronomy interest group we just sit in the dark and get angry at the clouds for blocking the view. 






What do we do? (apart from getting mad at the weather)
Stargaze and talk about astro happenings and hope that Betelgeuse finally explodes into a supernova

When and where?
Regular stargazing: last Friday of each month, 10-11pm @ sports complex
DiscoverSUTD: 20 and 27 September, 10-11pm @ sports complex 
Events and livestreams: every now and then I guess


Why?
Do you want to be able to touch expensive gear without having to pay through the nose for it?? Also it's cool and everyone is welcome. Bring DSLR camera along if you want. 


Should I?
Yes because I spent a lot of time planning it. 
Sign up here for our introductory session for DiscoverSUTD 2021: https://forms.office.com/r/6cPfBCxHAk <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F6cPfBCxHAk&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9b57fd0dc5cd4351c35808d9752a35e0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669646779230817%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=p88aFD%2F8ofYVWaI7e6A47KYsiZx1LFJ5bOgAw3GO4T0%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Taal Indian Dance Club
Body:
Hey SUTDents!

 

Are you looking for a place to have fun and learn more about the Indian culture through dance? Well, Taal is the community you have been looking for!

 

       

 

What is Taal Indian Dance Club?

Taal is a close-knit community that provides an avenue for anyone who desires to grow artistically and culturally through different forms of dance that define the contemporary Indian dance culture. 

 

Why should I join?

Taal focuses on helping all members grow as a dancer while having loads of fun. We welcome all to join us explore a variety of forms such as contemporary, bhangra and much more 😊

Click the link to view some fun: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vid_STIYyAk 

 

When are the trainings?

The usual trainings are Tuesday and Thursday, 7:00 pm to 9:00 pm.

 

How can I join the club?

Join the telegram group and Instagram for updates.

Telegram link: https://t.me/TAAL2020

Instagram link: https://www.instagram.com/sutdtaal/

 

If you have any concerns, can email the club or can contact the exco through telegram:

                Namitha (President) - @namitha_justine   

                Sangavi (Vice-President) - @KSangavi 

                Chirag (Secretary) - @ChiragShiva

                Devanshi (Treasurer) - @devanshijoshi

                Vedika (Publicity Head) - @heyyyveda

                Saakshi (Dance Captain) - @saakshisaraf16 

 

Kind Regards,

Taal Indian Dance Club

Subject: Student Locker Rental Application
Body:
Dear Students,




Couldn’t get a place in the hostel but still need a safe place to leave things in school? Lockers are located outside TT18(2.208), and you can apply to rent one now!




 

Lockers will be allocated based on a first-come-first-serve basis, so make sure you rent your locker before Friday 17 September (2359) at:https://forms.office.com/r/9HtuXQJbgK <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F9HtuXQJbgK&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C430c66a813b7425d2e1108d974f6aebd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669425394512204%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kCvvWZnxlcnWuFUc4jlOwOX37o1MQTM0Vru5lD99YEc%3D&reserved=0>

Fill | Student Locker Rental Application <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F9HtuXQJbgK&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C430c66a813b7425d2e1108d974f6aebd%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669425394532196%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=MH8DNZte7h%2FLAO2N1rxS2Wu3lP2TS1LuwXqGP4aCU68%3D&reserved=0> 
Lockers for hire are located outside TT18(2.208) and will be allocated on a first come first serve basis. There are 2 sizes of lockers available and you can rent them for 1 term. 1 Term Rental: M Locker, 320(W) x 500(D) x 620(H) ($14) L Locker: 320(W) x 500(D) x 930(H) ($22) Apply for your personal locker today! * Note for 2 term and 3 term rentals the prices would be compounded accordingly. By submitting my details here, I agree that ROOT may collect, use and disclose the information below with relevant parties involved. The survey results, without personal identifiers, may be shared with relevant parties for the purpose of following up on the locker rental application. My personal data will not be retained and will be disposed of appropriately upon the completion of this survey in accordance with the Singapore Personal Data Protection Act.
forms.office.com

Locker details are as follows:

M Locker: 320(W) x 500(D) x 620(H) ($14)
L Locker: 320(W) x 500(D) x 930(H) ($22)

[All lockers operated by a combination lock, no additional lock required]

Visshal Natarajan	  <https://root.sutd.edu.sg/>

9th Student Government

Subject: Do you want Butter chicken? Biryani? Gulab jamun?
Body:
Namaste, 




We are the Indian Cultural Interest Group. Do join our group if you love screaming at the television when India scores a six or if you love dancing to Bollywood songs all night long. If you love eating delicious Indian food like Samosa and Pani Puri or if you would like to learn more about Indian heritage, our group is the place for you!!

 

Join us for – 

1. Indian Game Nights 

2. Indian Movie Marathons 

3. Indian Festivals 

4. Delicious Indian Dishes 

And much more!!!

 

Follow us on Instagram and join our Telegram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FRKhykjuBAPSiOmIQ&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C6a162cf39c844d59b42808d974e1d662%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669335862397859%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Mc9Rd2zPBxh17q49RQPuucyoSdtus06HnWiqCJsrZBs%3D&reserved=0>  chat for more information!

Subject: ♔ DAY 2: SUTD Chess Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party ♚
Body:
Hey all,

The second day of the Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party starts today at 2pm! Join us on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943241993%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2CLNYO6j53cBYz85JJeF8WWmjch56jcraAo5aK8CZtI%3D&reserved=0>  (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943251991%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QOkyAvUnWM13ubAAOqDi8%2FFjEW0QG%2Fm2sqsk%2B1P5CNE%3D&reserved=0> ). Here's a look at our refreshed look for Twitch:






2021 Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party

Support SUTD, Support Singapore

 

Sep 10, Fri, 1400 - 1745

Sep 11, Sat, 1400 - 1745

Sep 12, Sun, 1400 - 1745

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DN2k5ZTZ2dmtpcWpiaWxrdDlydnBkMmNtczBfMjAyMTA5MTBUMDYwMDAwWiBreXJhd255QG0%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com%26scp%3DALL&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943251991%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CCF%2Fw0Feip5LMFqOVJLEMFeFFXd5GUMU5wVYbFHkvQg%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Two of our best players, Jason Peng and Yogesh Shelgaonkar, will be representing Singapore at the 2021 Asian University Chess Championship over the next three days. I will be hosting a watch party on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943261985%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=SWHcjgBXrhb3m%2BmublPUr5H8xjZW3ZXlq%2BlOuabbmiI%3D&reserved=0>  for all three days (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943261985%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=za7hQuWx8Ghqy%2FGLJLWk0g4KbJC5GLhuAultPfWHb5A%3D&reserved=0> ).

 

Drop in whenever you like, and support our members as they play against the best varsity players in the region: cheer together when a brilliant winning move is made; groan together when a not-so-brilliant blunder appears on the board. 

 

Come and get a taste of the tournaments that you could take part in if you join us <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943271979%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ibYdYOmoWESX1JLxJCtO55l99sbKvqS1pKcKPQgvAUY%3D&reserved=0>  - or just come for a good time chilling with and supporting friends. Bring snacks.

 






♙♙♙

Learn To Beat Your Family At Chess (Maybe)

Learn the rules of chess (with some fun historical trivia thrown in), basic opening principles, fundamental tactics like forks and pins, and some vital endgame techniques. Anyone can play good chess!

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2100

A sharing session for our members to learn how others enjoy and improve at chess, and perhaps find new ideas that they can incorporate into their own systems. Three different perspectives on how to analyse your games, followed by a free-for-all discussion.

SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament

The SUTD Week Of Chess ends with a bang, in the form of a 4-round Swiss tournament! The tournament will be held on Lichess.org, with a time control of 7+5. Games are not rated, so don't worry about losing rating.

 

The winner of the tournament will win a tournament-size chess set, with a cloth-backed vinyl board and full-sized wooden pieces!

Sep 16, Thu, 2000 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DMjZuMnBjbG40Zm1qNnJrNGM5Y3FvMm42am8ga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943371928%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Hm6RbFrRJewLMNQxSnyP1hZpuYYJ%2Bp9V4d9GVHrEmtY%3D&reserved=0> 

1.	Join SUTD Chess. Fill up the sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943371928%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Xx3HN4IYSMf6suOo15y8%2F0eWZdDuRQklg1kA4Au%2BhDI%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. Make sure the details are accurate - any users in the tournament that cannot be matched to a submitted username in the form will be kicked after this timing.
2.	Join the Lichess.org team <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fteam%2F3-0-0-ke7&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943381919%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=FqDBwhxLckPZz%2FEWJCPMj78kL83RzyBtBU9LdGxDSp4%3D&reserved=0>  and then the SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fswiss%2FIYgrABpc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943381919%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9J2nF9A0ggzbxhtro6UczHQw7rQxL7YFHejf3djzvEs%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. You can find the password to join the team on Discord.
3.	Be in the Discord's <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943391915%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=VmHJ2y0x2Wfkb0qzlaDEmG2Aa58l8K5kjadcHxPgQWs%3D&reserved=0>  lounge voice channel by Sep 16, Thu, 2000, and have your webcam video and your screen shared for the duration of the tournament, to ensure fair play. You can find how to share your video and your screen on Discord here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.discord.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Farticles%2F360041721052-Video-Calls%23h_c5102ceb-10c0-46f0-abe4-f8efc2e39ee9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfea5d766d3c4405be68308d974d8f8b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637669297943391915%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=7%2BupaCRGA1gWpUTfLSXQ%2B3F49dExQ%2FXRFlJF1j%2BCOMM%3D&reserved=0> .


Best regards,
Kyra Wang

Subject: Introduction to Squash Club!
Body:
Hello SUTD Fam!




Ever wonder what it would be like if tennis was played with 4 walls? Or perhaps you just wanna relax and play a fun sport? 

Introducing 🥁🥁🥁🥁 SQUASH!!









Tucked in a comfy corner behind the ISH, the Squash Club welcomes everyone interested to discover this fun little sport. We’re a small group of people passionate about Squash (and supper). There are players of all levels of proficiency, so no experience needed to join. Just come down and have fun! 

 

Check out our open house videos for a small peek into what it's like in Squash. 

https://youtu.be/6bhGOlf5gDw <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2F6bhGOlf5gDw&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccb63bcfa6a3541a3f5c808d9747af5e6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668893905463970%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=n5Zu9IIJkY4okCPMhKvmwAYO08kP5Fl50zZgJuqh6RY%3D&reserved=0>  

 

If you wanna find out more, come down for one of our introductory sessions!

 

Our Introductory Sessions:

Link to Sign up: https://forms.office.com/r/6TW52GrcqH <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F6TW52GrcqH&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccb63bcfa6a3541a3f5c808d9747af5e6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668893905463970%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=AG5Y8cKiEYyqYAI0137mtKWRkxWUUpwqPT0hZB0ebA8%3D&reserved=0>  🎉 [do sign up quick as there are limited spots for each day :( ]
Date: 16th or 17th Sept (Thurs or Friday)
Time: 7-9pm

Directions:
1. Walk past the ISH on the first floor of the sports center
2. Go down the steps on the right (near the recycling bins) right before the field 
3. Tada! Squash Courts

 

Required items:

Remember to bring your water bottle and yourself!

If you have court shoes, do wear them down as well!

 

Join our telegram group for updates! ( https://t.me/joinchat/3DLP2SNP2m1mMjNl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2F3DLP2SNP2m1mMjNl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccb63bcfa6a3541a3f5c808d9747af5e6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668893905473968%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=k7e%2B7kpR3bB%2FAczZxCXp6LHBq78A%2F%2FUW6vvxt8WY%2Br4%3D&reserved=0>  )

 

Normal Court Timings: Monday to Friday, 7-10pm

Do drop us a message on telegram (@justinehy, @itstheratchef, @wanggglin) if you wish to drop by outside of the introductory session timings!

 

For casual players, the daily timings for our courts means you’ll always have a space to wind down and let loose after a long and stressful day at school!
For those looking to be more competitive, we will be looking to organise friendlies with other schools and invite coaches down (subject to SMM). 

 

Hope to see you there! 


Cheers!
SUTD Squash Exco

Subject: Athletics Introductory Session
Body:
Hello Freshies and SUTDents!

Thinking of maintaining your cardiovascular fitness? Want to learn how to improve your 2.4km time?
We have good news! SUTD Athletics will be conducting an introductory session open to all.

Running is an activity that is accessible to almost all of us. As a form of anaerobic exercise, it promotes good health by building muscle, burning fats, strengthening bones. Running can help to reduce stress, improve heart health and mental health too!

You may be an experienced athlete or someone who just started running, we invite you to join us in our training to find like-minded people to workout together! Athletics is a sport accepting of all genders, shapes and sizes!


Intro Session Details
What: By the end of the session, you will learn running drills to improve your running form. Learn how to plan your personalised training and recovery day.
When: 22nd September Wednesday 6:30-8:30pm
Where: SUTD track/ stadium
Who: You! Including sophomore, junior, senior, master/ PHD and staffs (more quota for freshmore signup)
How: Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPU9t0i7OeHhAu3j2VCvLF5JURUVaTUtMUU41TURRSEZRMTk0N0ZGRVROUS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca3db71ce5b1942a004b108d974689f79%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668816176006252%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4BoMj%2FPvCXRIiiBPuciiP34e64gNH%2FZUTQWOYWtsBq0%3D&reserved=0> !
Attire: Any comfortable running attire (not forgetting a pair of running shoes!)

Do join our Telegram group here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fsutdathletics2020&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca3db71ce5b1942a004b108d974689f79%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668816176016252%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BcoiqSdL0yuw%2FNMgZj3CZVFghVko6V7SokJ0JntlSIw%3D&reserved=0>  and follow our Instagram page @sutd.athletics for more updates or to find out more! 




Note: Deadline for 22/9 signups is 21/9. We also have limited slots for our intro sessions due to distancing measures.

So, what are you waiting for? Sign up now!
We welcome you to join our SUTD Athletics Family! See you there!


Note: you are most welcome to join our regular training on Every Monday and Wednesday 6:30-8:30pm! Starting on 13 September. So do join us, especially if you can’t attend the intro session!








Watch our Open House Video: https://youtu.be/ThoqGMMYzs4 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FThoqGMMYzs4&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca3db71ce5b1942a004b108d974689f79%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668816176016252%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NuGLcH2TO6PFUlDNaGPqyOBWAS%2FuS0rF5bjFYxXrQOI%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: (Invitation) The Young SEAkers (TYS) Supply Chain Hackathon 2021
Body:
Dear SUTD Students,

 

We would like to share with you an invitation from The Young SEAkers (TYS) as they host the first-of-its-kind Supply Chain Hackathon supported by YCH, Singapore’s largest home-grown supply solutions company.

 

The Young SEAkers is proud to announce that they will be hosting the first-of-its-kind Supply Chain Hackathon supported by YCH, Singapore's largest home-grown supply chain solutions company and they would like to invite SUTD students to join them in this Hackathon.

 

It is a great opportunity for students to gain exposure to the industry and subject matter experts, as well as learn from other participants in the hackathon. 

 

Winning teams will stand a chance to win an employment opportunity with YCH, including the YCH Management Associate Programme placement for the grand champion. The top 3 teams will also earn a fast-track Internship offer in 2022 and Winter Immersion Programme happening in December 2021.

 

The timeline of the hackathon is as follows:  

·       Registration Deadline: 20th September 

·       Participant Shortlisting: 24th September

·       Hackathon: 1st to 3rd October

 

Students are encouraged to sign up by 20th September. 

 

Registration link: https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/supply-chain-hackathon-2021-tickets-169450231203 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eventbrite.sg%2Fe%2Fsupply-chain-hackathon-2021-tickets-169450231203&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C79870b5af1b14d30626a08d9744e9ff6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668703445837752%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hx03inAp0%2FOXTiDFk1efWWqPVQAOUAKjTGNZskdgiuM%3D&reserved=0> 

 

For more information, kindly refer to TYS’ website <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2Ftyshacksite&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C79870b5af1b14d30626a08d9744e9ff6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668703445837752%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bdf%2FJ%2BAlH7g5TfZu083p1q4Uq4aloQh9Bw6hXgufj20%3D&reserved=0>  or check out the information in the image as attached. 

 

Feel free to reach out to TYS at hackathon@theyoungseakers.com <mailto:hackathon@theyoungseakers.com>  if there are any questions. 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Office of International Relations 

Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD)

Subject: 👋 Hello from SUTD's Swift Coding Club!
Body:
Hey SUTDents!

 

Looking for a place to build your software development skills? Want to try your hand at iOS Development with Swift? Interested to join a community of iOS developers supported by Apple?

 

Then SUTD's Swift Coding Club is here for you! Formed from the joint collaboration between SUTD and Apple Education program, our interest group (and soon student club!) is the sole pioneer of Swift Education at the tertiary-education level in Singapore.

 



 

Join us for an introduction session where we'll be sharing more about our club and upcoming activities with you!

 

Session Details: 

Friday, 17 September (3pm - 4pm) and 

Monday, 20 September (7:30pm - 8:30pm)

Venue: Microsoft Teams!

REGISTER HERE :) <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPSRdQfEOf31CtOMYUcL9_PlUQzNVQUpYTUsxUTdRUFkzVzQ4STlZWDBaRS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C005428ab563d4e775fc208d974474b34%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668671977708173%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BC0hCauGTn8sl%2B6Vip%2B6p4dbMYyQbLFoc%2BE5KndoR48%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Or if you're already convinced.. join our club's Telegram Group here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FQioo5RyeiLwwMjBl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C005428ab563d4e775fc208d974474b34%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668671977718171%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NjS%2B0hPs5HhbBRs4loCwBvUFE14wJMlbRkQsKL9WkqM%3D&reserved=0>  to receive exclusive info on our events 😉

Subject: Kick off Freshmore with SUTD Taekwondo!
Body:
Hi Freshies and SUTDents! 

SUTKD invites you to try Taekwondo! Never tried a martial art before? We invite you to have your first experience with us. Join us to learn some fun self-defence techniques and show off your kicks to your fellow freshies!

You'll get a free drink after the session to help you stay hydrated :)

(Non-freshie first timers are also welcome!)


Introductory Sessions

Venue: Dance Studio 7 (on the 2nd floor of block 61/sports center)
What to bring: Water and yourself!

Timings:

Session 1: Friday 17/09, 4-6 pm
Session 2: Wednesday 22/09, 6:30-8:30 pm
Session 3: Friday 24/09, 4-6 pm (our coach will be joining us for this session!)

You can sign up by clicking this link here! <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FZJTmWP5q31&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2efda7601a3144da8e1f08d97444d4e5%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668661458869651%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jsxY6ZAEocW9WGlPX8p7aUW1c0YLQ59%2FrwBebDrFYtY%3D&reserved=0> 

Due to restrictions, we only have a limited number of slots for each session, so make sure to sign up quick!

If you have any questions, you can join our telegram group here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FLFWfugt7ag9jNjBl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2efda7601a3144da8e1f08d97444d4e5%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668661458879642%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=WJB0rlsMrkejiG1B2%2FOCnpz80UroLnAmEXOb%2Bxh%2BC50%3D&reserved=0> !


Joining SUTKD

Our regular sessions are on Wednesdays and Fridays from 5-7 pm.

By joining us, you get to be part of a close-knit community who strive to be the best they can! You can also earn your belts and become a Taekwondo master. You can follow us on Instagram @sutkd <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutkd%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C2efda7601a3144da8e1f08d97444d4e5%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668661458889640%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=b1NJGefqdS2kpceZOIrwmM0zTweFs4krTXxRLp0RpJU%3D&reserved=0> !




We look forward to seeing fresh faces in our club!


Cheers!
SUTKD Exco

Subject: SUTD Tennis introductory Sessions
Body:
Hello Freshies and SUTDents! 🎾 

We, at SUTD Tennis, are holding our introductory sessions on the 14th of September, 7-9pm (meet up is at 6.30pm at Campus Centre, we will head over to the courts together), and we'd like to invite anyone with interest in tennis to come and sign up! Please don't worry if you do not have any prior experience since we'll also be teaching all of you the fundamentals of the sport, and for those of you who are experienced players (if you're afraid you'll be bored), fret not, we have some experienced players who will come down to play some friendly matches with you too! 🙃

We'll also be having supper after our introductory sessions to get to know all of you better, and perhaps answer some of your questions about both the sport and school. ✨

All you need is your sports attire, water bottle, outdoor court shoes (or running shoes if lack the prior), and your own racket (if you have it).

Hope to see you there! 🥳

Sign up link: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPb1lwtNp5KJOp_pV1W-462NURDlBRjhCRkFSVkpIUVdDSUZFRUNYOFBESS4u

For more info:
Join our telegram group: https://t.me/joinchat/vri11BtLzN1jYjU1

Or contact our EXCO:
President: Shaun Neo @shaunneo
Vice-Pres: Kaveri Priya Putti @kaveripriyap
Treasurer: Eunice Kwok @eunnicce
Secretary: Alice Jung @alicejungg

Subject: Global Exchange Programme 2022 - Join us at the Information Booth (13 Sept to 1 Oct)!
Body:
Dear Term 3 Students,

 

Interested to spend a term at an overseas host university? We have 33 partner universities in 17 exciting destinations for you to choose from! Join us at the Information Booth from 13 September to 1 October 2021 (details below).

 

 

About Global Exchange Programme (GEXP)

 

To better the world, first see and experience the world!

 

GEXP provides SUTD undergraduates a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to experience an international education and cultural immersion. Offered students will be able to spend a term at one of our partner university worldwide after Term 5 (Fall Term) or Term 6 (Spring Term).

 

To live and study in another country is an exciting opportunity that promises a fulfilling and rewarding experience!

 

Online application is open to all Term 3 students in October and students will be informed via email. Stay tuned and look out for more email updates send by Office of International Relations in the coming weeks!

 

Note: SUTD will continue to monitor the COVID-19 situation worldwide. Due to the unpredictability, Host University and/or SUTD reserves the right to cancel GEXP 2022 at any point of time. The decision will be final and students will continue their Term 6 studies in SUTD as usual. SUTD strongly encourages all students to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19 before embarking on GEXP.

	
 

 



 

 

 



 

Meanwhile, look us up below:

 

										
		 <mailto:global@sutd.edu.sg> 	
		 <https://wearesutd.sutd.edu.sg/category/exchange/global-exchange-programme/> 	
			 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdglobal%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8a74e8f10bb0414fcbba08d97442f724%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668653320404957%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=IUbyHsG5J9viXGn271rzkmGczcCZkVKJJySXulxVWQc%3D&reserved=0> 	
	 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/Global/Student-Exchange/Outbound> 			 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9Frk84kcFg&list=PLUWNY6Eg0rRI14AzewwRYMPZbI3ORaZyR> 	
	
	
	
 

 

 

 

 


Warmest regards, 

Office of International Relations 

Singapore University of Technology and Design

 

 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/>

Subject: [Restricted] Seating Plan for Cohort 20F06
Body:
Message Classification: Restricted

 

 

Dear Students,

Welcome back to SUTD!

A collaborative and cooperative culture is one of the key traits that keep the SUTD community spirit strong. 

Cohort-based learning

In our cohort-based pedagogy that emphasises peer learning, you will continue to be assigned randomly to groups and work with new people.

Seating Plan

Term 3 starts on 13 September (Monday) and we would like to provide information of your seat number and seating plan.  Please refer to the attached PDF.

As part of the safe management measures, please minimise your interactions by working with the assigned group of no more than 5 persons and occupying the assigned seat for lessons. Please refer to other measures shared in the attached email: Notice for Students (26 August 2021).

Some of your cohort/group mates may not be able to join you at the start of the term as they are serving SHN or entering Singapore later. As their buddies, you can:

*	Provide the Affected International Students (AIS) with opportunities of digital socialisation inside and outside classroom (e.g. 5th row) to instil a sense of belonging and camaraderie 
*	Provide the AIS with peer support in learning 
*	Highlight potential issues/challenges encountered in group projects, if any to course instructors.

 

Thank you.

 

Best regards,

Office of Student Administration

Subject: SUTD FIRST 2021 - Video Recording
Body:
Dear SUTD Community,

 

The Fostering Industrial Research Success Together (FIRST) Industry Workshop was successfully held on 28 July 2021. 

 

We were honored to have Mr. Chaney Ho, Co-founder & Executive Director of Board of Advantech Co., Ltd. and the Advisor for the Singapore Mentorship Committee (SMC), who presented on “Building Supply Chain Management Resilience in the De-Globalization Age”; Dr. David Ong, Senior Partner, Naef Group Spiele AG and Chairman of the Singapore Mentorship Committee (SMC) who shared on “Reimagining Unicorns of the Future”; and Dr. Mohan Rajesh Elara, Assistant Professor, at the Engineering Product Development Pillar in SUTD, who presented on “The Rise of Self-reconfigurable Maintenance Robots” with us to present impactful keynote addresses to our participants. 

 

In addition, we also witnessed the vibrant and engaging forum panel discussion among Ms. Celestine Khoo (Senior Director, Venture, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship, SUTD), Mr. Eugene Wee (Director, Enterprise Division, A*STAR), Mr. Nicholas Ma (President of Huawei, Asia Pacific Enterprise Business Group), Mr. Jeremy Sim (First Prototyper, Audacity & Creative Director, Mistletoe) and Ms. Hemalatha Annamalai (Founder, Uni Connect and Investor & Mentor in Disruptive Startups) on the topic of “University-Industry Collaboration: Entrepreneurship and Innovation”.

 

This year, we showcased the SUTD’s research centres, pillars, and clusters, as well as relevant SUTD research capabilities in the later part of the session on our SUTD FIRST website. The FIRST Industry Workshop provides a platform to foster collaborative research success by developing and deepening industry-academia ties. Once again, we welcome our community to view our video recording of the opening address, keynote addresses, forum panellist discussions, information on research centres/pillars/clusters and sponsors’ virtual booth showcases on the FIRST Event website <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/FIRST> .

 

FIRST website:

https://www.sutd.edu.sg/FIRST <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/FIRST> 

 

Thank you.

 

Best regards, 

Tzerliang

 

On behalf of the SUTD 

FIRST 2021 Organizing Committee

 

 

 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/FIRST>

Subject: SUTD Floorball Introductory Session
Body:
Hello All Freshies and SUTDents!!


SUTD Floorball will be having its introductory sessions on 22nd / 24th September 2021 and we welcome anyone with an interest in floorball to sign up. Do not worry if you do not have any prior experience as we will be here to guide you through the basics of floorball and provide you with floorball sticks if you do not have your own. You can also try out as a goalkeeper if you enjoy making saves and being the last line of our defence.




If you are interested in joining us for our Floorball Introductory Session, please indicate your interest in the sign-up form and join our telegram group chat.
Sign-up Form: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPUdPBHFGRVhFnoBcBZ6bwc9URFo4VlE0TE5YMURBRDU5SlZRMkhXMFVQNS4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPUdPBHFGRVhFnoBcBZ6bwc9URFo4VlE0TE5YMURBRDU5SlZRMkhXMFVQNS4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C35c638872c014ed346e808d974342c48%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668590204226237%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LutEQ6tSVnLsucYFTdVJu5vGZFhi1AHCjo%2BFBAuvz6Q%3D&reserved=0> 

Telegram Group Chat: https://t.me/joinchat/NGDsZTH_zT5jOTBl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FNGDsZTH_zT5jOTBl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C35c638872c014ed346e808d974342c48%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668590204226237%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=I2wVbGR%2F%2BbYjin%2FcDHHcRsX6AWUGUjHMqhzTJh%2BGBz4%3D&reserved=0> 

Due to COVID restrictions, each session will have limited capacity and we will follow up to confirm your attendance closer to the date through the telegram group chat. Do sign up early to avoid missing out! 

SUTD Floorball is a tight-knit family that welcomes both experienced and new floorball players. Besides weekly trainings on Wednesdays and Fridays, the club (both the Girls and Boys Team) also participates in SUNIG and other external competitions. Regardless of whether you are just looking for a recreational sport to unwind from university life, a place to exercise or to have the opportunity to compete against other floorball teams in Singapore, SUTD Floorball is the fifth row for you! 

Here are some activities you can look forward to when you join SUTD Floorball 🏒🏒

Subject: ♔ SUTD Chess Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party is LIVE ♚
Body:
Hey all,

The Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party is live! Sorry for the delay, there were some technical issues. Join us on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746521366%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=D9EWgagMf1qgn1wluQ1P%2Fo5dGiKLcW%2BCx9ImGHIDmfs%3D&reserved=0>  (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746531368%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UxknIRcbZtX3qhk8L4jyidZrKDfyAEhv1G8lMXpS480%3D&reserved=0> )! There's still one round left today to watch.


2021 Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party

Support SUTD, Support Singapore

 

Sep 10, Fri, 1400 - 1745

Sep 11, Sat, 1400 - 1745

Sep 12, Sun, 1400 - 1745

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DN2k5ZTZ2dmtpcWpiaWxrdDlydnBkMmNtczBfMjAyMTA5MTBUMDYwMDAwWiBreXJhd255QG0%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com%26scp%3DALL&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746541359%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=WZCRZqqRWT9l2JfHP1dnLFGzNja74QKqr222mnkTZLs%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Two of our best players, Jason Peng and Yogesh Shelgaonkar, will be representing Singapore at the 2021 Asian University Chess Championship over the next three days. I will be hosting a watch party on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746551356%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=eNogtF4dvHP8NP%2F6s8LuKToOLrZTjbThJJhRp0%2BdbRQ%3D&reserved=0>  for all three days (it will also be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746561358%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NayfCKdq1AiGGNHcPWjPcLXqLQETKqh6E%2BEYEEL021o%3D&reserved=0> ).

 

Drop in whenever you like, and support our members as they play against the best varsity players in the region: cheer together when a brilliant winning move is made; groan together when a not-so-brilliant blunder appears on the board. 

 

Come and get a taste of the tournaments that you could take part in if you join us <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C56289326fbe344f8680c08d97433e7b4%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668588746571342%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=EbuOO5gfO5FHuTViEQOP%2FxXwsoZrpfuc7AuUqOxGu5A%3D&reserved=0>  - or just come for a good time chilling with and supporting friends. Bring snacks.

Subject: SUTD Touch Rugby Recruitment
Body:
Hi SUTD! 

 

Touch Rugby is looking for more members to join us this year!

 

What is Touch Rugby🏉?

Touch is a fast-paced game that involves strategic gameplay and pushes you to think on your feet! It is also different from contact rugby, so don't worry about getting tackled to the ground :) 

 

Why should I join?

*	If you're looking for a fun sport to pick up AND get fit at the same time, look no further 👀

*	We are always on the lookout for competition opportunities for both our guys and girls team!!

*	Make new friends! 

We’ll be organizing intro sessions to Touch Rugby in Week 1 and 2 (13 Sept, 17 Sept, 20 Sept, 24 Sept) from 7.20pm - 9pm. We will also have supper afterwards to get to know each other more and to answer all your burning questions, whether it is about training or school life!! If you are unable to come down on any of these dates, feel free to join in any of our training sessions on other weeks :)

 

No experience is required and all you need to bring along are your sports shoes/boots, water bottle and yourself (jio your friends along too!)

 

Sign up at this link: https://forms.gle/ffHcNZrk4qyWCoe4A <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FffHcNZrk4qyWCoe4A&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C65eb6150d0b14d96ab4508d97433973f%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668587619364978%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=xYyXIjskPmRmxsCA1jALOOuxLR2Ok7C8DqI0z0heGm4%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Join our telegram chat for more information: https://t.me/joinchat/IJxNk9bWeiszOTFl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FIJxNk9bWeiszOTFl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C65eb6150d0b14d96ab4508d97433973f%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668587619364978%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=STb90NraCgqlF5jy4Fij%2FPcSQBX5ZJfUwpLxYrvVBqE%3D&reserved=0> 

 

If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact us here!

Subject: 🎥 Interested in making video? Come join SUTD Productions! 🎥
Body:
Hello SUTDents!

 

In awe by the Orientation Storyline video and want to make such cool video? SUTD Productions is recruiting! Scriptwriting, filming, editing, directing – you name it, we have it.

 

Come join us on Week 2 Monday (20th September) 7.30pm-9.30pm for our intro session. Sign up with the link below.

Subject: Muay Thai Introductory SESSIONS ❤️❤️
Body:
HELLO SUTDents!!




Welcome to SUTD! Ever wanted to learn a martial art? LOVE to have some FUN? Or just looking to SWEAT 💦 out your stress? If the answer is yes(or no) to any of these questions, SUTD Muay Thai is the fifth row for you!!!!




Known as the Art of Eight Limbs, expect a full body workout making use of your arms, legs, knees, and elbows (that’s why 8 limbs ohoho 🐙). 





Whether you are a beginner looking to try something new, or an experienced fighter looking to hone your techniques, SUTD Muay Thai welcomes you~





a spar between two amazing fighters




Join us for an introductory session!

*	20/9 Monday OR 27/9 Monday, 1.5hours session between 7-10pm
	
*	Limited slots available, sign up now!
*	For those interested in joining our introductory sessions, please click this link!!
	
*	https://forms.office.com/r/cvigS7ef92 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FcvigS7ef92&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfc5e3b84e0ae44815c0f08d9742ad1da%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668549763790987%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=SVkKxoAaCEjIPsS0EJnNmPvCzJshgdAzUcNFcxTNkto%3D&reserved=0> 




Handwraps and gloves (Sanitised!) would be provided! But if you have your own equipment, feel free to bring them as well!




Normal training days:

*	Monday 630-10pm DS7 
*	Wednesday 530-10pm DS6




*Training time is not the full duration of 3hours (each training would only be about 1.5 hours long!!)




For any other enquires, please feel free to contact me @poopysitoh. 

Join our telegram group! https://t.me/joinchat/ND2XWjhDMCNhOTZl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FND2XWjhDMCNhOTZl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfc5e3b84e0ae44815c0f08d9742ad1da%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668549763800977%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=nDVU4mL40Bpghkd6fROOj%2BZT89sa3aLaUZz5Uph1nwE%3D&reserved=0> 


Follow us on Instagram! www.instagram.com/sutdmuaythai/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdmuaythai%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfc5e3b84e0ae44815c0f08d9742ad1da%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668549763800977%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2B0FMhIqBUw5aq0rPvPWC%2Bd30guPyTRWHejWTJ%2FqBQus%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Scale New Heights⛰️: Mountaineering Club Info Session
Body:
Hello SUTD Family! 👋👋


Are you a nature lover🌳? Or do you love exploring the outdoors🏕️? Or perhaps a thrill-seeker looking to scale new heights🚀🚀?

SUTD Mountaineering⛰️ is the place for you!

Our official trainings are on Tuesdays, 8:00PM - 9:30PM, with expeditions organized during the recess week and at the end of Term (don’t say we bojio!)

Curious to know more? Sign up for our Virtual Info Session💻!

We’ll be sharing more about our past events and expeditions, as well as what you can look forward to when you join our SUTD Mountaineering family!

Mountaineering Virtual Info Session 2021

Date: 16 September 2021 (Thursday)
Time: 7:30 PM - 8.30 PM
Venue: Online on Discord! Sign up via the link/QR Code and we will send you the invite closer to the date.

Who: You! Our info session is open to all students, including Term 3, Pillar, and Postgrads!

Sign up here! <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FiwUy2JGLA3&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf795e8d6e0e7490e9e5f08d974296845%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668543905687056%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ermS2ZqZ7F8q%2BitKndfzieYjvzbkJYImQxGIbJoPLk0%3D&reserved=0>  (If you're unable to join the session but are still interested to be a part of us, do indicate your interest here too 🙂)










To get regular updates about the club and upcoming hikes and workshops, do also join our Telegram group <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FHwB3WsYQydkwZGFl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf795e8d6e0e7490e9e5f08d974296845%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668543905697046%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Bdt3uNG3SaxXpovy%2FPsDasW%2F2%2BaD2Utw26kHM6nxQg4%3D&reserved=0> * and follow us on Instagram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdmountaineering&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf795e8d6e0e7490e9e5f08d974296845%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668543905697046%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=GjuNp%2BcdWSn8gt1oLnsX5VgVpDV6Mc2FS2of5sHCzNc%3D&reserved=0> !

We have also uploaded a pre-Intro Session video on IGTV <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Ftv%2FCTn9RzYjHWO%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf795e8d6e0e7490e9e5f08d974296845%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668543905707043%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Ihq5LaaJcKp7WsWhyLOSRurE9fLR48Zo1OK%2FiBXX7eo%3D&reserved=0>  and YouTube <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=06TzNL5CP6A>  where we showcased some of the climbs and hikes that we have embarked on! Do check it out before coming for the Intro Session 👍

We hope to see all of you there!

Cheers,





SUTD Mountaineering: Redefine your limits.

Website | https://sutdmountaineering.com/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdmountaineering.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf795e8d6e0e7490e9e5f08d974296845%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668543905717045%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=SbWUMwNaatXhqpyjAGFJMS3rBCJWYQ2OabbL9x3o%2F%2BI%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: FW: Adobe Analytics Challenge is here again!
Body:
Hi Students, 

 

For your consideration to participate the Adobe Analytics Challenge.

 

Regards,

Hou Liang

On behalf of ISTD

 

 

From: Jeanette Lim <jealim@adobe.com <mailto:jealim@adobe.com> >
Date: Friday, 10 September 2021 at 10:21 AM
To: Tony Quek <tonyquek@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:tonyquek@sutd.edu.sg> >
Subject: Adobe Analytics Challenge is here again!

 

External Email – Do not click on any links or open any attachments from an unknown sender.

 

Hi A/P Tony

 

Good morning and trust that this email finds you well. The Adobe Analytics Challenge is here again and we hope that you will be able to help share this with the students and faculty members that might be interested to participate.

 

The Adobe Analytics Challenge continues to be a unique analytics-focused business case competition where university students are given the opportunity to use Adobe’s industry leading analytics products and access to real-world data from leading organizations such as Major League Baseball, T‑Mobile, Starwood, Lenovo, Condé Nast, Comcast, Overstock.com, Backcountry.com, Sony PlayStation, MGM Resort International and Nike (from last year). 

 

This year goes more exciting as we have one of our marquee clients - Disney that would be providing their data for the challenge!



Who can participate?

The competition is meant for students enrolled at a University for a full time academic program. The team can consist of 1-3 members from the same university along with a faculty member as a mentor. 

 

How does one participate if they don’t know how to work with Adobe Analytics or have access to it?

Every team will be given access to Adobe Analytics which will contain data from Disney. There will also a 2 hour training held by the Adobe Evangelists and the customer (Disney). The training will be recorded for on-demand viewing and will be available on the competition website.

 

What does the winner take home?

 A whole load of money! A total of $60,000 USD cash prize!!

 

1st Place

2nd Place

3rd Place

4th Place

5th Place

6th Place

35,000 USD

14,000 USD

6,000 USD

3,000 USD

1,500 USD

500 USD

 

More information on the website https://adobeanalyticschallenge.com/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadobeanalyticschallenge.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Caaf4ccbfd48b4ab4837b08d97424474a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668521518180926%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Az2q3gtXqvwKgSZfIdWSfW5igkfMyo6ZC8TUEq0xhrE%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Attached deck for more info. Please feel free to reach out should you have more questions and we look forward to SUTD participating!

 

Thanks

 

Regards

_________________________________________________________________________

Jeanette Lim  | Enterprise Account Executive, Digital Experience, Singapore  |  Adobe  |  M +65 93361761  |  jealim@adobe.com <mailto:cotan@adobe.com> 

8 Temasek Boulevard, #06-02 Suntec Tower 3, Singapore 038988

Subject: 2021 September Term - 02.001 : Global Humanities: Literature, Philosophy, and Ethics_Zhenxing: Important!!! Class schedule for the first week of Global Humanities
Body:
Dear Students, 

Welcome to the Global Humanities course. Welcome back to the SUTD campus.
Here are several important announcements, so please read them carefully and save this email.

Firstly, this weekly course is divided into two parts, a one-hour Lecture and a two-hour recitation.

Secondly, please log in to your E-dimension and download, read/watch everything in the Week 1 document by next Monday. These materials are highly important and will help you understand what humanities is.

Thirdly, the schedule for the first week of classes.



For term 3 students, the Monday Lecture is online; please watch the video in the E-dimension. Your first week of in-person recitation classes will be held at the following locations: 



Cohort 9

TT14

CC13

CC12 

For Term 1 students, all of your classes are online, unless the University has made any changes. Tuesday lecture is online; please watch the video in the E-dimension. Here are the links for the weekly recitation class:

Subject: Join the Biggest Trading Tournament in the Region!
Body:
Join one of the Biggest, Most Anticipated and Prestigious Virtual Trading Tournaments in the Region!


The SG Active Trading Tournament is open to participants in the region, across Singapore & Malaysia!




It’s all virtual capital but the prizes are real cash - up to S$10,000!
