Subject: Work at Google? RSVP Extended for Google Day 2021
Body:
Hi SUTD Fam ✨ 

Are you interested in working at Google 🤖?? 🙋‍♀️🙋🏽‍♂️🙋🏼 What if I told you we just extended the RSVP deadline (for SUTD students) for Google Day 2021? 👀

That's right- 👏 you 👏 can 👏 still 👏 sign up 👏 for amazing fireside chats 🔥 and Q&A with Google about a career / internship there!

To help you decide, I put together this helpful decision tree: 


1.	Not sure how to apply to Google? ✅ Sign up for Google Day.
2.	Don't know if you will get the Noogler <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.computerhistory.org%2Frevolution%2Fthe-web%2F20%2F390%2F2141&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C27cef1fbfb0940ba89b508d9741aaf43%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668480493128914%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=qhSvyu5Wj0GMm%2Fi5rlzODjAGKRnGhAn50TP%2FcLZUfas%3D&reserved=0>  hat? ✅ Sign up for Google Day.
3.	You're a Freshmore and don't know if software is for you? ✅ Join 3DC <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FljD30Qfh0KUzZTll&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C27cef1fbfb0940ba89b508d9741aaf43%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668480493138904%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=OSFZOfW7alcuGJrTa9X%2FKlUAMV7NSy2DuxVYx2NC32E%3D&reserved=0> .
4.	Still use Bing? ✅ Sign up for Google Day.
5.	Wondering if Google HQ is still lacking a chicken rice stall after almost a year? ✅ Sign up for Google Day.

Sign up has been extended to 🥵 Monday, 13 Sep so please don't hesitate to register 🚀 

the link is here (or in the QR): https://goo.gle/googleday2021 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgoo.gle%2Fgoogleday2021&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C27cef1fbfb0940ba89b508d9741aaf43%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668480493138904%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=dMfJ6Cmw9HT74sjC36bXQ76%2FzIySrg1%2FrM0N5PLhIuA%3D&reserved=0> 




Any questions just lmk!

Regards,

Raphael Yee


President, 3DC & SUTD-Google DSC Lead


raphael_yee@mymail.sutd.edu.sg 


 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Frphly&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C27cef1fbfb0940ba89b508d9741aaf43%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668480493148900%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=WfjaC8JMVy1ewqN%2BsippfGuaEwtOEwBRJDzOXYoK9XA%3D&reserved=0>  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fraphaelyee%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C27cef1fbfb0940ba89b508d9741aaf43%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668480493158894%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=mEGNv%2FEYRIXRoVxb3hHzJt3BRUCEQlreVcON%2FtXtv1o%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Weekly Discovery: AI Agents Learn to Cooperate, Brighten Clouds to Cool the Earth, Researchers Tap Antiferromagnets for Better RAM & More 6 – 10 September 2021
Body:
Weekly Discovery
We SHARE to inspire and ignite ideas! 

 

6 – 10 September 2021

 

 

The Library publishes 9 alerts focusing on Topics relevant to growth and research areas to SUTD. 

 

Stay up to date by subscribing to any of these 9 Topical Reports - CLICK HERE TO SUBSCRIBE NOW <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPY4N9Bppv-lDrynkQwwfyzxUQUxVOTQxUkwzRTJTMVQ1WjU2OFZRQkdPQi4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443253626%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2y3kfLMFDSMy7otG%2BJMvfCSO0Yggqfbsm%2FeqLcprr%2FU%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://mylibrary.sutd.edu.sg/node/1489> 

 

AI

Greedy AI Agents Learn To Cooperate <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Freinforcement-learning&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443263622%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0T1RcW7T2uys1xKqVy3hd4RYHXv8rFOaZbRPPrQ0Y14%3D&reserved=0> 

 

ARTIFICIAL NEURONS

These Super-Efficient, Artificial Neurons Do Not Use Electrons <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fthese-artificial-neurons-use-ions-rather-than-electrons&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443263622%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=egqpdSIZSGdviLpG%2FSpO6FYAUUGUgLL19e7DHAWv%2FDU%3D&reserved=0> 

 

CLEAN ENERGY

New Research Advances Clean Energy Solutions <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.asu.edu%2F20210903-new-research-advances-clean-energy-solutions&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443273613%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2F8LL%2B6WSzva6hkiW5rdCi2SM11cA3MFOXCUxfr5P1%2B4%3D&reserved=0> 

 

CLIMATE CHANGE

Here’s How We Could Brighten Clouds To Cool The Earth <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fclimate-change&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443273613%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=qJgZQItlbMvmF1vlMk4BDMppHah59l%2B2jdi%2Bs2n3EEM%3D&reserved=0> 









“We came up with a novel solution, which we call CERL: Collaborative Evolutionary Reinforcement Learning. Our paper about it demonstrated that the challenge at hand can be broken down into two kinds of components: smaller problems for which the system can get some immediate feedback and the larger optimization problem that needs to be solved over a longer time span.”

Designing electronic systems that mimic the human brain, both in terms of energy use and ability to carry information, is a holy grail of scientific research.... A team of scientists from the ENS Laboratoire de Physique, Paris, believe the answer might lie in microfluidics.

“Researchers like Moore hope to take a page from nature’s playbook, creating synthetic analogs to natural processes of photosynthesis. The new study describes a synthetic diiron-containing porphyrin and explores its potential as an effective catalyst.”

“The particles produced by these ship emissions can also create brighter clouds, which in turn can produce a cooling effect via processes that occur naturally in our atmosphere. What if we could achieve this cooling effect without simultaneously releasing the greenhouse gases and toxic pollutants that ships emit? That's the question the Marine Cloud Brightening (MCB) Project intends to answer.”

Source: IEEE Spectrum <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Freinforcement-learning&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443283607%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4qU5E8BqvasdjJ18zzoX67yHIn20gV7KXw%2FJrvYziSs%3D&reserved=0>  (2 September 2021)

Source: IEEE Spectrum <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fthese-artificial-neurons-use-ions-rather-than-electrons&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443283607%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=E2akXsarWoV9jGm1sIPjsBG63ER6297q9CRKdzrhdBg%3D&reserved=0>  (3 September 2021)

Source: Arizona State University <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.asu.edu%2F20210903-new-research-advances-clean-energy-solutions&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443293597%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YkPnS1fF%2BJVk5BrAWOE%2B9dYus45LJBq7CHJabuRneeE%3D&reserved=0>  (3 September 2021)

Source: IEEE Spectrum <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fclimate-change&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443303598%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=wfu%2FXS32Ok%2BmQofxJuZq2%2FVbf%2FTS4Z3JP%2B8cyC6a8qI%3D&reserved=0>  (7 September 2021)

 

COMPUTING

Researchers Tap Antiferromagnets for Better RAM <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fantiferromagnets-ram&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443303598%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hg4kqlgQVrMnSEaIMyadNxV7TUzOJHIEKu%2FtQhTEV3I%3D&reserved=0> 

 

ENERGY

This Wildly Reinvented Wind Turbine Generates Five Times More Energy Than Its Competitors <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fastcompany.com%2F90672135%2Fthis-wildly-reinvented-wind-turbine-generates-five-times-more-energy-than-its-competitors&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443313590%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LoCA2Z9AaOdQ9M5eN%2Fnbc5QUtyjJKD%2B8YaZ2PlM8KrI%3D&reserved=0> 

 

MATERIALS

The Benefits of Copper and BIO-C29: A Technology That Eliminates Up to 99.9% of Fungi <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.archdaily.com%2F967341%2Fthe-benefits-of-copper-and-bio-c29-a-technology-that-eliminates-up-to-9-percent-of-fungi&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443313590%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=KeuMx1cEV3QLeqZ0BHe%2F704jCDv2uUKmVQc0jPijVKY%3D&reserved=0> 

 

MATERIALS

UCF Researchers Create Water-Repellent Nanomaterial Inspired By Nature <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eurekalert.org%2Fnews-releases%2F927654&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443323586%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Q%2B4HulXNovGILgqXPqrn52W7Cwt3BQcfvguIz6soArk%3D&reserved=0> 









“Strange magnetic materials known as antiferromagnets are promising candidates for a next generation of computer memory. Now scientists have discovered magnetic effects within these materials that could help them operate with greater speed and energy efficiency than current devices.”

“At 1,000 feet high, the system is over three times as tall as an average wind turbine, and it stands on a floating platform that’s anchored to the ocean floor. The company is planning to build a prototype next year. If it succeeds, the Wind Catcher could revolutionize the way we harness wind power.”

“In an effort to create a high-impact solution during the current global pandemic, the Peru-based Grupo LAMOSA decided to generate a line of ceramics with antiviral properties of Copper Nanoparticles (NanCu)... The result is a capable protective layer that considerably eradicates infectious agents, creating disinfected architectural spaces free of health hazards.”

“A team of researchers at the University of Central Florida have created a new nanomaterial that repels water and can stay dry even when submerged underwater.”

Source: IEEE Spectrum <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspectrum.ieee.org%2Fantiferromagnets-ram&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443323586%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tntCH2evEHePFUiyrCzLusfaYm4q5XKRzaNeEmsg9vw%3D&reserved=0>  (2 September 2021)

Source: Fast Company <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fastcompany.com%2F90672135%2Fthis-wildly-reinvented-wind-turbine-generates-five-times-more-energy-than-its-competitors&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443333578%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=r5tcXQsiYFX3i5%2FKGJkc4UZRm%2BpDItVXBIjOgNNVR9c%3D&reserved=0>  (3 September 2021)

Source: Archdaily <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.archdaily.com%2F967341%2Fthe-benefits-of-copper-and-bio-c29-a-technology-that-eliminates-up-to-9-percent-of-fungi&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443333578%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=N%2Fo1pkQ6OX%2B6ZJVvujx2M8V3kbzrxv5NjUmxgv6zNJc%3D&reserved=0>  (8 September 2021)

Source: Eurekalert! <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eurekalert.org%2Fnews-releases%2F927654&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443343575%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=24el6mR7B4lptJ0umjGlFJyfp4u1Feat6b%2BzF5d%2Fk8U%3D&reserved=0>  (7 September 2021)

 

MATERIALS

Under Loading Ceramics Self-Heal Cracks By Forming Kink-Bands <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftoday.tamu.edu%2F2021%2F09%2F01%2Funder-loading-ceramics-self-heal-cracks-by-forming-kink-bands%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443343575%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BOS965Gb7qbN%2FFgMQjGgITXueutenwXlCv3uN5wpslw%3D&reserved=0> 

 

NANOWIRES

Hidden Bacterial Hairs Power Nature’s ‘Electric Grid’ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.yale.edu%2F2021%2F09%2F01%2Fhidden-bacterial-hairs-power-natures-electric-grid&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443353567%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=1PExvrGv6J0JKsFq7bv5jqwzy7hTmwTP8%2FAdt0YIbBw%3D&reserved=0> 

 

PHYSICS

Research Finally Reveals Ancient Universal Equation For The Shape Of An Egg <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kent.ac.uk%2Fnews%2Fscience%2F29620%2Fresearch-finally-reveals-ancient-universal-equation-for-the-shape-of-an-egg&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443363560%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BtQQfQrJQuifrulpWzolJAT72ZkQxZdBguo9muMpRhQ%3D&reserved=0> 

 

SMART HOME

Dina Katabi On A “Smart” Home With Actual Intelligence <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.mit.edu%2F2021%2Fqa-dina-katabi-smart-home-actual-intelligence-0907&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443363560%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=VEnf%2F%2FfZOScOLxuUiCS40JPOQRIwFuvv00L4IyQu1Gw%3D&reserved=0> 









“The current discovery that materials resilient to heat and extreme environments such as MAX phases, also self-heal cracks which may form during service can advance a host of next-generation technologies, for instance, efficient jet engines, hypersonic flights, and safer nuclear reactors.”

“A hair-like protein hidden inside bacteria serves as a sort of on-off switch for nature’s “electric grid,” a global web of bacteria-generated nanowires that permeates all oxygen-less soil and deep ocean beds, Yale researchers report in the journal Nature <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nature.com%2Farticles%2Fs41586-021-03857-w&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443373549%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=VMkQFt8kjAaENJ5Z6%2FwhqBEeX8csNmOOrasC4p8gOFo%3D&reserved=0> .”

“Researchers from Kent’s School of Biosciences, the Research Institute for Environment Treatment (Ukraine) and Vita-Market Ltd have discovered the universal mathematical formula that can describe any bird’s egg existing in nature, a feat which has been unsuccessful until now.”

“MIT professor is designing the next generation of smart wireless devices that will sit in the background, gathering and interpreting data, rather than being worn on the body.”

Source: TEXAS A&M UNIVERSITY <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftoday.tamu.edu%2F2021%2F09%2F01%2Funder-loading-ceramics-self-heal-cracks-by-forming-kink-bands%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443373549%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=O%2F0rYNlnqX%2FOeX2VW1T4lMd4dQF1MfHXk%2BSZHI0Aovw%3D&reserved=0>  (7 September 2021)

Source: Yale <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.yale.edu%2F2021%2F09%2F01%2Fhidden-bacterial-hairs-power-natures-electric-grid&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443383551%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2BowYgqk5ps5HeEqow4tgdAuQxt%2F6ZNOf5OKzC8uZ%2BCM%3D&reserved=0>  (1 September 2021)

Source: University of Kent <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kent.ac.uk%2Fnews%2Fscience%2F29620%2Fresearch-finally-reveals-ancient-universal-equation-for-the-shape-of-an-egg&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443383551%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=n8LrbDAokwqgJdB%2BIJicDW5%2F9Qjrs5HMqLAs0ywKEE8%3D&reserved=0> (31 August 2021)

Source: MIT News  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.mit.edu%2F2021%2Fqa-dina-katabi-smart-home-actual-intelligence-0907&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C66619a7dba3540c0493308d9740fbcd6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668433443393549%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YYnWFl%2BWavRLJU2kahRkEOV2jCytX5gh3yivmfAPZAo%3D&reserved=0> (7 September 2021)

Subject: RE: eDimension and Blue Integration with EASE
Body:
Dear Students,

 

This is a gentle reminder that you will be prompted for your EASE MFA in addition to your EASE ID and password when accessing eDimension and Blue (Subject and Instructor Evaluation). 

Please refer to the attached guides for your reference.

 

If you encounter any issue when accessing eDimension or Blue, please email to us at edi_admin@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:edi_admin@sutd.edu.sg> .

 

Regards,

eDimension Admin

 

 

From: EDimension Admin 
Sent: Monday, 23 August 2021 11:30 am
To: EDimension Admin <edi_admin@sutd.edu.sg>
Subject: eDimension and Blue Integration with EASE

 

Dear Students,

 

We are continuously improving the security of our Learning Systems to provide you with a safer cyber environment. We are pleased to announce that eDimension and Blue will be integrated with SUTD’s Enhanced Access and Secure Entry (EASE).

 

With this integration, Multifactor Authentication (MFA) will be used when accessing eDimension and Blue (Course Evaluation). 

 

From 30 Aug 2021 9:00 am, you will be prompted for your EASE MFA in addition to your EASE ID and password when accessing eDimension and Blue. 

 

Please refer to the attached guides for your reference.

 

If you encounter any issue when accessing eDimension and Blue, please email to us at edi_admin@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:edi_admin@sutd.edu.sg> .

 

Regards,

eDimension Admin

Subject: RE: Invitation to ESD Pillar Information Session (Fall 2021), 15 Sep 2021, 3.30pm (via Zoom)
Body:
Dear Term 3 Freshmores,

 

Wish to learn more about the career prospects of ESD graduates? 

 

Do join us at the ESD Pillar Info Session to learn more about ESD, and  hear from our alumni and their managers from Ernest and Young and Lazada.  

 

				
				
	
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


To register for the event, click here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce15fcdfdfbce4fbf803c08d97400f5b9%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668369997665731%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=H20I7gY4OmF%2BeSMY9LAixPsrnnOssCQqUnKhw%2BRYqwQ%3D&reserved=0> . (It will take you less than 1 minute to register!).  Alternatively, you can scan the QR code in the flyer below. 

 

We hope to see you all at the info session.

 

 

Regards,
Lee Cheng

 

 

From: Lim Lee Cheng 
Sent: Monday, August 30, 2021 9:52 AM
Cc: Lim Lee Chen <leechen_lim@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:leechen_lim@sutd.edu.sg> >
Subject: Invitation to ESD Pillar Information Session (Fall 2021), 15 Sep 2021, 3.30pm (via Zoom)

 

Dear All, 

 

Welcome back, hope it was a good term break for everyone. 😊 

 

You will be choosing your pillar of study very soon and to prepare you for making this important decision, we would like to invite you to an Information Session on the Engineering Systems and Design (ESD) Pillar on 15 September 2021 (Wednesday), 3.30pm to 5.30pm on Zoom.  

 

At this information session, you will learn more about ESD. You will also meet our ESD alumni and their managers to hear about their working experiences and views about ESD Programme.

 

To register for the event, please scan the QR code below or alternately, click this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce15fcdfdfbce4fbf803c08d97400f5b9%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668369997665731%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=H20I7gY4OmF%2BeSMY9LAixPsrnnOssCQqUnKhw%2BRYqwQ%3D&reserved=0> . (Form requires less than 1 minute to complete).

 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FmYkKd6YTLs&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce15fcdfdfbce4fbf803c08d97400f5b9%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668369997675729%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=b2tF%2BiPYLdrNUpkWZvq820bg7orbj09Cdk7%2BO51uQcE%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Looking forward to meeting all of you (online).

 

 

Best regards,
Lee Cheng

 

===

Lim Lee Cheng | Senior Associate (Undergraduate Studies) | Engineering Systems and Design 

Singapore University of Technology & Design | 8 Somapah Road | Singapore 487372 

leecheng_lim@sutd.edu.sg <mailto:aileen_koh@sutd.edu.sg>  | D +65 6434 8231

Tiktok’s 2022 Singapore Campus Recruitment Campaign
Thinking about where to kickstart your career? Look no further as Singapore TikTok Campus Recruitment 2022 is now LIVE with exciting positions from both tech and business fields.

TikTok prides ourselves to be a company that champions diversity and fosters a culture of inclusion among our global teams. Our employees are empowered to own their ideas, build fast, explore outside their comfort zone and support one another in the process.
This is what life at TikTok is all about!

Keen to learn more about our open positions?
Learn more about it here at 2022 Graduate Opportunities <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbytedance.feishu.cn%2Fdocs%2FdoccnuSk5jTtrar8cusNe4XfUPg&data=04%7C01%7CJunice_chua%40sutd.edu.sg%7C6eb641c33cc0468bd4bc08d96eba63ea%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637662569133950195%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=XIvAohrvQSG1nKJXrPt0wgDprLLKPVSNWRbcez97lhs%3D&reserved=0>  or 2022 Internship Opportunities <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbytedance.feishu.cn%2Fdocs%2FdoccnhFYuO21dvlpC3ZVg4pTZ50&data=04%7C01%7CJunice_chua%40sutd.edu.sg%7C6eb641c33cc0468bd4bc08d96eba63ea%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637662569133950195%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=pgve5G8rYNreEr78O31tbxE%2BNljTUg1f3f5gQTKUaJA%3D&reserved=0> . Read more <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1o9z5aNLEyfzL2foEo9KyhB_XSIhznvvG/view?usp=sharing> 

Apply by 30 November 2021

 <https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docs/doccnuSk5jTtrar8cusNe4XfUPg>  
All Students



	
Job & Internship Opportunities	


 

 

 

CSA Cybersecurity Development Programme  
Jan – Jul 2022 Intake
Passionate in Cybersecurity? CSA is hiring! Look forward to career opportunities in the areas of: Incident Response, Cybersecurity consultancy, Digital forensics, Malware analysis, Penetration testing, Engineering threat intellignence, Threat monitoring, Cybersecurity certifier. Read more <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qojYNN-Ew-WmpVjA_yuBBh11lPZICVY8/view> 

Apply by 26 September 2021
 <https://careers.pageuppeople.com/688/cwlive/en/job/561298/systems-engineer-cybersecurity-development-programme-csdp-csa-january-and-july-2022-intake>  
Seniors from CSD, EPD & ESD

Career Opportunities with NCS
NCS is a leading technology services firm with presence in Asia Pacific and partners with governments and enterprises to advance communities through technology. 

Nucleus is a 5-year programme that equips you with professional training, technical expertise and industry experience in your chosen field of specialisation.

 <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DNehhQmjlKbElXEsUW2nO5pdL2B0oyHz/view?usp=sharing>  
Seniors from CSD, EPD & ESD

Ensign Technical Graduate Programme
Ensign is launching their Technical Graduate Programme (TGP), with their first intake planned for 2022.

Ensign is a cyber-company with warmth and soul. They are ambitious, propelled by their vision to be the cyber defender of choice, and fueled by the dedication and camaraderie of individuals who are eager to make a difference, and leave their footprints in the industry.

Join them to find out more about their TGP! Interact with cyber professionals from their FOUR different business units and learn more about what they do. Read more <https://drive.google.com/file/d/14BenN03eCaD6LJDdQVKtDuvX0Q5wz6z9/view?usp=sharing> 

20 Sep 2021 | 0930hrs – 1200hrs | Virtual Platform 

&

 22 Oct 2021 | 1330hrs – 1600hrs | Virtual Platform 

 <https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9AjL1YjTski8Ao7M48Y_zncNvR-1RYdNjT4gar6JqRxUOERHOUZNSkxTQUJMRDlXNkNXVUZNRFRQVCQlQCN0PWcu&utm_source=Open+house+TGP+&utm_medium=hybrid&utm_campaign=recruitment>  
All Students

	


Recruitment Talks 




 


Start your adventure with DSO!
Apply what you learnt into actual work that makes a real difference to our nation’s defence! Find out about full time and internship roles with DSO. Do not miss this opportunity to let them walk you through what it is like to be an Engineer and Researcher with DSO! 
Read more <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrK5GiKwq8NVlwjy3OzvEX3LWSFrTsH6/view?usp=sharing> 

24 Sep 2021 | 1430hrs | Virtual Platform

Apply by 21 September 2021
 <https://sutd-csm.symplicity.com/students/?s=event&ss=is&mode=form&id=5577dc2b54b69be5fb697366567c1f92>  
Juniors & Seniors from EPD, ESD & CSD








	
Career Tips & Advice	

 

6 Great Questions to Ask Your Interviewer
In interviews, hiring managers and recruiters will inevitably ask, “So, do you have any questions for me?” And when they do, you better have at least a few questions prepared to ask. As for which questions you should ask, below are six great ones, all of which will show that you’ve prepared for your interview and are very interested in the job you’re interviewing for.  Read more <https://access.vault.com/recordurl?nid=267036&wid=274402&vid=1> 


Click HERE  <http://access.vault.com/career-insider-login.aspx?aid=274402>  for full access and more career resources on Vault.com.
The service is free of charge for SUTD students and Alumni.
How Career Planning Can Help You Get Ahead
Are you feeling stuck in a boring and unfulfilling job? Or maybe you’re looking for a job but you’re not clear on which career direction you should pursue? No matter what stage of your career you find yourself in, career planning can help you establish a focused vision and achieve your full potential in your career. Read more <https://access.vault.com/recordurl?nid=263986&wid=274402&vid=1>

Subject: SUTDio Welcomes you!
Body:
Hello Freshmores and SUTDents!

 

SUTDio welcomes you to join our collective! 

 

 

Interested in the area of architecture, art and design, but don’t know where to start? Fret not! SUTDio is a safe space to meet like-minded people and experiment!

 

Join us at our introductory workshop: Rhino3D Modelling 101 - Be A Starchitect 

 



 

You will get to learn how to model buildings designed by Starchitects such as Sou Fujimoto and Tadao Ando! It does not matter your proficiency, just bring yourself and your friends to join us for 2 nights of bonding and fun! 

 

Key info:

Dates: 16th and 23rd of September

Time: 8-10pm

Venue: Think Tank 26 (limited to 20pax!!)

Due to the covid restrictions, the session will also be live-streamed for those who are unable to join us face-to-face!

 

What are you waiting for? Sign up now!! https://forms.office.com/r/paE20Ck3Mk <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FpaE20Ck3Mk&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C88ba3b2f6e714c4bc64808d973f6e1b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668326813541476%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UgvNda3bticF0%2BgsYm9ZmWASD4%2Bvaaj7ddMtVrIck3k%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Do follow us on Instagram @sutd.io or join our telegram group for updates! https://t.me/joinchat/Y--bRmGrKDM4YTM1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FY--bRmGrKDM4YTM1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C88ba3b2f6e714c4bc64808d973f6e1b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668326813551469%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bNWQjKbQp%2Fbkyg4eymZD%2FAdSOInHrYfKFCk6I4ghSng%3D&reserved=0> 

 

You can also head down to our website for the slew of projects SUTDio has worked on over the years! https://sutdio.opensutd.org <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdio.opensutd.org%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C88ba3b2f6e714c4bc64808d973f6e1b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668326813551469%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Ya4JQ0dosnoQ%2B36wSNTq290lHACOGXo5rD8Ylot2cmE%3D&reserved=0>  (https://sutdio.opensutd.org/)/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsutdio.opensutd.org%2F)%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C88ba3b2f6e714c4bc64808d973f6e1b1%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668326813561468%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4XbloR8T6sc%2BVBqOHtsan1abjZLEa%2F5vgCnpNUJkUdY%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Cheers!

Subject: ♔ SUTD Chess Presents: THE SUTD WEEK OF CHESS ♚
Body:
Hey all,

 

Are you a beginner who was inspired by The Queen's Gambit to pick up chess? Perhaps you're a long-time player looking for a new club to meet fellow enthusiasts? Or maybe you're a tournament-level player, searching for a team to train and compete with?

 

Regardless of your skill level, I'd like to invite you to join SUTD Chess! We aim to create a welcoming community where lovers of this beautiful game can learn from each other, have fun, and make new friendships.

 

Already in? You can join by filling up this form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781287947%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tltTOBB%2FGd8DHrvQb7cB0%2Bwdn%2FpIJXwC3qehCTOVZ1k%3D&reserved=0>  - we have regular online sessions on the official SUTD Chess Discord server <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781287947%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=oRPEYpmIymHnIQ0fWpqT6xGADXfj3UvV0NC07RCZb2E%3D&reserved=0>  every Tuesday from 2000 - 2200 (Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNzJkNzhnMmRobWFyMXRpM25iNmFiMWpvOG5fMjAyMTA5MDdUMTIwMDAwWiBreXJhd255QG0%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com%26scp%3DALL&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781297943%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=VAs6i74txw3Ds%2FMWwbFmqZxk2olnnEVhkRpyZoHr6GM%3D&reserved=0> ). See you there!

 

Not exactly convinced yet? I’d tell you about the many activities and events our members host and participate in regularly - but why do that when I can just show you? Introducing:

 

♙ ♘ ♗ ♖ ♕ ♔ THE SUTD WEEK OF CHESS ♚ ♛ ♜ ♝ ♞ ♟

 

In the coming days, our members will be hosting many events that cater to players of all skill and commitment levels. These events reflect the usual activities of SUTD Chess, so you can join them to get a taste of what we’re about. Here is the full schedule - click on the name of each event to jump to a detailed description:

 

2021 Asian University Chess Championship Watch Party

Supp​​​ort SUTD, Support Singapore

Support two of our best players, Jason Peng and Yogesh Shelgaonkar, as they represent Singapore at the 2021 Asian University Chess Championship! Watch the games and cheer along with the rest of SUTD Chess.

Sep 10, Fri, 1400 - 1745

Sep 11, Sat, 1400 - 1745

Sep 12, Sun, 1400 - 1745

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DN2k5ZTZ2dmtpcWpiaWxrdDlydnBkMmNtczBfMjAyMTA5MTBUMDYwMDAwWiBreXJhd255QG0%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com%26scp%3DALL&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781297943%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=PR96UkUX707NNOZqfOUtfYSFz6z0UwwWDEKIWctLKpA%3D&reserved=0> 

Join the party and chill with us on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781307936%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=snTFVkhcFbsr33HZ3a3hNCDSL7ZlOltprMJD8mD4eRE%3D&reserved=0> !

Or watch the party and games on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781307936%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2B4Ax3vyPBV43%2FABmucWjb%2BOJK11qsiqujRAX3MqaHko%3D&reserved=0> , if you don't want to commit to joining the Discord.

Beginner Crash Course

Learn To Beat Your Family At Chess (Maybe)

Learn the rules of chess (with some fun historical trivia thrown in), basic opening principles, fundamental tactics like forks and pins, and some vital endgame techniques. Anyone can play good chess!

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2100

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNDBpYTlqMGg4dTIycjNoNjUybTVkODk1OGsga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781317931%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=8W6UCv4IMtdvmBl7ssD7LBw6WTOgTKe3KLmZQ7ivZNs%3D&reserved=0> 

Create a Chessable account <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fregister%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781327925%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=qpKt%2Bm9zASa8vIcNQWTfw2qWNTH8t1ZwA5ofHrbpN2E%3D&reserved=0>  and join the Chessable Classroom <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fclassroom%2Fkywa&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781327925%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=xwZoQLU%2F1xRyJK%2BlwNXcSIcD%2FCzuzfe%2FudQ%2Bhepypgc%3D&reserved=0>  if you want to participate actively!

Join Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781337925%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=W5CeuttgTu4l%2FN%2FGB3u%2BbZHywTcV%2BbRbguhXJLBiB84%3D&reserved=0>  or Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781337925%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=oAf0DCK5tG1VEpjMIftmXGb2S4y3omJTc%2BBmsaGFdCA%3D&reserved=0>  if you just want to watch.

Club Player Conversations: Game Analysis

Perspectives From And For Non-Titled Scrubs

A sharing session for our members to learn how others enjoy and improve at chess, and perhaps find new ideas that they can incorporate into their own systems. Three different perspectives on how to analyse your games, followed by a free-for-all discussion.

Sep 14, Tue, 2100 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNGpham0yNWVsb3Nkdmw4dDlibzEzaHVxNTQga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781347923%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=eQQNRu%2F7TC8RVd2qltTL3Q4awAZTRre4ubQGfveafag%3D&reserved=0> 

Join the conversation on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781347923%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9tWcGPp6xZfyA3KF%2ByLrndPi8MzP9sjEqxsxd%2FxqVlk%3D&reserved=0> !

Or watch on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781357908%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2eeMpZLDfci1oT8hJqo7Fymj6T5rvDqIdMXib7fHgRY%3D&reserved=0> , if you don't want to commit to joining the Discord.

Casual Games

I Just Want To Play, Dude

Beginner Crash Course

Learn To Beat Your Family At Chess (Maybe)

 

Sep 14, Tue, 2000 - 2100

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNDBpYTlqMGg4dTIycjNoNjUybTVkODk1OGsga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781417875%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=a64qkkaKqVM2YOTjYVZ8ZOrJ9v%2Fl%2BbQqAcqtenlvMVY%3D&reserved=0> 

 

When most people say they “know how to play chess”, what they usually mean is “they know how the pieces move”. While knowing the rules is of course an important part of any game, there’s a lot more to playing chess than just moving the knight in an L-shape. 

 

But what if I told you that, in one hour, I can teach you enough about chess to beat most people? Just by learning some basic principles, you can bring your whole army into the attack, winning you more games - and perhaps you’ll even gain a greater appreciation of the depth and beauty that can be found in this game.

 

In this 1-hour crash course targeted at players ranging from “complete beginner” to “my parents taught me a bit when I was a kid”, I’ll be covering the rules of chess (with some fun historical trivia thrown in), basic opening principles, fundamental tactics like forks and pins, and some vital endgame techniques. While the lesson will be streamed on Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781427869%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=wW2r8hcJx76Phga9j6H9nK5U0TraUwS42hKza3GmCRg%3D&reserved=0>  and Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781427869%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=q0%2FfLUbNjxtvAwQa9oAYq3AtOAWX8NOls3lFTDnE1lE%3D&reserved=0> , if you’d like to participate actively by guessing answers to the questions I’ll be asking, do create a Chessable account <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fregister%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781437863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=q8pda6JxenU%2BHwnTI%2B6zlA%2B4i%2FGNCipwaJcHebwlQwA%3D&reserved=0>  and join the Chessable Classroom <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chessable.com%2Fclassroom%2Fkywa&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781437863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=cUMUxLCITBTlaIxvmYVaU%2FGDsKyycy9XJ%2BAMz1YCGr4%3D&reserved=0>  when the crash course starts. It’s a lot more fun and engaging than just watching me talk, and I highly recommend it.

 

If you find that you enjoy this and would like to learn and improve more, or if you’d like to host lessons yourself, do join SUTD Chess <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781447854%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=pLIWgQpDzejsuWJquLNOIsogAacHZsW2eTZ0HExPmHg%3D&reserved=0> , because we have in-depth beginner workshops planned for the entire term.

Club Player Conversations: Game Analysis

Perspectives From And For Non-Titled Scrubs

 

Sep 14, Tue, 2100 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DNGpham0yNWVsb3Nkdmw4dDlibzEzaHVxNTQga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781457854%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=18NBKw8mdXg8b690zB%2FAzfVRnJWUlU5Yk7On4a3D640%3D&reserved=0> 

 

There are no titled players in SUTD Chess right now (unless IM Tin Jingyao decides to transfer from NUS). We’re just passionate adult improvers, wanting to find other chess lovers to play and grow with. So we’re not going to claim that we have the ability to conduct high quality workshops on advanced concepts like positional play or opening clinics - at least not ones that can surpass the immense amount of free content already available on YouTube made by actual GMs.

 

We can, however, facilitate conversations about the most subjective part of chess: chess improvement. It is so easy to find lectures on specific openings and endgames, but how does one actually go about using all these resources? There are no right or wrong answers to this question - as adult improvers, we are not likely to ever get a full-time chess-related job, so regardless of whatever methods we use to learn chess or however much time we choose to invest, the most important thing to remember is to make sure we’re having fun doing it.

 

Even then, it can be daunting to come up with a workflow or technique that works for you, especially from scratch. Club Player Conversations is thus not a lecture, but a sharing session for our members to learn how others enjoy and improve at chess, and perhaps find new ideas that they can incorporate into their own systems.

 

This session will be focused on techniques for game analysis. Jason and Yogesh, the two players who will be representing Singapore in the abovementioned 2021 Asian University Chess Championship, will each analyse a game that they played from the championship using their own personal methods. I will also share my method that incorporates an academic note-taking system I use for my PhD research, which links reference games together through notes on major themes and ideas. The last 15 to 30 minutes will be for open discussion among all attendees. The entire thing will be streamed to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781457854%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kKcrzu3x6FJ1EhGqa8E2zoZFXlFm7QO%2Fik%2FjOpgEscg%3D&reserved=0> , but if you want to actively participate, do join Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781467846%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hYxi5%2FoeBi4t%2FlfcAwCQYxtk4ixoLhl4QT3ZPsTaaxM%3D&reserved=0>  where it will be hosted.

 

We plan to host Club Player Conversations for other topics like opening study and tactics training throughout the term, so do join SUTD Chess <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781467846%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=W7lIPUOc3g39HsYSlk64JqJjUfIjz5%2B60kd6plDDURg%3D&reserved=0>  if you find this interesting and useful.

Not super interested in the Beginner Crash Course or the Club Player Conversations? Tuesdays are also our regular online sessions, and on weeks without special events, we just meet up for games and hang out. If you’d like to find other people to play with, hop onto Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781477842%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=SVpTJi2%2B0CZ9b3bs0UesEJmAN2wYfx9OrNdWXTyobxw%3D&reserved=0>  and we’ll try to match you up to other like-minded players. SUTD Chess isn’t just for hardcore players - if you just want a community to chill with and play low-commitment games with, we’d love to welcome you to join us <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781487836%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=xgQ3m6OQQruA8KbxcupFrQdS9yQUbWHC4g3q0YuftRI%3D&reserved=0>  as well.

 

⏏︎ Back to Full Schedule ⏏︎

 

♙♙♙

 

FINALE

SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament

 

Sep 16, Thu, 2000 - 2200

Add to Google Calendar <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendar.google.com%2Fevent%3Faction%3DTEMPLATE%26tmeid%3DMjZuMnBjbG40Zm1qNnJrNGM5Y3FvMm42am8ga3lyYXdueUBt%26tmsrc%3Dkyrawny%2540gmail.com&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781487836%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=JWtmhFcvAgZ71%2FV%2FcWfLI4J4uEc1H%2BIMkRgXk2Ie7oo%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Eager to put what you’ve learnt in the previous events to the test? Or maybe you were already ready to checkmate your way to victory when you first read this email? Either way, the SUTD Week Of Chess ends with a bang, in the form of a 4-round Swiss tournament!

 

The tournament will be held on Lichess.org, with a time control of 7+5 (each player starts with 7 minutes on the clock and receives an increment of 5 seconds each time they make a move). Games are not rated, so don't worry about losing rating. The winner of the tournament will win a tournament-size chess set, with a cloth-backed vinyl board and full-sized wooden pieces!

 



 

To participate, follow these steps:

1.	Join SUTD Chess. Fill up the sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781497828%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ehL4MVL%2BaJQit8FqR3vVgExTNcfC5IIMtehPR9mULbc%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. Make sure the details are accurate - any users in the tournament that cannot be matched to a submitted username in the form will be kicked after this timing.
2.	Join the Lichess.org team <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fteam%2F3-0-0-ke7&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781497828%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=LyhFI3tZDBy5HWnfdsQBB%2BDm18LfritFtrJbzqug3RU%3D&reserved=0>  and then the SUTD Week Of Chess Tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fswiss%2FIYgrABpc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781507823%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=cHeKo2a0hZqODk3EIMHiUx3IUkefMgx1YVJhZ5DB5eU%3D&reserved=0>  by Sep 16, Thu, 1800. You can find the password to join the team on Discord.
3.	Be in the Discord's <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781507823%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=BpCUnkUOISbkXK%2FdRmuCUj0rDrqGkThFx8S95ocIEvI%3D&reserved=0>  lounge voice channel by Sep 16, Thu, 2000, and have your webcam video and your screen shared for the duration of the tournament, to ensure fair play. You can find how to share your video and your screen on Discord here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.discord.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Farticles%2F360041721052-Video-Calls%23h_c5102ceb-10c0-46f0-abe4-f8efc2e39ee9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781517817%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CbnJS26veJOeuGBJ2Fi%2BojdMH7DUyW3e6WYtuz5yefE%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Just want to watch the games? Yogesh, Jason, and I will be commentating on the games on Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781517817%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0W02MRS8%2FxJ9EuK7QP63ssG5eN44UYuq2AJayADzYVA%3D&reserved=0> .

 

However, even if you're a beginner or if you don't think you will end up winning, I hope you will still join the tournament instead of just watching. I only started playing chess last December, and while I have yet to win one, I find that playing in tournaments have been the most fun and beneficial experiences I've had. The drive to win is a really good motivator, and remember: "The master has lost more games than the beginner has ever played." Just put yourself out there and you won't regret it. If you want more tournament experience, sign up <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9763671d08364dd06c9008d973f6565d%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668324781527809%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=nLZ%2BjGFZXDG8JwvToMYcovuWF3v3fQWPr3yAj1NEJLc%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: because we hold friendly tournaments every month or so
Body: and will give everyone chances to represent SUTD in varsity chess tournaments like the Asian University Chess Championship and the NUS Invitationals.

Subject: 🏐🏐Interested in Volleyball? Join us now!!🏐🏐
Body:
🏐TO ALL SUTDents!!🏐

 

If you have ever watched the impressive plays from international matches, were you aspired to play like them? 

Be it you are an experience player who wanted to continue your volleyball journey, or you always wanted to try it out, have fun and start learning but never had a chance, it is never too late to do it in now! SUTD Volleyball club is the place for you to continue your volleyball journey. 

 



 

We will be hosting an introductory session on 21 Sep 2021, 7pm to 9pm​ ​at ISH 2​.  No prior experience is required! We accept everyone of all skill levels.

 

So, what are you waiting for? Fill up the form and join us now!! Limited slots available 🏐

Sign up form link: https://forms.office.com/r/FkgajtQz9K <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FFkgajtQz9K&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cc109e9a174c5438570e708d973f04d2b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668298490286154%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=94j3M0WswYIuxMby9vc8kKKw7my3XZzvCE89FMsV3lE%3D&reserved=0>   

 

Join the telegram group for freshies here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FWdldTD4kUE44NWQ9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cc109e9a174c5438570e708d973f04d2b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637668298490296148%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2BYZF6Tn4nn59zBiOumowc75S7upw3ee1OweLAIvtgog%3D&reserved=0>  for updates!

 

What do you need to bring?

Just yourself, sport shoes and water bottle to keep yourself hydrated.  Do bring along your knee pads if you have a pair.

 

Where and when do we usually train?

Mens' Training: Every Tuesday 8pm-10pm at ISH 2

Womens' Training: Every Friday 8pm-10pm at ISH 2

 

Feel free to reach out to us!

If you have any questions, do contact any of us through the following:

Telegram:

SUTD Volleyball President & Women's Team Captain - Mandis (@mandisloh)

Mens' Team Captain and SUTD Volleyball Vice-President - Elliot (@ellotlow)

Womens' Team Vice-Captain and SUTD Volleyball Vice-President - Li Ling (@tlling30)

 

 

Watch our open house video to learn more about us: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FVF1SHj__8c

 

 

Follow us on Instagram for more updates: @vballsutd

Email: volleyball@club.sutd.edu.sg <mailto:volleyball@club.sutd.edu.sg> 

 

See you there!!

 

飛べ,

SUTD Volleyball

Subject: SUTD Cricket 🏏
Body:
Hello, Freshies and SUTDents,

 

Hope you all had a meaningful and restful break.

 

To those of you looking for a fun-filled Fifth Row that improves your overall fitness, stamina, and hand-eye coordination, register your interest for SUTD’s very own Cricket Club today! Trainings currently take place every Friday 7-9 pm, and no prior experience is required!

 

Do fill up this form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.google.com%2Fforms%2Fd%2F16o9g4O4TeaK0EFECAAjHAihMpKFVxhpufj7Bi_U7a6Q%2Fedit%3Fusp%3Dsharing&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465095174%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=mndOyz4NhPmkbq4WbXyCuKXAM0%2B41XVygMX0%2BoCYFr4%3D&reserved=0>  if you are interested, and join our Telegram group at @SUTD Cricket <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FAN1O0v5IwCU1YmM1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465105173%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QZXhNsjyrVEM8gkuT2kit4m8WZJW9acVAnyXnzpD2zM%3D&reserved=0>  and follow our Instagram page @sutd.cricket <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutd.cricket%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465115162%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=shQsMXQBSNtuwGFP8cgR3hEJxcU8z0VomnIVXZi6ByE%3D&reserved=0>  for more updates.

 

For any enquiries, please feel free to message the exco members on telegram.

 

Aditya Vishwanath (President) @aditya_v <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Faditya_v&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465115162%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=MtLd%2BbY22HECrlCrd3rQ3yCulMkqqSYIRvwGOx7u6Is%3D&reserved=0> 

Anirudh Harikrishnan (Vice-President) @anirhc <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fanirhc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465125156%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=q0X%2BldjobmHge7CoCHlDY7N6hT3oP2smy9y1EvBtgYw%3D&reserved=0> 

Chirag Shivakumar (Secretary) @ChiragShiva <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2FChiragShiva&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C9e6dbcbe4387467a8cc908d97387c95e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667849465135166%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UNx8clUAtIo360Dycx2i%2B9v%2Br6DSOYBBi8IBqdr8XDM%3D&reserved=0> 

 

We welcome you to the SUTD Cricket Family and hope to see you there!

 

 



Cheers,

SUTD Cricket

Subject: RE: [For SUTD] Exclusive Invitation to Ministry of Foreign Affairs Networking Session - September 2021
Body:
· Networking Session 2021 ·

A Foreign Service career is more than just a job.

If you are interested to be on the frontline of global developments and diplomatic negotiations to safeguard and advance Singapore's interests, or if you are keen to manage core functions which include assisting overseas Singaporeans in distress and facilitating formalities and courtesies, a career at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs as a Foreign Service Officer may be right for you.

With over 50 Overseas Missions, being part of the Foreign Service offers unparalleled opportunities and rewards. Depending on your competencies, your career can develop along the Functional and Corporate or Political and Economic track. 



 

 

· What to Expect ·

 

With the valuable opportunity to hear from and network with our Foreign Service Officers, the networking session is a platform for interested students to get a better understanding of MFA’s work and the challenges of working in the Foreign Service.

 

    

 

· Event Details ·

 

Date:        Thursday, 16 September 2021
Time:        2.30pm to 4.30pm
Platform:  Zoom

RSVP by 13 September 2021

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.gov.sg%2Fmfa-septnetworkingsession-21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C1b2ce1cb4eb9469f11b108d9737dd495%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667806592888583%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=CmOTqJUnneW8o0%2BfXSNzNX1clK1Na7olL2UvdjTQ8u0%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: RE: Invitation to Supply Chain Hackathon 2021 supported by YCH - Apply by 20 Sept 2021
Body:
The Young SEAkers is proud to announce that we will be hosting the first-of-its-kind Supply Chain Hackathon <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2Ftyshacksite&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca53f3e5e5692409f136508d97379ed65%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667789831828558%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=s2JfmwWzm7K7HJWXcngY0uFUWVaQruZcg1U609hW%2Bmw%3D&reserved=0>  supported by YCH, Singapore's largest home-grown supply chain solutions company, and it is our pleasure to invite your students to be a part of this Hackathon. 

 

ABOUT THE YOUNG SEAKERS (TYS)

The Young SEAkers is the first and only Southeast-Asia based non-profit with a China and ASEAN angle. We aspire to bring together vibrant, competent ASEAN youths who are passionate about advancing the ASEAN-China region. Headquartered in Singapore, The Young SEAkers is currently in the process of setting up regional chapters across all 10 ASEAN countries.

 

ABOUT YCH GROUP

YCH is Singapore’s largest home-grown supply chain solutions company and leading regional supply chain management partner to many of the world’s leading brands across Asia Pacific.

 

We believe this is a great opportunity for students to gain exposure and new insights into the supply chain industry. Winning teams will stand a chance to win an employment opportunity with YCH, including the YCH Management Associate Programme placement for top prize winners, Fast-track Internship offer and Winter Immersion Programme for runner-ups.

 

The timeline of the hackathon is as follows: 

*	​Registration: OPEN
*	​Registration Deadline: 20th September 
*	​Participant Shortlisting: 24th September
*	​Hackathon: 1st to 3rd October

For more information, kindly refer to our website <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2Ftyshacksite&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ca53f3e5e5692409f136508d97379ed65%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667789831838553%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=AsUjedWpxndg%2B8iAHG2DleBkMZ0Nemu7Xs02py4flR4%3D&reserved=0> . Please reach out to us at hackathon@theyoungseakers.com <mailto:hackathon@theyoungseakers.com>  if you have any questions or if you need any additional information. 

 

Thank you! 

 

Cheers,

 

Davina Tham
Employer Relations
Career Development Centre

 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/>

M: +65 8161 2975

Subject: RE: EY - Upcoming Career Workshops - Personal Brand and Workplace Readiness
Body:
Hope you’re well! 

EY is having some upcoming workshops and will like to invite you to join! 

 

Personal Brand Workshop

Date: Tuesday, 21 September 2021
Time: 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m.

Brand image. Brand awareness. Brand affinity. If you think these concepts are relevant only to corporations, think again, because a strong brand can do for you what it does for them: to differentiate you from your closest competitors, increase visibility, enhance credibility and more. You have experiences to share and goals to achieve. Let us help you build your brand identity for today’s digital world.

 

Workplace readiness workshop
Date: Thursday, 23 September 2021
Time: 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m.

GPA? Pass. Technical excellence? Check. Workplace readiness, resilience and emotional intelligence? Wait a second – how do employers assess that, and how do you make sure you’re ready? In this workplace readiness workshop, join us for a candid discussion about the soft skills that will equip you to thrive in the workplace. From stress management to future readiness, gain insights into the traits that make for productive employees and effective teams, help accelerate career progression and which are most desired by employers.

 

Register here: https://forms.office.com/r/Zhk3g963wU <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FZhk3g963wU&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C289615f9e4814c5e850808d97377f913%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667783045879792%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ro6JWJgnczYkBKaZCZpOnl39CH%2BD1agx7dPHz%2FQDNgM%3D&reserved=0> 

 


Regards,

 

Davina Tham
Employer Relations
Career Development Centre

 <https://www.sutd.edu.sg/> 

T: +65 6499 4628
M: +65 8161 2975

Subject: DO Connects Networking Session
Body:
Hi SUTDents!

 

Ever had an idea to benefit society but the only issue is... you don't know where to begin? How about having a dream to help those who really need help in our midst, but you do not know how to help them?

 

Well, Design Odyssey (DO) is that one thing you can look forward to if you do not know where to start! Haven't heard about us before? You might be wondering, hmmm why such a complex naming?  It's actually really simple! DO is the place where you are guided to uncover the root causes of the problems where you want to be the spark for change. Over here, you can learn about how to discover, design, develop and deliver innovative solutions that help improve our society and the environment!

 

Join us for a Networking Session where you will get a chance to meet like-minded individuals with whom you can share ideas and collaborate, and to learn more about what we do in DO. We will also be answering all your questions about us during a Q&A session with our DO exco! 

 

Date: 10 Sep 2021 (Friday)

Time: 8pm - 9:30pm

Venue: Zoom (details to be sent via email later)

 

Sign up now via this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FpQFCkHo9dNnAwqet5&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cd1962f27ce994c9a731008d973736954%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667762305615836%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YcIkYLchHKhxI2c%2FFEmqwSnrwVIZuKfJ0HK8bfndX14%3D&reserved=0>  !!!

 

Join our telegram group here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2F7JBQMnY_frNkMTE1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cd1962f27ce994c9a731008d973736954%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667762305625825%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ajEpb9D6TtzvRjOVLjecAP8PPTYQtljE0LlnQMvGjDA%3D&reserved=0>  as well to stay updated on our upcoming events or to ask us any questions! 

 

Hope to see you at DO Connects!

 

 



 

All our best,

The Design Odyssey team

Subject: SUTD JUDO Introductory Session
Body:
Hello Freshies and SUTDents! 


Thinking of trying a new sport? Want to lift more than just weights? How about people?

We have good news! SUTD Judo will be conducting intro sessions open to all! 




Judo is a Martial Art that consists of grappling, throwing and groundwork instead of striking. If you love physical contact and rolling around, this is the sport for you! 




Intro Session Details

What: By the end of the session, you will know how to do break falls, rolls, basic judo throwing and groundwork techniques!

When: 16th September Thursday and 20th September Monday, 7pm-8pm and 8pm-9pm


Where: Dance Studio 6 (Block 61, right above the gym!)


Who: You! (Our intro sessions are open to all students, including Term 3, Pillar and Postgraduate students)


How: Sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FQKffrsLA7v&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8e620b9f36e844649b2408d9737220c8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667756584393670%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Hpuu3v5XN0qJifkNv5XJkB%2FnlkowpEc1ElFnFWdVds4%3D&reserved=0> 


Attire: Any comfortable sports shirt and shorts. No shoes required! Just come in your slippers!




No experience? No sports or martial arts background? No worries! We are open to both inexperienced and experienced players. Judo is a sport accepting of all genders, shapes and sizes!




Do join our Telegram group at t.me/sutdjudo2021 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fsutdjudo2021&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8e620b9f36e844649b2408d9737220c8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667756584403663%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=OJP58LTKrgCzcr8ugzN6hnrC8k0AHRFxr1mbVXoED70%3D&reserved=0>  and follow our Instagram page @sutdjudo <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Finstagram.com%2Fsutdjudo&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8e620b9f36e844649b2408d9737220c8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667756584543582%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yKHPJHl1tS%2F6XRLh9GaddWZCqmO%2Bg6nqHqzMddxei84%3D&reserved=0>  for more updates or to find out more! Watch our Open House Video here <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MqLa8lfs8Xs> !




Note: Deadline for 16/9 and 20/9 signups are 13/9 and 17/9 respectively. We also have limited slots for our intro sessions due to studio capacity. 




So, what are you waiting for? Sign up now <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FQKffrsLA7v&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8e620b9f36e844649b2408d9737220c8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667756584543582%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2e80c2%2FATw%2FpXY48wUpudOZlr7U5%2FhxTYIXTwRAcxQI%3D&reserved=0> !




We welcome you to join our SUTD Judo Family! See you there!










Cheers, 


SUTD Judo

Subject: SUTD Badminton Recruitment and Introductory Sessions!! 🏸🏸🏸
Body:
HI FRESHIES!! 👋👋👋

Welcome to SUTD!! We hope you have had a meaningful and well-rested break! 🤩 

To all players, be it those who are looking for casual games and making new friends, or those who are looking towards becoming a more well-rounded player, SUTD Badminton welcomes ALL OF YOU!!!

Our badminton sessions are usually on Monday (7-11pm) and Wednesday (7-11pm).

If you are interested to find out more, or to have a taste of how our SUTD Badminton club is like, do come for our introductory sessions!! 😋

Details for the introductory sessions:
Date: 13 September 2021, 20 September 2021
Time: 7-9pm, 9-11pm
Venue: Indoor Sports Hall 2
Attire: Sports attire (if you have rackets and court shoes, do bring them!! if not, sports shoes are also fine! We’ll also provide some rackets for y’all!!)



Link to sign up for the introductory session:
https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPURpvIKwuZhEo2VIbkl1tcpUNVVMQjZFNTFBVkRLVUcxTVhFWlRPMk5YRi4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPURpvIKwuZhEo2VIbkl1tcpUNVVMQjZFNTFBVkRLVUcxTVhFWlRPMk5YRi4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7b04a42f7eb0442d647708d97368c0d5%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667716180207830%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Yv6mURJ4bM8X74CA2vLDKcQbhPIFQvOdw0S65EA1QxQ%3D&reserved=0> 



To competitive players, if you are interested in representing the school in the SUNIG games, do come for our SUNIG team trial!!

Trial Details:
Date: 22 September 2021
Time: 7-9pm
Venue: Indoor Sports Hall 2

Do join our telegram group for more details and updates too!!! 😁
