Subject: DBS Virtual Seminar: Take Charge of Your Financial Wellness
Body:
Yo SUTDents!


Have you always wondered how you are going to budget and save your money when you are university? How you should grow your money while you are studying? Look no further! MarketWatch has partnered with DBS to offer SUTDents various sessions to take charge of their own finances. In our first session, we will be exploring the topic of budgeting, various money saving tips and DBS NAV Planner to track your own financial goals. More details can be found in the poster below and we hope to see you all there!

Date: 23 September 2021 (Thurs) 
Time: 6pm-7pm

To register for the webinar, scan the QR code in the poster or click here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.dbs.com%2Fssmcsep21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb64aec38d9424430602e08d973527692%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667620535374268%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Y1pzY83PKzd3S7z%2B%2FiWbPS%2Ffq8ldrERBbJd6257Pees%3D&reserved=0> .






Thank you!



Best Regards,
SUTD MarketWatch Exco Team 


	
SUTD MarketWatch 5th Executive Committee (2020)
marketwatch@club.sutd.edu.sg

Singapore University of Technology & Design (SUTD)
8 Somapah Road, Singapore 487372

Subject: SUTD Football Recruitment
Body:
Welcome to SUTD!! 😁

The SUTD Football Club⚽ would like you to join our family!!!  

 


We have both Men's and Ladies' Football Teams! 

We welcome EVERYONE who is interested in football, wants to experience a team sport, or even try out a new sport! 

👍 NO EXPERIENCE IS NEEDED, just your enthusiasm and good vibes! 😎 

 

Join our telegram group for the latest updates and information!

Football Freshies ‘21 Telegram Group: https://t.me/joinchat/CZYBxJqFXxQ3MjNl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FCZYBxJqFXxQ3MjNl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfafa158aab19463c672a08d97344cbf8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667561871468624%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=udtiMT33gjVPNBXWYrqOBlTE8lgsVaOHAzCbo9PtfAM%3D&reserved=0> 




Freshmore 2021 Football Introductory Session




Dates: 21 September (Tuesday) and 23rd September (Thursday)


Time: 8pm - 10pm

Venue: SUTD Football Field

What to bring: Comfortable sports attire. Bring a water bottle and sports shoes (football boots if you have), as well as long football socks and shin pads if you have any.

SIGN UP NOW!!! Each session will be limited to 40 participants only (first come- first serve basis). 


Sign up form: https://tinyurl.com/footballfreshies21 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftinyurl.com%2Ffootballfreshies21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cfafa158aab19463c672a08d97344cbf8%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667561871478621%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=DzCPgIIIxWReSK1yVqBSDAXuszESsIEIkVmQdO%2FXajk%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Dance DerivativeZ Freshie Trials
Body:
~~~~~~ hello friends come come ~~~~~~




ddz is a street dance (hiphop) club that accepts anyone regardless of their dance experience. all of us (except maybe 4-5 people?) have never danced a day in our lives, but we're all out here having fun and vibing together. so if you've ever thought to yourself, "dance looks pretty nice but..." no. fam. there's no but. give dance a chance and sign up for our trials!! judgement free zone for real. these are the details you need:








trial dates:
~ 17 sept (friday)
~ 22 sept (wednesday)
~ 24 sept (friday)




and every date has the same two session timings:
~ session 1: 6pm - 8pm
~ session 2: 830pm - 1030pm

venue:
~ dance studio 1/2

attire:
~ yourself in some covered shoes (and long pants would be nice)

things to bring:
~ yourself, a water bottle, a towel, and an extra mask







sign up link (is a must): 
https://forms.office.com/r/zVGv9kXHSd <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FzVGv9kXHSd&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C25b3135b9f484266dde008d9733068dc%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667474329251860%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=FTy394eDrcTus2UBrjzL1C3%2B3PjXi2qmKjM3EcQWsSc%3D&reserved=0>

This email is BCC’d to AY2020 students. 

 

From: Irma Bte Jumahat 
Sent: Friday, September 3, 2021 2:34 PM
Cc: Felice Peck <felice_peck@sutd.edu.sg>
Subject: Invitation to ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session (1 October 2021)

 

Dear Freshmore Students, 

 

We would like to invite you to attend the upcoming ISTD Pillar Info Sharing Session on 1 October 2021 (Friday) 1.30pm – 2.30pm. 

 

We will conduct the info sharing session via the 2 different modes – physical (at Lecture Theatre 1) as well as virtual (via Zoom). To comply with the COVID-19 measure, we can only accommodate 40 students in LT1. Please choose only one of the sessions (physical or virtual). 

 

During this session, you will get to hear from ISTD HoP and other faculty members. Please register and indicate the mode of event you wish to attend here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FLSp9WKgG3rkAy2wa9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cd1307b5f30d944109ffb08d9732b0aa6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667451410789644%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4Mmi8W6tKQY0vKfWdejvPrvibDEci%2FMWSXf8AX2PgvE%3D&reserved=0>  by 13 September 2021, Monday. 

 

For those who would like to attend the session virtually, please see below for the Zoom link. 

 

Topic: ISTD Info Sharing Session 2021

Time: Oct 1, 2021 01:30 PM Singapore

 

Join Zoom Meeting

https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012 <https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/j/94538195012>  

 

Meeting ID: 945 3819 5012

Passcode: 4Va4z**5

 

Best Regards,

Irma

Subject: <REMINDER> INVITATION - RIBA Future Architects Information Event – Singapore (22 Sept 2021)
Body:
Dear Students

 

A gentle reminder that the IBA Future Architects Information Event will be happening on 22 September 2021.  Do sign up via the below registration link .

 

Thank you

 

Sincerely

 



 

https://asd.sutd.edu.sg/

 

 

 

From: ASD 
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 2021 1:17 PM
Subject: INVITATION - RIBA Future Architects Information Event – Singapore (22 Sept 2021)

 

Dear Students

 

The RIBA Singapore Chapter Educational Group and RIBA International have come together to create a special deliver this information and sharing session specifically for Future Architects in Singapore. 

 

Hosted by RIBA Singapore Chapter's Education Group, there will be an introduction to the Singapore Chapter and their role in supporting the Global Architecture community in Singapore and internationally.

 

RIBA Future Architects Information Event provides an introduction to a large range of RIBA services and resources available to architecture students anywhere in the world to inform your studies, inspire your work and advance your career. The event will also offer advice on the various routes to becoming a RIBA Chartered member for those who haven’t studied in RIBA accredited schools overseas or UK schools, with the benefit of being part of a global community. 

 

The event will cover the below topics:

 

• What is the RIBA mission?

• Key RIBA programmes and projects

• RIBA architecture collections

• Online digital resources for architecture students

• Benefits for student and graduate membership

• Routes to becoming a RIBA member

 

Apart from the information on the benefits of student membership, FREE to those studying at a RIBA validated school, you will hear from three past graduates on their experiences following graduation and into practice.

 

You will also learn about RIBA Future Architects, our community for future and emerging architects, including advice and information about studying architecture and exclusive events and opportunities. The network is designed to support, inspire and provide a voice as you transition from study to practice.

 

Background of RIBA:

 

RIBA’s mission is to advance architecture and RIBA international and RIBA Chapters support a global community of architects to promote excellence in architecture. Through our work we champion better buildings and places, stronger communities and a sustainable environment.

 

The RIBA Singapore Chapter Educational Group and RIBA International have come together to create a special information and sharing session specifically for Future Architects in Singapore. Hosted by RIBA Singapore Chapter's Education Group, there will be an introduction to the Singapore Chapter and their role in supporting the Global Architecture community in Singapore and internationally.

 

RIBA Future Architects Information Event would also provide an introduction to a large range of RIBA services and free resources available to architecture students anywhere in the world to inform your studies, inspire your work and advance your career. The event will also offer advice on the various routes to becoming a RIBA Chartered member for those who haven’t studied in RIBA accredited schools overseas or UK schools, with the benefit of being part of a global community

 

You may find out more information and register your interest via the below link:

 

https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/riba-future-architects-information-event-singapore-tickets-162293691801 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eventbrite.co.uk%2Fe%2Friba-future-architects-information-event-singapore-tickets-162293691801&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C1d9b0c70dd2340750ae808d9797feaa3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637674412720344081%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Lp6Bj6ofexfaYYdpXOqFsbRchl1DKSW5ym3EQbNp198%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Thank you

 

 

Sincerely

Career Tips & Advice	

 

How to Develop Strong Followership Skills
If you aspire to hold a leadership role one day, you first need to learn how to be a great follower. Today, many organizations are pushing back on leadership-centric structures and instead relying on team-centered approaches—which depend on active followership to achieve organizational goals. However, little emphasis has been placed on how to develop strong followership skills.  Read more <https://access.vault.com/recordurl?nid=267788&wid=274402&vid=1> 


Click HERE  <http://access.vault.com/career-insider-login.aspx?aid=274402>  for full access and more career resources on Vault.com.
The service is free of charge for SUTD students and Alumni.
How to Stand Out at Virtual Career Fairs
It isn’t easy to stand out at in-person job fairs, and leaving a lasting impression with employers at virtual job fairs can be just as challenging. However, if you follow the eight tips below, you’ll have no difficulty making meaningful professional connections and differentiating yourself from other candidates. Subject: ASD Publication- Winner in Golden Pin Design Award
Body:
Dear SUTD Community

 

We are very pleased and excited to share that ASD’s publication, Forming—Unforming and  粵海清廟：建築與歷史的對話 by Assoc. Prof. Yeo Kang Shua have won the prestigious Golden Pin Design Award 2021. We would like to extend our heartiest congratulations to Prof. Erwin Viray, Assoc. Prof. Yeo Kang Shua and Asst. Prof. Immanuel Koh.

 

Below are short write ups of the Award and the winning designs.

 

 



「金點設計獎」（Golden Pin Design Award）在1981年創立於台灣，現由「台灣設計研究院」（Taiwan Design Research Institute , TDRI）辦理獎項與策劃頒獎典禮及相關活動。2014年起開始走向「全球華人市場最頂尖設計獎項」的新定位，為華人設計產業取得發言權。自2015年起，金點設計獎品牌針對不同目標族群分設「金點設計獎」、「金點概念設計獎」及「金點新秀設計獎」三大獎賽，旨在褒揚傑出的創新設計產品與作品。

 

今年，主辦單位收到來自全球17地、共2,706件作品參賽，經複審，最終評選出榮獲「金點設計獎標章」作品.

 

Established in 1981, Golden Pin Design Award is the most influential design award in the global Chinese-speaking market. The planning and handling of the awards, the prize-giving ceremony, and all other related events are executed by Taiwan Design Research Institute (TDRI). In 2015, the Golden Pin Design Award launched three separate award competitions – the Golden Pin Design Award, the Golden Pin Concept Design Award, and the Young Pin Design Award. While each award targets a different demographic, the purpose of each is to commend outstanding innovation in design.

 

The Golden Pin Design Award jury selected the 2021 Design Mark Recipients out of 2,706 outstanding entries from 17 different countries and regions around the globe.

 

 



 

Forming—Unforming 的設計概念志在表達新興建築設計理念、傳達新加坡科技設計大學建築與可持續設計系所追求的教育目標，並讚頌建築知識的多樣性，即設計、歷史，技術等。隨著人工智能和機器學習在設計界日益普及，系內助理教授 Immanuel Koh 應邀使用 Forming Unforming 系列書籍的內容訓練機器學習模型。機器必須先對內容進行解構，並重新解析，進而再設計出 700 種獨特的封面設計。這些以「機器為設計師」所創造出的封面設計不僅客觀地體現出建築與可持續設計系的理念，亦挑戰了當今世界建築師所扮演的角色。

 

When conceptualising the design for Forming—Unforming, we asked how can we represent emerging ideas of architecture and to represent what Architecture and Sustainable Design at the Singapore University of Technology and Design aspire to be, while celebrating the diversity of architecture knowledge ranging from design, history, to technology. With the growing presence of artificial intelligence and machine learning in design, we roped in our faculty Immanuel Koh to train a machine-learning model using the contents of all of ASD’s bi-annual publications – Forming / Unforming (2017), Unforming / Forming (2018) and Forming—Unforming (2021) – to decontextualise the contents before being reinterpreted by the machine to generate 700 unique cover designs. With the machine as a designer, these generated covers function as an objective reflection of SUTD ASD’s ethos and challenge the role of the architect in the world today. 

 

Art Direction & Design → Practice Theory (@practice.theory)

Collaborator/Client →  ASD@SUTD (Erwin Viray, Yeo Kang Shua & Julie Goh)

Cover AI Design → Practice Theory (@practice.theory) & Immanuel Koh

Publisher → ASD@SUTD

Photographer → Daryl Tan (@daryltanyp)

 

 





《粵海清廟：建築與歷史的對話》封面設計以懸掛於粵海清廟的燈籠為靈感，書名的字體以常用書寫燈號的隸書為啟發。風格近似隸書的字體同樣結構扁平、筆畫均勻對稱，橫細豎粗、長短兼備，給予封面設計莊重清麗的視覺效果。字體的輪廓亦如傳統燈籠，由封面延伸環繞至封底，試圖隱喻建築與歷史，以及歷史與修復之間的對話。書內不同章節的分隔頁延續了相同的設計語彙。

 

The cover design of《粵海清廟：建築與歷史的對話》was inspired by the traditional Teochew lanterns that adorn the front elevation of the temple. The design for the book title adopted the clerical script (隸書) font that is traditionally used on lanterns. This font is strikingly rectilinear with uniformity of the strokes, and is characterised by slender horizontal strokes with broad vertical strokes, which imbues a sense of quiet elegance to the overall aesthetics. The title wraps around the front and back covers, akin to that of a lantern, paying homage to its history and heritage. Likewise, the design for the entire book take reference from the temple’s architectural and social history.

 

Art Direction & Design → Practice Theory (@practice.theory) 

Collaborator/Client → Yeo Kang Shua

Publisher → ASD@SUTD

Photographer → The Gentle Studio (@thegentlestudio)

 

 

Thank you

 

Sincerely

 

 



 

https://asd.sutd.edu.sg/

Subject: Welcome to SUTD Gunpla Club!
Body:
Hi Freshies!! Welcome to SUTD!!

Are you good with your hands?

Like being creative?

Find satisfaction in completing works?

 

And of course, LOVE MODEL KITS?

 

Then come join SUTD’s Gunpla Club!!

 



Gunpla Club is a plastic modelling club in SUTD which specialises in plastic models and welcomes all who enjoy plastic modelling, as well as improving members' maker skills and competencies with 3D printing and modelling!

 

The workshop will consist of…

*	Getting to know more about Gunpla Club's activities and session timings.
*	Getting to learn the basics of plastic modelling.
*	And getting to learn more about 3D printing basics.

 

We’re hosting an introductory workshop, so please do come down and try out!!

Date: 27th September 2021

Time: 7pm to 10pm

MS Forms Sign Up: https://forms.office.com/r/WTizk3RBNF <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FWTizk3RBNF&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3be2fdf4a642499cdfb208d979788b0b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637674381133478559%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=4pMFpCvpDKztfeOusuO7MR9SmcPzGyL6Gq4r%2B68afG8%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Do join the workshop Telegram group if you have any questions, and just hang out!
Workshop Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/DT-hEwjySWBlZDk9 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FDT-hEwjySWBlZDk9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3be2fdf4a642499cdfb208d979788b0b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637674381133488556%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=RpcxL3Aqj4e4YxDY1C5NaGn%2Ft0v7KJxFVo084rt8DKQ%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Thanks and regards,

SUTD Gunpla Club

Subject: 2021 September Term - 10.023 : Designing Energy Systems: Online lesson to be conducted in individual Cohort Teams
Body:
Dear all,

The online classes will be conducted in individual Cohort Teams instead of channels within the Main DES Team.

This is because breakout rooms cannot be created within the channels.

The new Teams will be created by today before the class time. You will receive notifications that you are added to a new Team.

Sorry for the last minute changes. 

Wei Lek

Subject: 2021 September Term - 10.023 : Designing Energy Systems: Online class for Designing Energy Systems
Body:
Dear Students,

We have received notice that all term 3 courses will be conducted online from Friday (today, 17 Sep) till next Friday (24 Sep).

Online classes will be conducted on Microsoft Teams in the respective channels during the scheduled class time. Please log into Microsoft Teams at the right time and join the meeting started by the instructors.

We will be recording the classes just in case. Further instructions will be given to you during the online lessons.

Please do reach out to us personally if you need help. Do help to look out for each other during this period. 

Please stay safe and see you soon online.

Wei Lek

Maggie

Apple

Chee Huei

Max

Subject: Notice for Students (16 September 2021)
Body:
Message Classification: Restricted

 

Dear Students,

 

A Term 6 student has tested positive for Covid-19.  Close and recent contacts have been identified. To keep faculty, students and staff safe, the university will adopt the following teaching plan from 17 Sep (Fri) to 24 Sep (Fri). 

 

1.                   Term 1 subjects for 21F02, 21F06, 21F07, 21F10 will go online. The rest of the Cohorts will continue to have on-campus lessons.

2.                   Term 3 and 10 subjects will go online.

3.                   (a) Term 6 Subjects, including HASS electives will continue to have online classes till Week 6. 

(b)    Some Term 6 Subjects, including HASS electives that are given permission previously by IMT to have on-campus lessons, will have to go online during this period. The affected subjects include: 30.104 Dynamics, 30.105 Machine Element Design, 30.106 Microelectronic Devices and Circuits, 30.107 Power Electronics, 30.108 Introduction to Material Science, 02.157DH Histories on Screen: Framing Modern Southeast Asia <https://hass.sutd.edu.sg/education/undergraduate-subjects/elective/02-157-histories-on-screen-framing-modern-southeast-asia> . The rest of the subjects not listed can continue to have on-campus lessons if they are given permission previously. Please refer to instructions from your instructor for the details.

4.                   PG subjects will have online classes during office hours and can be physical after 6pm from Week 1 to Week 6. Hybrid mode may resume progressively, subject to the latest advisory from the related government agencies.

5.                   Graduate students performing research who need to return to research-lab/facility, please continue to seek clearance via your advisors/project-PIs/lab-managers.  For those who need to access Graduate Student Clusters (GSC), follow up instructions from the Office of Graduate Studies on the SMMs will be provided in regards to its reopening.

6.                   The rest of the Safe Management Measures remain.

 

Best regards,

Office of Student Administration

 <file:///C:/Users/rueyshyong_lim/Documents/Documents/download> 

Message Classification: Restricted

Subject: COVID-19 in SUTD
Body:
Dear SUTD Community, 

 

A Term 6 student has tested positive for COVID-19. The student was last on campus on 15th September.

 

Students and staff who were in close contact with the student have been informed to self-isolate and do ART tests, pending further instructions. All locations visited by the student are in the process of undergoing deep cleaning. We want to assure you that the University will continue to strictly implement safe management measures to ensure our community's wellbeing.

 

As a precautionary measure, we will be converting affected classes to online learning until the end of Friday, 24th September.  In addition,  physical fifth-row activities are suspended with immediate effect, and the SUTD gym plus all sporting facilities will also be closed until the end of 24th September.

 

We seek your support in ensuring that you continue to practise good personal hygiene and social responsibility. If you are unwell, please consult a doctor immediately.

 

I appreciate your cooperation in keeping the University a safe environment for all.

 

Please take care and stay safe.

 

All the best,

Tow Chong

Subject: ⚙️ MECHD Virtual Introductory Session! - 16th Sept 9pm -10pm
Body:
Hi all!

 

We would like to thank everyone who joined us at the introductory session! Don't worry, if you missed it, you can find a copy of the slides from the session in this email.

 

Want to join? Here's the link: https://forms.office.com/r/5d393YGAY2 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2F5d393YGAY2&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C7fb8d82a4a3d415b6cbd08d979175811%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673963852685527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NNlS1SmwUO760ruhpub%2FBjRwLMu7dVIugP02OVedHXA%3D&reserved=0>  😎.  Or, just scan the QR code down below!

 

Also, keep an eye peeled for our emails as we'll be releasing more details about our workshops!

 

Some FAQs from the session:

 

1. Are there regular club meetings for members?

Nope, there are no regular club meetings. Our club is completely event-based so there is no extra commitment for the members. 

 

2. What is the difference between members and instructors?

Both - Pay $5 membership fee, gets priority for workshops/events and T-shirt

Members - enjoy discounts and subsidies for workshops and certifications (which can cost > $100 outside), without a commitment.

Instructors - get to have free workshops and free certifications (limited to certain exams), but they are required to facilitate at least 2 workshop sessions per year.

 

3. Is there a deadline for membership sign-up?

We're officially closing on 30th September @ 2359 so sign up now!

 

Sign up QR code



 

If you have any further questions, do feel free to email us! 🙂

 

Best Regards,

MechD

Subject: FW: Seminar on Statics, Science and Government: A Statistician as a Chief Scientific Adviser- 29 Sept 2021, 3-4pm (Singapore time)
Body:
Dear all,

 

Forwarding the following public lecture series talk for Department of Statistics and Data Science, NUS, on “Statics, Science and Government: A Statistician as a Chief Scientific Adviser”.

 

Please refer to the attached PDF for more information.

 

Thank you and Regards,

Xue Li

Science, Mathematics and Technology (SMT)

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Secretaries,

 

The Department of Statistics and Data Science, NUS, will be organising an online seminar on 29 September 2021 (see details attached).  Kindly disseminate among your academic/research staff and students.   Thank you.

 

 

Warm regards,

Subject: Video recording of ESD Pillar Information Session (Fall 2021)
Body:
Dear Term 3 Freshmores,

 

Thank you for attending the virtual ESD Info Session yesterday.  We hope you found the session useful. 😊

 

*	ESD Information Booklet

We are pleased to share with you the ESD Information Booklet on ESD curriculum, focus tracks and electives offering (see attached). 

 

*	More about ESD core courses

We have also prepared a series of short videos where our faculty will share more on ESD core courses. 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.microsoftstream.com%2Fchannel%2F5bd914ef-4d90-4ce9-8d78-979335eb008f&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce78de7707ca44355543d08d978e69315%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673754632071706%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kibNlmZMYdNHcwJEn7z5ccniE%2BoX8kOMMMBIF5yGwdM%3D&reserved=0>

Do check out the Frequently Asked Questions on ESD website using this link <https://esd.sutd.edu.sg/academics/undergraduate-programme/faq/>  or scan the QR code below. 

 <https://esd.sutd.edu.sg/academics/undergraduate-programme/faq/> 

 

*	Recording of ESD Pillar Information Session (Fall 2021)

Lastly, we would like to share the recording of the info session to those who missed the session yesterday.  

Please click on this link <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.microsoftstream.com%2Fvideo%2Fb48aea1a-68e6-41b8-afd1-f2e9de83653e&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce78de7707ca44355543d08d978e69315%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673754632081698%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=P4XURRLj04CX2BL7NsrZ09j12DzY9gnNZ4sNsQqyJmE%3D&reserved=0>  or scan the QR code below to view the recording.

Subject: [Call for Participation and Zoom Briefing Session] ASEAN Geospatial Challenge 2022
Body:
Dear SUTDents

 

 

The Singapore Land Authority (SLA) is organising the ASEAN Geospatial Challenge 2022: Geospatial Youths Edition (AGC 22), to bring youths in the ASEAN region together to use geospatial technology and information to support cities/ nations in achieving their Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). AGC 22 is targeted at students from Institutes of Higher Learning (IHLs) in the ASEAN region.

 

We would like to warmly extend the participation of AGC 22 to full-time students in all local IHLs and will appreciate your kind assistance in disseminating AGC 22 to your fellow colleagues and students. The deadline of the challenge is 1st December 2021. 

 

We would also be holding 2 briefing sessions to share more about AGC 22 and answer any questions you might have. You may invite your students to join. Kindly register for the briefing at:  

 

*       4 October 2021 3.00PM-3.30PM. Register here. <https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZMrdu2hpjkuHtJlFKs-rhmsMl2mfo5fvU5B> 

*       5 October 2021 3.00PM-3.30PM. Register here. <https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZUqceCurDssEtLsfryYwMq6oUOZ8zmkKgyd> 

 



 

Visit HERE <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.gov.sg%2Fasean-geospatial-challenge-2022&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C3dc1f724e2794931daf708d978e065b3%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673727969512625%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jijHkmozw5ZO7b%2FCZNJo2mdGRhvzyu4IWJo5zH%2B8RsM%3D&reserved=0>  for the AGC 22 website!

 

 

We look forward to your students’ active participation in AGC 22!

 

If you have any questions, feel free to drop us an email at geoworks@sla.gov.sg <mailto:geoworks@sla.gov.sg> 

 

 

Thank you.

 

Best regards

SUTD AI Team

Subject: UKSAEI Climate Change Hackathon 2021
Body:
Hi everyone,

 

We are excited to inform you that the UKSAEI Climate Change Hackathon is happening soon, with 17 universities including SUTD are taking part in. We personally think that the students of SUTD are well-suited for this hackathon and will be able to come up with innovative ideas to address the global climate issue. Please find the attached EDM for more information. 

 

 

 

 

 



 

 

 

 

Kindest Regards,

Venture, Innovation & Entrepreneurship

Subject: ♔ Finale Tournament Reminder: THE SUTD WEEK OF CHESS ♚
Body:
Hey all,

Just a reminder. Finale tournament of the SUTD Week Of Chess is tonight at 8PM, SGT. Winner of the tournament will win a tournament-size chess set, with a cloth-backed vinyl board and full-sized wooden pieces! If you've not joined yet and you want to, here are the instructions:


1.	Fill up this sign-up form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FATTBDvFTuT&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985884724%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Ivq10axzhp0DMAcjX8Kt84sFzL%2BYz8aCXhV3fScLZQc%3D&reserved=0>  by 6PM.
2.	Join the Discord <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FN2g3hZnb5d&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985894719%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=idUvrcERIoOcXd9ptS2b9PgLBHoWLEfSlUgM%2FmckpXM%3D&reserved=0>  and get the Lichess team password from there.
3.	Join the Lichess team <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fteam%2F3-0-0-ke7&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985904717%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2BCWmkxEoEbqlZ4WLHXcmne%2BFt1ZDco8piQqXQKtkKZ4%3D&reserved=0> .
4.	Join the tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Fswiss%2FIYgrABpc&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985904717%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2Fuj%2BFYq1MhS4Djwjmy9N2j23J9q5aLdZ1TurrUr7ens%3D&reserved=0>  by 6PM.
5.	Be on the Discord lounge voice chat with video and screen shared by 8PM.

If you just want to watch, go to Twitch <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fsutdchess&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985914708%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Fx7dF8%2FRp0uudzk78Z5jjCOKQBURk8M055731rURZhg%3D&reserved=0> . If you filled up the sign-up form and indicated you were not going to join the tournament, but have since changed your mind, fill up this form <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fgi1FYyRFWn&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985914708%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=05Vuj5F5nGKvdFCccJBYV2i6S77I2tt3GlZNzVFU%2FQk%3D&reserved=0> . If you are not confident in playing in the main tournament, you can join this beginner tournament <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flichess.org%2Ftournament%2FG5DxePik&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C8788b3edd232431b3b5108d978de8614%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637673719985924704%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=I41DeWlC0HDXjQDNwTBO30Ac3K5zrp5E33HQW8tXyGU%3D&reserved=0>  instead with no stakes.

See you later!

Much love,
Kyra


♕ President of SUTD Chess

♕ Vice-Chairperson of the Singapore Varsity Chess Alliance (SiVCA) <https://www.facebook.com/sivcaofficial> 

♕ Council Member of SGChess United <https://www.facebook.com/SGChessUnited>

Subject: Student Club - YogaxFitness
Body:
Hello amazing SUTDents!

We want to welcome you to our club, where we try to find stillness and body awareness through movement and meditation. Specially in these times of uncertainty, finding balance is a great skill to have in order to navigate with confidence regardless of what the future present!

We will be hosting 2 yoga physical lessons per week on Mondays and Thursdays at 8pm, as well as one meditation session over zoom, in collaboration with Heartfulness organization, every Tuesday at 7pm.

If you are interested join our telegram group! https://t.me/joinchat/Sd2WnFHgkxQaO5nV <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FSd2WnFHgkxQaO5nV&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf0eb1fcc548a4b1826d208d972e375ae%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667143854138233%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Tnm6ig%2FEudjYc%2FtzKAjohkgL5z4maJoZVpLQt%2FjuVoQ%3D&reserved=0> 

Here is a light reading from Alan Watts and his take on yoga ✨ https://alanwatts.org/1-2-12-intellectual-yoga/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Falanwatts.org%2F1-2-12-intellectual-yoga%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf0eb1fcc548a4b1826d208d972e375ae%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667143854148230%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=DSluDy1ntPPaqOWSKZC2i2U4cvT97%2B3qHT50jK2WyBM%3D&reserved=0> 

And finally here is the plan for this term:




 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FSd2WnFHgkxQaO5nV&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf0eb1fcc548a4b1826d208d972e375ae%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667143854148230%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=93gtyEPvqoXsDOpAtKXKpHZ2TrS4qIRL%2FCuROwZ4dqU%3D&reserved=0> 
Yoga X Fitness Chat <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FSd2WnFHgkxQaO5nV&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cf0eb1fcc548a4b1826d208d972e375ae%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667143854158222%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2BfBZh2rPYOdXyfFovKtutALPUENh4zTDYvkghlmUDbM%3D&reserved=0> 
To promote general health consciousness within the SUTD family to encourage one another to keep fit and healthy! Feel free to come for our weekly sessions or talk about yoga, fitness and general health topics! Please: 1. Be decent 2. No advertising
t.me

Subject: SUTD Grub Club Intro Session
Body:
Hey SUTD foodies!

 

Interested in preparing your own meals or simply have a passion for food? 😍

 

Grub Club 🍳 is going to bring you the CONVENIENCE to help you kickstart your cooking adventure!

 

Join us for fun live online cooking sessions to create dishes ranging from main courses to desserts from the comforts of your home/hostel as WE bring to YOU the ingredients!




The first session is happening next Wednesday (15/9), 530pm to 730pm.




Join us next Wednesday (15/9), 530pm to 730pm for a delicious dinner and a chat with us to find out more about what our club does 🍽




Register Here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.gle%2FPyoJ3WWbiarT7bk5A&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb2213c69a3c34301ec5308d972e154c6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667134507212720%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Om1zqgCeyolf%2FSRm7OxM4YiTZ2Fmr3%2FkJDIpVhNrGNU%3D&reserved=0> 













 

Interested in joining our club sessions as a member?

Join our Telegram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FJ0kNJkqJeI0ZDvfDDqtR3g&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb2213c69a3c34301ec5308d972e154c6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667134507222718%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bTzFBUIn9StWU6ZVS7lBIZATKU%2B4gDssWDCqzuwYmpY%3D&reserved=0>  group now!

 

 

Want to learn more about us? Check us out at our Instagram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finstagram.com%2Fsutdgrub%3Figshid%3D1cyow5go4uttg&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cb2213c69a3c34301ec5308d972e154c6%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667134507232709%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=fJcImbppdz0GQpXVtINZrgL5TzuhZ4lv6sTf5S%2B7uXE%3D&reserved=0>  page or ask in the Telegram group chat 😊

 

Best Regards,

 

SUTD Grub Club

Subject: SUTD Tchoukball Intro Sessions 2021!!
Body:
Hello, Freshmores and SUTDents!

 

Want to try out a new sport with your friends and classmates in your first term or looking for a way to keep fit and have fun? Then look no further!

SUTD Tchoukball Club🤾 will be hosting Open Sessions for two weeks where we will open our doors to SUTDents interested in finding out what Tchoukball is and joining our Tchoukball community! 

Here’s a sneak peek of our activities!!!

 

SUNIG and other external competitions like Beach Tchoukball (Yup we have both guys and girls teams!)



 

Overseas Bonding Trips (Pending ala COVID)



 

Post-training suppers, special event (CNY and Christmas!) gatherings, bonding/training camps, and many more!! 



 

What are you waiting for? Join our tele chat (https://t.me/joinchat/tuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FtuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccfef04a4bcc7447e302e08d972dd2b6a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667116880899080%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=cwwGfoSJJDtFvIVsdpU%2F6B8fyzgIsUAL7gCcJRq3V5Y%3D&reserved=0> ) and sign up for our exposure sessions now through this form! (https://forms.office.com/r/h47ymKAeMf <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2Fh47ymKAeMf&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ccfef04a4bcc7447e302e08d972dd2b6a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667116880909072%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=nbAAGgETH5QPqHADlyIfD8XYb%2F9xOLUwBVHuyYUsN%2Fo%3D&reserved=0>  )

Hi Freshmores! Are you looking to join a Fifth Row with a tight-knit community and pick up an interesting new sport at the same time? Look no further! Join SUTD Tchoukball at our introductory sessions to learn more about Tchoukball and make new friends at the same time! No prior experience is needed! Important Information: - Dates: 16th, 21st, 23rd & 28th September 2020 - Time: 8:00pm - 9:30pm - Venue: ISH 1 If you have any enquiries, do feel free to reach out to us on Telegram: Ken Zho (@Zhooh, President and Boys Captain) / Sumi (@sumibloop, Vice President and Girls Captain). Do also join our Telegram group for updates! https://t.me/joinchat/tuqJkOSc_pdkYjk1  Only sign up if you are able to make it for the session! Otherwise, someone else who might want to go for the session would miss the opportunity. Let's make this event friendly for all!

Subject: SUTD BOXING CLUB RECRUITMENT
Body:
🥊🥊  Inviting all freshies and SUTDents!!  🥊🥊



 

Want to learn SELF DEFENCE? 

Want to KEEP FIT? 

Want to BECOME A FIGHTER?

 

JOIN SUTD BOXING CLUB!

We are open to everyone.

No prior experience is needed. 

 

Training Schedule

We conduct trainings EVERY WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY, from 7pm-9pm, at Dance Studio 8

(DS8 is located at the 2nd floor of the Sports and Recreation Centre)

 

 

How do I sign up?

There are 2 things that you have to do to sign up.

1.	Complete the Boxing Intro Session Sign up form below
	https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=drd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPYn9T9-GjqpLohMm2LbBLqZUQlpRMDYySUE4UVpBNk5FVUlRUUxONFc3Ui4u <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPYn9T9-GjqpLohMm2LbBLqZUQlpRMDYySUE4UVpBNk5FVUlRUUxONFc3Ui4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C76ee00bc62fe43fee0db08d972c77770%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667023567008296%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ZXWCUD%2BKx2ye30EFye7rrMvDHRNjrgudB75uD4IoXyA%3D&reserved=0> 
	
	
2.	Join the Boxing Intro Session Telegram Group below to get updates for your timeslot 
	https://t.me/joinchat/5XUGdNhmw5YyM2E9 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2F5XUGdNhmw5YyM2E9&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C76ee00bc62fe43fee0db08d972c77770%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637667023567008296%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2Ffgs6at9gkDOjxpBXiThp3vk92B2C0SNl5nwvYACkw4%3D&reserved=0> 

 

There are Limited Slots so it will be a first come first serve basis, 

SO SIGN UP NOW!!!

 

*If you are unable to make it for the Intro sessions, you can drop by for any of our training sessions.
We have trainings every Wednesdays and Fridays, 7pm-9pm at Dance Studio 8.

 

 

What to bring?

Water bottle and Hand Wraps.

Boxing Gloves and other training equipment will be provided but you can bring your own Boxing Gloves as well if you have.

 

 

Any queries?

If you have any other questions, you can contact us on telegram for more information. 

 

Telegram Handles

Oakar (President) - @oakkarrr

Pei Xuan (Vice-President) - @bloomspx

 

 

We will see you soon! 😃 

Oakar Min

President of SUTD Boxing Club

Subject: SUTD Climbers Bouldering Introductory Session
Body:
🧗‍♀️🧗‍♂️ ATTENTION ALL FRESHIES! 🧗🧗‍♀️

Seen the debut of Sport Climbing in the recent Tokyo 2020 Olympics? Come join us and climb boulders 💪! We'll guide you through basic climbing techniques & etiquette, and let you experience why bouldering is such a popular and exciting sport that is gaining so much popularity! NO EXPERIENCE is required so EVERYONE is welcome to join 🙂

We are holding Introductory Bouldering Sessions for Freshmores when the term begins, on 16, 22 & 23 Sep from 730pm - 930pm. So sign up below and join our telegram group to receive the latest updates on these sessions! (Experienced climbers are welcome too!)

SUTD Climbers Freshies Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/8emVqJ9tqt1lOTNl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2F8emVqJ9tqt1lOTNl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cac306c5c72604e0f879d08d972c00a4b%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666991700805527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=SO0Yoz0FMnGSbZTxhjecun5vgiN9LEkZPytWtcx%2BM2o%3D&reserved=0>  👈 JOIN NOW!!

Subject: Vertex Cheerleading Recruitment
Body:
HELLO ALL!

Cannot fly overseas? Come fly with us instead!

Do you want to try something new? Want a group of friends that you can rely on? Want to try out some cool flips and gymnastics? Here at Vertex Cheerleading, you will be opened to a whole new world !




No experience is required! 

For our introduction sessions, we will be playing some games, as well as the introduction of the fundamentals of cheerleading, such as basic stunts and gymnastics, which includes:

*	Group stunt elevator and extensions 

*	Shoulder Stand 

*	Cartwheels 

We will also showcase some higher-level skills such as partner stunts.

 

The training will be conducted in a fun and safe environment in which you will be grouped up with senior bases and flyers, with our experienced coach overseeing the session. Our aim is to allow you to get a little taste of what cheerleading is like and provide you with the opportunity to pursue new skills !


Our introduction sessions are:


Dates: 

• Friday, 17 September 1900-2200hrs

• Tuesday, 21 September 1900-2200hrs

• Friday, 24 September 1900-2200hrs

• Tuesday, 28 September 1900-2200hrs





Venue: 

Fifth row Zone outside Gom Gom 


What to wear:

*	For guys - sports attire (no dri-fit or singlets)

*	For girls - tights/safety shorts w sports attire; sports bra

*	Please remove accessories including earrings and necklaces and cut your fingernails due to safety concerns

*	Those with spectacles should either try to wear contacts or spec hooks

*	Shoes - non-studded, preferably flat-soled





Click HERE <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fshorturl.at%2FrtxI3&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce38911b39a974f95836708d972b375e0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666937602430831%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=o%2FzWKLx7gxct5gUAUY0if7vtkNJQ6m6HRg4D8ZC1FyQ%3D&reserved=0>  and sign up ! ! 

Deadline for sign-ups is on 12 September, this Sunday 2359! Hurry! Grab your “tickets” now ! 





Should you have any queries, feel free to contact us at:

Instagram @sutdvertex <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdvertex%2F%3Fhl%3Den&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce38911b39a974f95836708d972b375e0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666937602440835%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=J1UNm1yuxIMf1XRW9fWf4qez58%2BrIMmBIX57l%2Bl0wTk%3D&reserved=0> 


Louis (Vice-Captain) 8182 9951

Axel (Vice-Captain) 9678 8015



Best Regards,
Fan Jiayi
Publicity Manager| Vertex Cheerleading
Singapore University of Technology and Design

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sutdvertex/ <https://www.facebook.com/sutdvertex/>  | Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sutdvertex/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fsutdvertex%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce38911b39a974f95836708d972b375e0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666937602440835%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=x%2F2cOpBWb3drtK8XDrte2kjxeUNNRQdPdYnCbpAf4O0%3D&reserved=0>  | Webpage: https://vertexcheerleading.wordpress.com/ <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexcheerleading.wordpress.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Ce38911b39a974f95836708d972b375e0%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666937602450826%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yB9D%2FOg7ZltZWoOR8QtvSb1MpoaRCX5KI8ln%2BMVs%2FQM%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Google Day 2021- SIGN UP NOW!
Body: Dear Students,

Subject: SG Innovate Robotics Event 2021
Body:
Hear from our startup speakers whose innovations are generating new automated systems and driving accessibility for all to leverage on these technologies.

Featured in the New York Times, the Guardian, the Economist, and CNN, Eureka is revolutionizing the field of robotics. Empowered by A.I. and Robotics research from NTU and MIT, Eureka Robotics delivers robotic solutions and software to automate tasks that require High Accuracy and High Agility (#HAHA) across industries, from optics, to electronics, to automotive.

Subject: SUTD BASKETBALL INTRODUCTORY SESSION
Body:
🏀🏀🏀 ATTENTION ALL SUTD FAMILY MEMBERS! 🏀🏀🏀

 

Ever wanted to try competing at the highest level for Basketball or to hone your Basketball skills? Look no further as SUTD Basketball Club is recruiting for all those who are interested! (Inclusive of both males and females!)

All you need to bring is sport shoes and a water bottle to keep yourself hydrated. No prior experience is required! Both Males and Females are welcomed!

 

Come and join our introductory session and win some prizes from the respective Shooting, Dribbling, and Fitness Challenge!

 

Session intent (what to expect)
The flow of the session will start from regular basketball training, challenges, games, and debrief.

Session details

There will be four different challenges with one respective winner :

*	Shooting (Women) 1x $10 voucher
*	Shooting (Men) 1x $10 voucher
*	Dribbling (Men) 1x $10 voucher
*	Fitness (Men) 1x $10 voucher

Schedule :
Monday 20 & 27 September, 08-10 PM, @Ish1 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FIsh1&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cad336984aefd44ae82c008d972ac0c6e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666905686710658%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=9yUCsFYNsaOOqGozxPDuw2mjpl%2FJydY5ad4BIeO3LXQ%3D&reserved=0>

Please join this group to attend our introductory session and watch the challenge video on our Instagram Post!

https://t.me/joinchat/bYHW1f_L_kAwYTFl <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FbYHW1f_L_kAwYTFl&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7Cad336984aefd44ae82c008d972ac0c6e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666905686720650%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=QTq2rNh9GQgqyxb50MB0Osfis%2FEpGbWU7iE4P%2Fx0YVQ%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Adobe Photoshop Webinar Invitation: A little Creative Cloud with your lunch
Body:
Dear Students, 

Adobe would like to invite you to attend a webinar on Adobe Photoshop. If you are interested, please click on the link below to register.


 

	





 

	
	

A little Creative Cloud with your lunch

	
			

 

	

Join us for lunch and learn how to use Photoshop for everyday tasks.

Don’t worry if you have never used it before, we will hold your hand and get you started straight away.

 

During the 90 minute session you will learn how to combine several images together, add text and effects, and save the image to use in your work. 

This is a hands on session so we will provide you with the images that you will need to play along. 

 

All you need to do is install Photoshop from your corporate account first, open it, download the images from the link below, and bring your lunch.

	

Preparation

1.	Install Photoshop from your Company account using the instructions below.
2.	Open Photoshop to make sure you are logged in.
3.	Download the images from  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fshared-assets.adobe.com%2Flink%2F00737a9b-eb19-4d99-4b71-f09df0d31d41&data=04%7C01%7Ckenneth_quek%40sutd.edu.sg%7C4c5aa6627ecb4e50be1c08d97294f4ba%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806344482749%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Rkxy%2FcWqtjnvoXF2UZQdn%2BqRWhgkso%2B%2Fm1swebwP33o%3D&reserved=0> here
4.	Bring your lunch!

 

 

Guide for installing and launching Adobe Photoshop (if not installed already)

1.	Click on the  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcreativecloud.adobe.com%2Fapps%2Fall%2Fdesktop%3Faction%3Dinstall%26source%3Dapps%26productId%3Dcreative-cloud&data=04%7C01%7Ckenneth_quek%40sutd.edu.sg%7C4c5aa6627ecb4e50be1c08d97294f4ba%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806344492709%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=2Vh8%2BogS0%2FmDhRUvmRfdtuYnikpL0mnZwKTg6GWTiw8%3D&reserved=0> link  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcreativecloud.adobe.com%2Fapps%2Fall%2Fdesktop%3Faction%3Dinstall%26source%3Dapps%26productId%3Dcreative-cloud&data=04%7C01%7Ckenneth_quek%40sutd.edu.sg%7C4c5aa6627ecb4e50be1c08d97294f4ba%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806344502673%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UBuM58iGne7so8%2FFViFuh2J4ghq0Mx%2FjHoi8vPfCTYo%3D&reserved=0> here and sign in with your official email address and password: 

a.	If you are given options to choose between Company/School Account and Personal Account, please select Company/School Account
b.	It will download Creative Cloud Desktop Application on your machine
c.	If you do not have option for Company/School account and you do not remember the password, please click on “Reset your Password” link.

2.	Open Creative Cloud Desktop Application (and login again, if prompted)

a.	Locate Adobe Photoshop and click on Install Button

2.	Open Adobe Photoshop to ensure it is up and running before the session


Agenda


Date: 21st September 2021, Tuesday


Time: 1230 pm – 2 pm SGT

	

 

	
 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FB7AbtGGP2q&data=04%7C01%7Ckenneth_quek%40sutd.edu.sg%7C4c5aa6627ecb4e50be1c08d97294f4ba%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806344502673%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=f5%2FII4SsxDF%2FdufplmRHtCo7%2BLh9D9zwv2ZLDdOVbBk%3D&reserved=0> 

	

 

 



 


Speaker/Presenter details: 

	



Paul Burnett
Principal Evangelist, Creative Cloud, Adobe APAC

 

 

 


Paul is a Principal Evangelist for Creative Cloud in APAC. Before Adobe, Paul ran his own Design, Web and Video Company MAD - Multimedia Art Design for many years, and also worked as the Senior APAC Evangelist for Macromedia. With over 20 years’ experience in the industry, Paul believes that clean, simple design, engaging interactivity, and creativity make for a great user experience.

 

 


 


Michael Stoddart has been part of Adobe’s engagement with the Asia Pacific creative, marketing, design and design industry for over twenty years – leveraging his expertise from a variety of roles over that time

 

Initially trained in design, Michael supports industry’s adoption of a new wave of creative content technology. Michael is a spokesperson and thought leader for Adobe, at both its own marketing and creative events, as well as within various industry communities and activities.

	




Michael Stoddart
Dir, Strategic Business Development Enterprise Offerings

Adobe APAC 


	

 

	

  <https://landing.adobe.com/dam/global/images/adobe-logo.classic.160x222.png> 


Spread the word

Subject: Uni-Y Welcome Tea 2021 - Serve the community with us!
Body:
UNI-Y WELCOME TEA 2021 

 

Ever wondered what we do at Uni-Y? 

  

Join us at Uni-Y’s Annual Welcome Tea! 

  

You can find out more about our club, our various  

community service programmes,  

upcoming personal and leadership programmes as well as 

executive committee opportunities! 

  

  

Take this chance to interact with our ExCo from  

the different departments to learn more! 

  

Date: 17 September 2021 (Friday) 

Time: 3:00pm – 4:45pm
Venue: Zoom (You will receive the link via email) 

   

Stand a chance to win Grab vouchers and other attractive prizes! 

Limited welcome packs will be given on a first come first served basis! 

  

  

So what are you waiting for?  

Sign up now at: tinyurl.com/SUTDWT21  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tinyurl.com%2FSUTDWT21&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C021d818709334cff68be08d972a7b72a%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666887378178121%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=HUwWV67QogZeSVEvLMJcJWIk9r%2FU0CzVBEb8BrF9veQ%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Datature: IntelliBrush
Body:
Hi,

 

Welcome, Datature’s latest product IntelliBrush!

 

	


 

The game has changed for image labelling with our latest AI-assisted Labelling Tool, IntelliBrush. 

Achieve pixel-perfect mask outlines by simply selecting regions that are in or out of interest. Intellibrush is industry agnostic and works on never-seen-before objects. Accelerate your team's labelling throughput while achieving perfectly labelled datasets. Schedule a demo here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendly.com%2Fkeechin%2Fideate&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C54eaace326594656e4f108d97294da28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806552742007%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=lYGyaYZGqW1iugxYYis%2BljbeUoh1MnnGnV05goGjvtI%3D&reserved=0> .

 





 

If you are a researcher, startup, or developer that might benefit from a collaborative, AI-enabled method of labelling datasets. Sign up for our IntelliBrush Early Access on the main page by leaving your email and we will get in touch shortly.

 

Request Early Access <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdatature.io%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C54eaace326594656e4f108d97294da28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806552752015%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=illAZww%2B9j5X9xSONWWAMHPWSo3mkegoNby6f4bx1bg%3D&reserved=0> 

 

	

 

New Features on Nexus

 




Improve Model Robustness with Inbuilt Augmentation Studio.


Nexus users can now interactively adjust augmentations strategies and check the output in real-time. Improve your model robustness with our > 25 differing augmentation-on-the-fly options.

 




Introducing Configuration Overview.


Nexus workflow editor now warns you in advance if certain parameters don't make sense. Workflow now comes with an Auto-Suggest Workflow that samples your annotations and suggests a training strategy automatically.

 


 

 

Datature Featured Articles

 

	

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Ftrain-visualize-and-inspect-computer-vision-models-on-a-no-code-mlops-platform-6e26ea9c6fef&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C54eaace326594656e4f108d97294da28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806552762002%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=oBP1ew0ckoFt1TBeUALMygueEd%2BBXprLXN2wBYH9w%2Fs%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fbest-platform-to-build-deep-learning-models-for-computer-vision-tasks-1c3cf2e0e303&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C54eaace326594656e4f108d97294da28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806552762002%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2FzJtKdqucLbIWw0n4QnXFWHf%2FXa2zaKvCRYJ31vO0HY%3D&reserved=0> 

	

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com%2Fgeekculture%2Fbuilding-computer-vision-application-fast-without-any-coding-b09c3eb75912&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C54eaace326594656e4f108d97294da28%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666806552772006%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0HfcLa%2BNzgGhAu%2FF4LZev0kGaTNvZlEoyLoGGvZh4wM%3D&reserved=0> 

	

 

 

 

Kindest Regards,

Venture, Innovation & Entrepreneurship

Subject: SUTD APEX OUTDOOR ADVENTURES
Body:
HEY SUTDENTS!! 

Tired of staying indoors? Love thrills? Excitement? And always up for an ADVENTURE? You can do exactly that with SUTD APEX Outdoor Adventures!! 

APEX welcomes anyone with a wanderlust heart to join us in our adventures into the outdoors! We have many activities planned out for the term, including Hiking🏃‍ , Night Cycling 🚴‍️, and even Kayaking🛶!   

 

Hiking🏃‍️
  

Night Cycling 🚴‍️

  

Kayaking 🛶 

  

Start your adventure by signing up for our Intro Session by 13 Sep 

Date: 17 Sep (Friday) or 24 Sep (Friday) or BOTH

Venue: Indoor Sports Hall
Attire: Sports Attire

Subject: [HAPPENING TODAY, 5.30PM!] Seminar: Venture Creation: NUS Strategy for Deep Tech Start Ups and their access into the Greater Asian Markets
Body:
Dear All

 

We are pleased to invite you to an interesting seminar by Professor Freddy Boey from NUS, who will share with us on the topic of Venture Creation: NUS Strategy for Deep Tech Start Ups and their access into the Greater Asian Markets. 

 

Prof Boey is the Deputy President (Innovation & Enterprise) of the National University of Singapore (NUS), overseeing the University’s initiatives and activities in the areas of innovation, entrepreneurship and research translation, as well as graduate studies.

 

Pls click the link below to register if you are interested to attend.  

https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_F7eQiE4JSLm9ovLBRihmgQ

 

After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.

 <https://sutd-edu.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_F7eQiE4JSLm9ovLBRihmgQ>  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Talk Abstract

 

Over the past three years, NUS embarked on a broadened strategy to significantly increase the creation of NUS start-ups based on deep technology IP, through the creation of start-ups.  

 

Prof Freddy Boey will elaborate on this strategy and  introduce selected start-ups birthed from the strategy.   He will also present recent NUS collaborative expansion into China and ASEAN to access their huge markets. 

 

Speaker’s Biography

 

Professor Freddy Boey is the Deputy President for Innovation & Enterprise. He oversees the University’s initiatives and activities for innovation, entrepreneurship and research translation. 

 

An alumnus of NUS, Professor Boey was the Deputy President and Provost of Nanyang Technological University (NTU) from 2011-2017. During his tenure as the Provost, he helped transformed NTU into a world class Research University, jumping from 74th in 2011 to 11th in the world in the QS 2017 University World Ranking to be No.1 in Asia. NTU College of Engineering was also ranked 4th in the 2017 QS world subject ranking. He also led in building Singapore’s 3rd Medical School, the Lee Kong Chian Medical School, with Imperial College London. He was conferred the 2016 National Day Public Administration Gold Medal for this effort.

 

He was the Chair of NTU’s School of Materials Science and Engineering (MSE) from 2004 to 2010, transforming it into NTU’s top research school and became known as one of the world’s foremost MSE institution. Although MSE only started in 2000, it ranked 6th in QS world subject ranking and 2nd in US News world ranking in 2015 & 2016, with an outstanding reputation for generating start up technologies that can be commercialized. Professor Boey won the Singapore National Day Public Administration Silver Medal in 2010 for his achievement in building the School of MSE. 

 

A keen inventor, Professor Boey pioneered the use of functional biomaterials for medical devices in Singapore. He was conferred Singapore’s highest Scientific Award, the Singapore President Science & Technology Medal (PSM) for lifetime achievement, and the prestigious Imperial College London Faculty of Medicine Fellow award, both in 2013, for his biomedical research achievements. His research team also won the 2014 President’s Technology Award (PSTA) for using nanostructures with a novel drug delivery approach to combat blindness from glaucoma. 

 

He has developed 127 patents and founded several companies to commercialize his cardiovascular, ocular and surgical implants. His customizable hernia mesh has received US and China FDA approvals and received US & China funding as a US company. His fully biodegradable heart stent company, Amaranth, has been substantially funded by a Silicon Valley VC, EDB and the top US Medical Device company, Boston Scientific, for a series of advanced US FDA clinical trials in several hundred patients worldwide. His most recent company, Peregrine, is based on a nano based drug delivery system to treat Glaucoma, which has been successfully deployed in human trials. Prof Boey’s research has been published in over 347 top journals with 23,555 citations and he has an H-Index of 71. 

 

He previously served as director on the boards of the Government Technology Agency of Singapore and Defense Science Organisation. He remains a Director for the Health Sciences Authority and also contributes on many boards of nationally-funded research centres. He is a Fellow of the Institute of Materials (UK) and the Institution of Engineers Singapore, and a Founding Fellow of the Academy of Engineering, and had been a member of the National Cybersecurity R& D Laboratory and Singapore Rail Academy Board.

 

Important Notes:


•          All participants must be fully vaccinated, i.e. has received the full regimen of Pfizer-BioNTech/Comirnatry, Moderna or

             WHO EUL vaccines, with an additional two weeks for the vaccine to be fully effective.
•          Only full vaccinated participants are allowed to attend the event physically. Else, participants have to attend the event virtually. 
•          Masks must be worn at all times. Safe Management Measures, including safe distanced seating, will be enforced during the event. 

•          This webinar will be recorded for the benefit of those who missed the live session.

•          By registering for this event, you acknowledge that you have to comply with the appropriate Covid measures at the event. 

 

We look forward to having you at the seminar.  Thank you.

 

Best Regards

Office of Research

Subject: So you want to work in tech? 🚀👨‍💻 3DC Introductory Session!
Body:
Hi SUTD fam! 👋


If you're interested in startups, 👨‍💻 software engineering, 🤖 AI/ML and/or want to know 😎 what to expect as an intern at a tech company,  
SUTD's developer club 3DC is holding our intro session on: 29 September 2021, 8pm-9.30pm. 


During which we will be talking about what we do, why you should join us and, hear from some of our members about how to land your summer internship at a tech company! It'll be held online so you can attend from the comfort of your room 🤘


To sign up, either scan the QR code in the image above or click the following link: https://forms.office.com/r/Rfy9m904Jz <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FRfy9m904Jz&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C5c9b60fad6104fa6f31b08d972138321%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666250715064076%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=fRY8rh70Xjdk%2BIJdnYEs1sXadkwltmLv6ShcGEWPce4%3D&reserved=0> 

Please sign up asap as we're planning to have a cap on the number of people in the Zoom session 🙂 


If you have any questions, either email @Student - Raphael Yee Jun-Kai @Student - Goh Ying Ming, Bryce or telegram us for more info!

Regards,



Raphael Yee

President, 3DC & SUTD-Google DSC Lead

Subject: SUTD Drama Club Intro Session
Body:
Introducing the Drama Club

Drama Club is a club where we free ourselves from our inhibitions and embrace the idea that we can be anything. We conduct various plays and workshops for those interested in acting, directing, writing, set designing and various other roles that make a play run smoothly. Camaraderie and teamwork are what we value the most, so join us to be part of this vibrant, wholesome, and fun community where you get the chance to find yourself and express it in the best way possible. 

 

IT'S TIME FOR YOU TO STEP ON STAGE!

For all of you interested in knowing what being part of the Drama Club is like, we present Step On Stage, an introductory event for you to experience it first-hand. A fun evening spent with theatre games, a little bit of acting and a whole lot of creativity and fun, we invite you to join us and have a great time. We welcome all aspiring actors, directors, writers and set designers and don't worry you don't need any prior experience.

There are only limited seats available so sign up here <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Ddrd2NJDpck-5UGJImDFiPRD24TgzxK1Or5FH88pxsr5UN0ZHOEc3NzhOWThVNzBaM0hHR1NGRUlHMi4u&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C194d4a75254a41ebcb1508d971f41c85%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666116047198916%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kUhtPLsAruH10CBZuIJU7eMlvaspysqiFyeLzDwtFaA%3D&reserved=0>  as soon as possible.

 



 

If you want to keep up with other events that Drama Club will be conducting (including future casting calls or auditions) join our telegram group using this link.  <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FTeC2f3otUDs2EBWD&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C194d4a75254a41ebcb1508d971f41c85%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666116047208908%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hX5dDCXwrVJx1Pp4kuSmmmR0PAyo5C%2FojuVskNmGSoE%3D&reserved=0> *

 

*PDPA Declaration: The link above will direct you to the SUTD Drama Telegram group. By agreeing to join this chat group voluntarily, your contact number may become visible to other participants inside the chat group, so enter with caution.

 

 

See you at the Intro Session!

 

Drama Club

Subject: JOIN US! [General Electric Webinar ] Industry Trends of Grid Modernisation.  Hear from our GE experts on Future Trends and on 21 September (Tue) at 2pm!! SEE YOU
Body:
Hi Students!

 

 



☛ Are you interested in pursuing a career in the Power Systems Industry?

Grab this opportunity to get insights on GE as a major player in the Grid Automation Business.

 

☛ Learn about the Company’s latest Innovations and Technologies with an interactive session with GE experts.

 

☛ Hear from our panel as they share topics such as Digital Substations, Integration into Renewable energy and Monitoring & diagnostics.

 

Sign Up Now to know more! Event Details as stated below. Exciting Prizes to be won!

 

 

 

 



	 

Industry Trends of Grid Modernisation

	
	
In a rapidly changing world, safe secure and reliable electricity generation and transmission is of paramount importance. With global emission standards pushing for cleaner energy, Renewables could overtake coal as greatest source of electricity generation in the world.

Register today for the introductory webinar!

Join GE panel of experts for a live webinar and Q&A session on Digital Substation Trends and how GE is at such a forefront. Can't make the time or date? Register now to receive the presentation slides via email after the webinar.

In this session, learn about:

*         GE Culture, our Purpose and Leadership Behaviours

*         Learn all about the Exciting Trends in a Digitalized World and how GE will be at its forefront.

*         How GE various businesses function and work cohesively together

*         Introduction to Digital Substation and how the landscape is set to function

*         What are the challenges in integration to Renewable Energy and how GE overcome them

*         Other Business Aspects such as Monitoring and Diagnostics and its improvements to improve product life cycle

	
 <http://www.gegridsolutions.com/email/TechTalk/2019-Overcurrent-for-feeder-protection/call-to-action-left-bg.jpg> 

 

Register for this Technical Webinar

21st September 2021, at 2 pm to 4 pm GMT +0800

 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fteams.microsoft.com%2Fregistration%2F0bbMFTXTlkm2-XtpJfCBIQ%2ClLwIaujiM0-YZs4bPrp_pg%2CQXSQG4xUSEKJDeADfIG6Hg%2CBmduFYHP-Uqhpc4zXbOUtg%2CM-rXoV9P20mzqPpYm9pwJQ%2CjDoSD5uzwESj4zmDOad2Ww%3Fmode%3Dread%26tenantId%3D15ccb6d1-d335-4996-b6f9-7b6925f08121&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0df1fcdf23ef494f9bbb08d971e1a851%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666036392433127%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Gv4kK9f8uwlJM7i%2B9fr5pgpE2Vmh%2B0%2BFikfspZOdKVM%3D&reserved=0>

Grid Automation

Ng Lip Boon

Grid Automation



Chow Chin Fei

CEAP Region Products Growth Leader, Grid Automation

Lead Application Engineer,

Grid Automation



Silas Wan

CEAP Region M&D Growth Leader,

Grid Automation

 

 



Grid Solutions, a GE Renewable Energy business, serves customers globally with over 13,000 employees. Grid Solutions provides power utilities and industries worldwide with equipment, systems and services to bring power reliably and efficiently from the point of generation to end power consumers. Grid Solutions is focused on addressing the challenges of the energy transition by enabling the safe and reliable connection of renewable and distributed energy resources to the grid.

 

	
Learn more about GE's portfolio of Automation & Protection products <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gegridsolutions.com%2Fautomation_protection.htm&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0df1fcdf23ef494f9bbb08d971e1a851%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666036392443121%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=dKrTWBQ5ZD8dzsAhFml1jdUqzXqK9Ui0RIvGQZS4M78%3D&reserved=0> .

	

	
For the latest industry advancements & insights from GE thought leaders, follow us on LinkedIn <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgo.gegridsolutions.com%2FMDA0LUpIWi01NjUAAAF-Q-5dQ1wc-VUFMAr1HK4jee2vMzIrDrNXUtgwSxMmXDte5moGhFtJ8RfmlXCkBpuvpq0jdZM%3D&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0df1fcdf23ef494f9bbb08d971e1a851%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666036392593036%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=xZSlM20faz6pgm%2FruHboZVhfa2Ppif6P%2Fl1lclttoEg%3D&reserved=0> & Twitter <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgo.gegridsolutions.com%2FMDA0LUpIWi01NjUAAAF-Q-5dQ_9zZ6h0ktimP3Aac0A_Eb-mcLALUHCs67Dceg4cG1-z7uBRdoweokk0kX4Ab2HgHz8%3D&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0df1fcdf23ef494f9bbb08d971e1a851%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637666036392593036%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UTszhOjYelV8b8hWZjEOBzEAUnVX4NQ%2F6VH32fao7qQ%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Rotaract Introductory Session!
Body:
Hello SUTD Family! 

Hope all of you are well-rested and ready to take on the new term! And to the brand new Class of 2025, we would also like to officially welcome you to SUTD!

Have a passion to serve the community? Want to use your talents and skills to make a difference? Get to know what SUTD Rotaract has in store for you during this virtual (MS Teams) Introductory Session, happening on 20 Sep!

During this Introductory Session, we’ll be sharing more about what we have done over the past year and what you can expect when you join our SUTD Rotaract family! Additionally, you can look forward to a sneak peek of our exclusive T-Shirt design, made for Rotaractors.



Sign up here: https://forms.office.com/r/nME4YR4zx4 <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FnME4YR4zx4&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0e8558a74c0f4669664608d971d5887e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637665984401899730%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YxFzK5yxFXiFLZaJGk9HIsLPFaYLzFJ9cartFLgGOTg%3D&reserved=0> 

To get regular updates about the club and our projects, do also join our Telegram group <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjoinchat%2FIkywE0yhCsrdykbptliO7A&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0e8558a74c0f4669664608d971d5887e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637665984401909725%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yIEhAd2RFRGtvOsKhJ46kwOT0AzLbWAZ2glWbU1Ah3s%3D&reserved=0> * and follow us on Instagram <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Frotaractsutd&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0e8558a74c0f4669664608d971d5887e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637665984401919728%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yoarUhyGLI0HUvC9zL7nNmvhv2%2FHcJ7vtT1rQfbQUhA%3D&reserved=0> !

We have also uploaded a pre-Intro Session video on IGTV <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Ftv%2FCTgx7j_HlCE%2F&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0e8558a74c0f4669664608d971d5887e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637665984401919728%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bWjt5tKRiATlF9qHviW8HWqLgWKflRv1FV%2FLVyOxHPk%3D&reserved=0>  and YouTube <https://apc01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FcKv5voWSZbY&data=04%7C01%7Caxel_liew%40mymail.sutd.edu.sg%7C0e8558a74c0f4669664608d971d5887e%7C3476b776e9904f72b95062489831623d%7C0%7C0%7C637665984401929723%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=E9mEv27QLF6dnnk8JvuThmM%2FVi%2FdI5khfzBX4d%2FJtEU%3D&reserved=0>  where we shared more about our personal experiences and events that we have participated in! Do check it out before coming for the Intro Session 👍

We hope to see you there!

Blessings,
